body.div:
pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ |
raso 'bhimāno 'haṃkāraḥ śṛṅa‍gāra iti gīyate |
yo 'rthastasyānvayātkāvyaṃ kamanīyatvamaśnute || 1 ||
viśiṣṭādṛṣṭajanmāyaṃ janmināmantarātmasu |
ātmasamyagguṇodbhūtereko hetuḥ prakāśate || 2 ||
śṛṅa‍gārī cetkaviḥ kāvye jātaṃ rasamayaṃ jagat |
sa eva cedaśṛṅa‍gārī nīrasaṃ sarvameva tat || 3 ||
paśyati strīti vākye hi na rasaḥ pratibhāsate |
vilokayati kānteti vyaktameva pratīyate || 4 ||
kanye kāmayamānaṃ māṃ tvaṃ na kāmayase katham |
iti grāmyo 'yamarthātmā vairasyāyaiva kalpate || 5 ||
kāmaṃ kandarpacāṇḍālo mayi vāmākṣi nirdayaḥ |
tvayi nirmatsaro diṣṭyetyagrāmyo 'rtho rasāvahaḥ || 6 ||
navo 'rthaḥ sūktiragrāmyā śravyo bandhaḥ sphuṭā śrṛtiḥ |
alaukikārthā‘alaukikārthayuktiśca’ ka kha yuktiśca rasamāhartumīśate || 7 ||
vakroktiśca rasoktiśca svabhāvoktiśca vāṅmayam |
sarvāsu‘sarvānugrāhiṇīm’ ka grāhiṇīṃ tāsu rasoktiṃ pratijānate || 8 ||
atha caturviśatirasoktīrāhabhāvo janmānubandho 'tha‘arthaniṣpanti’ ka kha niṣpattiḥ puṣṭisaṃkarau |
hrāsābhāsau śamaḥ śeṣo viśeṣaḥ ‘paripoṣavān’ ka khapariśeṣavān || 9 ||
vipralambho 'tha saṃbhogastacceṣṭāstatparīṣṭayaḥparīkṣāḥ |
niruktayaḥ prakīrṇāni premāṇaḥ premapuṣṭayaḥ || 10 ||
﻿
nāyikānāyakaguṇāḥ pākādyāḥ premabhaktayaḥ |
nānālaṃkārasaṃsṛṣṭeḥ prakārāśca rasoktayaḥ || 11 ||
caturviṃśatirityuktā rasānvayavibhūtayaḥ |
svarūpamāsāṃrasoktīnām yo veda sa kāvyaṃ kartumarhati || 12 ||
ālambanavibhāvebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ samunmiṣan |
raso ratyādirūpeṇa bhāva ityābhidhīyate || 13 ||
ratirhāsaśca śokaśca krodhotsāhau bhayaṃ tathā |
jugupsā vismayaścāṣṭau sthāyibhāvāḥ prakīrtitāḥ || 14 ||
stambhastanūruhodbhedo‘tanuruhodbheda’ ga gha gadgadaḥ svedavepathū |
vaivarṇyamaśrupralaya‘aśrupralayāvityaṣṭau’ ka kha ityaṣṭau sāttvikāḥ ‘matāḥ’ ka khasmṛtāḥ || 15 ||
smṛtirvitarka ‘vitarkaścotkaṇṭhā’ ka khautkaṇṭhā cintā capalatā matiḥ |
garvaḥ sneho dhṛtirvrīḍāvahitthaṃ mūḍhatā madaḥ || 16 ||
harṣāmarṣāvasūyerṣyā viṣādo dainyamugratā |
trāsaḥ śaṅa‍kā gado glānirunmādaḥ saṃbhramaḥ śramaḥ || 17 ||
nirvedo jāḍyamālasyaṃ nidrā suptaṃ prabuddhatā |
iti bhāvāstrayastriṃśadvijñeyā vyabhicāriṇaḥ || 18 ||
ciraṃ citte 'vatiṣṭhante saṃbadhyante 'nubandhibhiḥ |
rasatvaṃ pratipadyante ‘pravṛddhā’ ka khaprabuddhāḥ sthāyino 'tra te || 19 ||
rajastamobhyāmaspṛṣṭaṃ manaḥ sattvamihocyate |
nirvṛttaye 'sya tadyogātprabhavantīti sāttvikāḥ || 20 ||
viśeṣeṇābhitaḥ kāye sthāyinaṃ cārayanti ye |
anubhāvādihetūṃstānvadanti vyabhicāriṇaḥ || 21 ||
janitvā ye na jāyante te 'thavā vyabhicāriṇaḥ |
smṛtyādayo hi premādau bhavanti na bhavanti ca || 22 ||
ratau saṃcāriṇaḥ sarvān garvasnehau ‘garvasnehairdhṛtiṃ’ khadhṛtiṃ matim |
sthāsnūnevoddhatapreyaḥśāntodātteṣu jānate || 23 ||
saṃskārapāṭavādibhyo 'nubhāvaṃ vā nijāśraye |
saṃcāriṇaṃ vā janayan sāttvikaṃ vā sa jāyate || 24 ||
uddīpanavibhāvebhyaḥ smṛtihetau paṭīyasi |
anubandho 'nubhāvāderanubandho 'sya‘anubandhaḥ sa’ kha kathyate || 25 ||
vibhāvasyānubhāvasya sāttvikavyabhicāriṇoḥ |
saṃyoge rasasyatasya niṣpattimātraṃ ‘niṣpattiriṣyate’ khaniṣpattirucyate || 26 ||
viṣayāśrayasaṃskāraguṇaprakṛtipāṭavaiḥ |
dīpanātiśayaiścāsya prakarṣaḥ puṣṭirucyate || 27 ||
tulyakālabalotpattihetau bhāvāntarodaye |
saṃsargastasya yastena saṃkaraḥ sa nigadyate || 28 ||
rasāntaratiraskārādanyadrāgācca tasya yaḥ |
bhavatyapacayo vṛddhestaddhrāsaṃ taṃ pracakṣate || 29 ||
hīnapātreṣu tiryakṣu nāyakapratiyogiṣu |
gauṇeṣveva padārtheṣu tamābhāsaṃ vijānate‘pracakṣate’ gha || 30 ||
balavatsūpajāteṣu pratikūleṣu hetuṣu |
sarvātmanā samucchedaḥ praśamastasya varṇyate || 31 ||
āśrayātprakṛtervāpi ‘saṃsārasthairyato 'pi vā’ ghasaṃskārasthairyato 'pi vā |﻿
yo 'syātyantamanucchedaḥ‘mavicchedaḥ’ ka kha sa śeṣa iti śabdyate || 32 ||
śṛṅa‍gārādyā rasā ye ca ye ca śāntoddhatādayaḥ |
ye ca ratyādibhedāstānviśeṣānasya manvate || 33 ||
vibhāvaścānubhāvaśca saṃcārī ‘vāśrayaśca’ khacāśrayaśca yaḥ |
ye ca līlādayo yūnāṃ pariśeṣaḥ‘paripoṣaḥ’ ka kha sa kīrtyate || 34 ||
āśrayo yasya ratyādiḥ premāderupajāyate |
viṣayo yatra yoṣādau so 'syaratyādeḥ janmādhigacchati || 35 ||
ālambanavibhāvaḥ sa jñānakāraṇamucyate |
tenādarādirūpeṇa saṃskārastasya jāyate || 36 ||
‘anyataḥ’ ka khaādṛtaḥ paṭurabhyasta āśrayāderguṇena saḥ |
tatprabodhāya mālyartucandanendūdayādayaḥ || 37 ||
uddīpanavibhāvāste sa taiḥ smarati vāñchati |
dveṣṭi prayatate 'vaiti manyate vakti ceṣṭate || 38 ||
te 'nubhāvāstadā ye syuḥ svedaromodgamādayaḥ |
harṣāmarṣādayo ye ca jñeyāḥ saṃcāriṇo 'tra te || 39 ||
smṛtīcchāyatnajanmāno manovākvāyasaṃśrayāḥ |
vilāsā ye varastrīṇāṃ jñeyā līlādayastu te || 40 ||
līlā vilāso vicchittirvibhramaḥ kilakiñcitam |
moṭṭāyitaṃ kuṭṭamitaṃ vivvoko lalitaṃ tathā || 41 ||
vihṛtaṃ krīḍitaṃ keliriti strīṇāṃ svabhāvajāḥ |
helāhāvādayaścānye jñeyāḥ strīpuṃsayorapi || 42 || ﻿
upasaṃkhyānameteṣāmanubhāveṣu manvate |
paścādbhāvānubhūtibhyāṃ smaraṇādyanubhāvavat || 43 ||
smṛtyādayo 'nubhāvāśca bhāvāḥ saṃcāriṇaśca ye |
nāṭyeṣu‘nāgreṣu’ (?) ka , ‘nāṭye 'nukrimāṇāḥ’ kha kriyamāṇāste naṭairabhinayāḥ smṛtāḥ || 44 ||
bhāvo yadā ratirnāma prakarṣamadhigacchati |
nādhigacchati cābhīṣṭaṃ vipralambhastadocyate || 45 ||
pūrvānurāgo mānaśca pravāsaḥ karuṇaśca saḥ |
puruṣastrīprakāṇḍeṣu catuḥkāṇḍaḥ prakāśate || 46 ||
‘prāgasaṃketayoryūnoḥ’ khaprāgasaṃgatayoryūnorabhilāṣaḥ pravartate |
saṃkalparamaṇīyo 'nurāgaḥ sa prācya ucyate || 47 ||
aheriva gatiḥ premṇaḥ svabhāvakuṭileti saḥ |
ahetormeti‘ahetorneti metyukte’ ka netyukterhetorvā ‘sa na ucyate’ kamāna ucyate || 48 ||
deśāntarādibhiryūnorvyavadhānaṃ cirāya yat |
nave 'nurāge praụdhe vā pravāsaḥ so 'bhidhīyate || 49 ||
lokāntaragate yūni vallabhe vallabhā yadā |
bhṛśaṃ duḥkhāyate dīnā‘dīnaḥ’ ka karuṇaḥ sa tadocyate || 50 ||
ratireveṣṭasaṃprāptau puṣṭaḥ saṃbhoga ucyate |
so 'pi pūrvānurāgāderānantaryāccaturvidhaḥ || 51 ||
na vinā vipralambhena saṃbhogaḥ puṣṭimaśnute |
kaṣāyite hi vastrādau bhūyānrāgo 'nuṣajyate || 52 ||
﻿
strīpuṃsayorvipralambhe ‘vaicintyākalpakādayaḥ’ gavaicittyākalpanādayaḥ |
ceṣṭāviśeṣāḥ saṃbhoge cumbanāliṅa‍ganādayaḥ || 53 ||
vipralambhe 'bhiyogādyaiḥ saṃbhoge sādhvasādibhiḥ |
mithaḥparīkṣā yāḥ‘parīkṣā yā premṇo’ gha premṇo nirdiṣṭāstāḥ parīṣṭayaḥ || 54 ||
vipralambhādiśabdānāṃ lokasiddheṣu vastuṣu |
prakṛtyādivibhāgena viniveśā niruktayaḥ || 55 ||
saṃśrṛtya vipralambhārthāngṛdhivañcyoḥ pralambhane |
ityādijñāpakājjñeyaḥ prapūrvo vañcane labhiḥ || 56 ||
ādānaṃ ca pratiśrutya visaṃvādanameva ca |
kālasya haraṇaṃ cāhuḥ pratyādānaṃ ca vañcanam || 57 ||
pūrvānurāgapūrveṣu vipralambheṣu tatkramāt |
viśeṣadyotakeneha vyupasargeṇa sūcyate || 58 ||
pratiśravo hi pūrvānurāge‘pūrvānurāgavakrekṣitādibhiḥ’ ka vakrekṣitādibhiḥ |
abhīṣṭāliṅa‍ganādīnāmadānaṃ‘mādānaṃ’ ka kha hrībhayādibhiḥ || 59 ||
māne nivāraṇaṃ teṣāṃabhīṣṭāliṅa‍ganādīnām visaṃvādanamucyate |
ayathāvatpradānaṃ vā vyalīkasmaraṇādibhiḥ || 60 ||
pravāse kālaharaṇaṃ vyaktameṣāṃ pratīyate |
proṣyāgateṣvihaitāni kāntāḥ kānteṣu yuñjate || 61 ||
pratyādānaṃ punasteṣāṃ karuṇe‘kāruṇe’ ga ko na manyate |
svayaṃ dattāni hi vidhistāni tatrāpakarṣati || 62 || ﻿
‘pralabhetyatra’ ghapralambhetyatra yadi vā vañcanāmātravācini |
vinā viśabdenasamāse caturāścaturo 'rthānniyuñjate‘nprayuñjate’ kha || 63 ||
vividhaśca viruddhaśca vyāviddhaśca krameṇa saḥ |
viniṣiddhaśca pūrvānurāgādiṣupūrvānurāgapravāsakaruṇākhyeṣu viṣajyate || 64 ||
pūrvānurāge vividhaṃ vañcanaṃ vrīḍitādibhiḥ |
māne viruddhaṃ tatprāhuḥ punarīrṣyāyitādibhiḥ || 65 ||
vyāviddhaṃ dīrghakālatvātpravāse tatpratīyatevañcanam |
viniṣiddhaṃ tu karuṇe‘karuṇaḥ’ kha , ‘kiraṇe’ ga karuṇatvena gīyate || 66 ||
rāgo 'nu saha paścādvānurūpo 'nugato 'pi vā |
yūnorapūrvaḥ pūrvānurāgaśabdena śabdyate || 67 ||
rājate rañcatervāpi rāgaḥ ‘karuṇabhāvayoḥ’ khakaraṇabhāvayoḥ |
‘ghañāpi karaṇe bhāve’ gha, ‘ghañānyakārake bhāve’ kaghañānyatkārake bhāve nalopena niyamyate || 68 ||
mānyate preyasā yena yaṃ priyatvena manyate |
manute vā mimīte vā premamānaḥ sa kathyate || 69 ||
mahābhāṣyakṛtaḥ ko 'sāvanumāna iti smṛteḥ |
lyuḍanto 'pi na puṃliṅa‍go mānaśavdaḥ praduṣyati || 70 ||
yatrāṅa‍ganā yuvānaśca vasate na vasanti ca |
sa pravāsaḥ praśabdena pratīpārthena kathyate || 71 ||
‘cintotkaṇṭhādibhiśceto’ ka khacitotkaṇṭhādibhiśceto bhṛśaṃ vāsayatīha yaḥ |
pravāsayati vā yūnaḥ sa pravāso nirucyate || 72 || ﻿
prapūrvako vasirjñeyaḥ kāritāntaḥpramāpaṇeantaḥpramāpaṇamābhyantaro vadhaḥ |
tūṣṇīṃ pravāsayedenamiti vṛddhānuśāsanāt || 73 ||
abhūtotpādanāyāṃ kṛñ dṛṣṭaḥ kuru ghaṭaṃ yathā |
dṛṣṭaścoccāraṇe cauraṃkāramākrośatītivat || 74 ||
dṛṣṭo 'vasthāpane 'śmānamitaḥ kuru yathocyate |
abhyañjane 'pi ca yathā me pādau sarpiṣābhyañjayetyarthaḥpādau me‘pādau me kuru sarpiṣā’ ka kha ‘kurute sāhasaṃ manaḥ’ ka khasarpiṣā kuru || 75 ||
mūrcchāvilāpau kurute kurute sāhase manaḥ |
karoti ‘karoti duḥkhaṃ cittena’ ka khacittaṃ duḥkhena yo 'sau karuṇa ucyate || 76 ||
bhujiḥ pālanakauṭilyābhyavahārānubhūtiṣu |
bhunakti bhugno bhūṅkte 'nnaṃ bhūṅkte sukhamitīṣyate || 77 ||
samīcīnārthasaṃpūrvāttato ghañ‌pratyaye sati |
bhāve vā kārake vāpi rūpaṃ saṃbhoga iṣyate || 78 ||
sa ‘sa pāvanārthaḥ’ kapālanārthaḥ pūrvānurāgānantara ucyate |
utpannā hi ratistāsminnānukūlyena pālyate || 79 ||
sa mānānantaraṃ prāptaḥ kauṭilyārthaṃ vigāhate |
svato 'pi kuṭilaṃ prema kiṃ nu‘kimu mānānvaye sati’ ka mānānvaye sati || 80 ||
pravāsānantare tasyābhyavahārārthateṣyate |
tatra hyupoṣitairannamiva nirviśyate ratiḥ || 81 ||
karuṇānantaragato 'nubhāvārthaḥ‘ 'nubhāvārthaḥ sa kathyate’ ka kha sa kathyate |
‘viśrambhavadbhiḥ’ ka kha gavistrambhavadbhirasminhi ‘mukhamevānubhūyate’ ghasukhamevānubhūyate || 82 ||
﻿
yadi vā bhoga ityasya saṃprayogārthavācinaḥ |
samāsamā samupasargeṇa samāse ‘caturāścaturo 'rthān pracakṣate’ ka khacatvāro viśeṣāstamupāsatetaṃ saṃbhogam || 83 ||
sa saṃkṣipto 'tha‘saṃkṣipto 'rthasaṃkīrṇa’ ka saṃkīrṇaḥ saṃpūrṇaḥ samyagṛddhimān |
anantaropadiṣṭeṣu saṃbhogeṣūpapadyate || 84 ||
nave hi saṅa‍game prāyo yuvānaḥ sādhvasādibhiḥ |
saṃkṣiptāneva ratyarthamupacārānprayuñjate || 85 ||
mānasyānantare teṣāṃ vyalīkasmaraṇādibhiḥ |
roṣaśeṣānusaṃdhānātsaṃkaraḥ kena vāryate || 86 ||
saṃpūrṇaḥ pūrṇakāmānāṃ kāmināṃ proṣyasaṃgame |
utkaṇṭhitānāṃ bhūyiṣṭhamupabhogaḥ pravartate || 87 ||
pratyāgate 'pi yatraiṣā ratipuṣṭiḥ priye jane‘prayojane’ ka |
sā kimāvarṇyate yūnāṃ tatraiva mṛtajīvite || 88 ||
pūrvānurāgaḥ‘pūrvānurāgapūrvāṇāṃ’ ka kha pūrvāṇāṃ vyutpattibhirudāhṛtaḥ |
anantarāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ tatsamāse niruktayaḥ || 89 ||
vṛttistatrājahatsvārthā jahatsvārthāpi vartatām |
pradhānamanupaskṛtya na tadartho nivartate || 90 ||
prathamānantare vṛtterajahatsvārthateṣyate |
nātyantamajahatsvārthāṃ tāṃ mānānantare viduḥ || 91 ||
pravāsānantare tvīṣadajahatsvārthateṣyate |
karuṇārthasya gandho 'pi nāstyeva tadanantare || 92 || ﻿
aṣṭamīcandrakaḥprakīrṇakeṣu spṛhayantīvratamaṣṭamīcandrakaḥ. sa hi caitracaturthīto 'ṣṭamacaturthyāmupādīyamānaḥ kāminībhirarcyate yasyāṃ yavastrastareṣvabalā lolanti sā kundacaturthīkundacaturthī vasantāvatāradivasaḥ suvasantakaḥsuvasantakaḥ |
yasyāṃ striyo dolāmārohanti sā āndolanacaturthīāndolanacaturthyekaśālmalīekameva sukusumanirbharaśālmalivṛkṣamāśritya sunimīlitakādibhiḥ khelatāṃ krīḍā ekaśālmalī madanotsavaḥtrayodaśyāṃ kāmadevapūjā madanotsavaḥ || 93 ||
gandhodakapūrṇavaṃśanāḍīśrṛṅa‍gādibhiryūnāṃ priyajanābhiṣekakardamena krīḍā udakakṣveḍikāudakakṣveḍikāśoyatrottamastriyaḥ padābhighātenāśokaṃ vikāśya tatkusumamavataṃsayanti sā aśokottaṃsikākottaṃsikā yatrāṅa‍ganābhiścūtamañjaryo 'vacityānaṅa‍gāya bālarāgatvenaiva dāyaṃdāyamavataṃsyante sā cūtabhañjikā, ‘bhūtabhañjikā’ ghacūtabhañjikā |
puṣpāvacāyikāṃyatra yuvatyo madirāgaṇḍūṣadohadena bakulaṃ vikāśya tatpuṣpāṇyavacinvanti sā puṣpāvacāyikā cūtalatikāyatra kaste priyatama iti pṛcchadbhiḥ palāśādinavalatābhiḥ priyo jano hanyate sā cūtalatikā bhūtamātṛkāpañcātmanānunayantī bhūtamātṛkā || 94 ||
kadambayuddhānivarṣāsu kadambanīpahāridrakādikusumaiḥ praharaṇabhūtairdvidhā balaṃ vibhajya kāminīnāṃ krīḍā kadambayuddhāni, kādambayuddhānītyapi pāṭhaḥ navapatrikāprathamavarṣaṇaprarūḍhanavatṛṇāṅa‍kurāsu sthalīṣu śādvalamabhyarcya bhuktapītānāṃ kṛtrimavivāhādikrīḍā navapatrikā abhinavabisāṅa‍kurodbhedābhirāmasaraḥ samāśritya kāmimithunānāṃ krīḍā bisakhādikābisakhādikā |
śakrotsavadivasaḥ śakrārcāśakrārcā kaumudīāśvine paurṇamāsī kaumudī dīpotsavo yakṣarātriḥyakṣarātrirabhyūṣakhādikāśamīdhānyānāmārdrāṇāmevāgnipakvānāmabhyavahāro 'bhyūṣakhādikā’ ‘abhyuṣakhādikā’ ityapi pāṭhaḥ || 95 ||
prathamata evekṣubhakṣaṇaṃ navekṣubhakṣikānavekṣubhakṣikā toyakrīḍāgrīṣmādau jalāśayāvagāhanaṃ toyakrīḍā nāthādidarśanaṃ prekṣāprekṣādidarśanam |﻿
āliṅa‍ganādiglahā durodarādikrīḍā dyūtānidyūtāni rāgoddīpanāya mādhvīkādisevā madhupānam | vātsyāyanīye kāmaśāstre krīḍādvaividhyaṃ samasyā deśyāśceti medāt | tāsu kāścidvihāya sarvā api naitābhyaḥ pṛthak tatrollikhitāṣṭīkākartrā vyākhyātā ityatrāpi tadvyākhyānaṃ samuddhṛtya vilikhāmaḥ—‘samasyāḥ krīḍā āha—yakṣarātriḥ, kaumudījāgaraḥ, suvasantakaḥ | yakṣarātririti sukharātriḥ | yakṣāṇāṃ tatra saṃnidhānāt | tatra prāyaśo lokasya dyūtakrīḍā | kaumudījāgara iti | āśvayujyāṃ hi paurṇamāsyāṃ kaumudyā jyotstrāyāḥ prakarṣeṇa pravṛtteḥ | tatra dolādyūtaprāyāḥ krīḍāḥ | suvasantaka iti | suvasanto madanotsavaḥ | tatra nṛtyagītavādyaprāyāḥ krīḍāḥ | etā māhimānyaḥ krīḍāḥ || deśyā āha —sahakārabhañjikā, abhyūṣakhādikā, bisakhādikā, navapatrikā, udakakṣveḍikā, pāñcālānuvānam, ekaśālmalī, kadambayuddhāni, tāstāśca māhimānyo deśyāśca krīḍā janebhyo viśiṣṭamācareyuḥ | iti saṃbhūyakrīḍāḥ | sahakārabhañjiketi | sahakāraphalānāṃ bhañjanaṃ yatra krīḍāyām | abhyūṣa़khādikā phalānāṃ viṭapasthānāmagnau ploṣitānāṃ khādanaṃ yatra | bisakhādikā bisānāṃ mṛṇālānāṃ khādanaṃ yatra | saraḥsamīpavāsināmityete dve kvacitkaciddṛśyete | navaṃpatrikā prathamavarṣaṇena prarūḍhanavapatrāsu vanasthalīṣu yā krīḍā sā prāyeṇāṭavīsamīpavāsināmāṭavikānāṃ ca | udakakṣveḍiketi | ‘vaṃśanāḍī smṛtā kṣveḍā siṃhanādaśca kathyate’ iti | udakapūrṇā kṣveḍā yasyāṃ krīḍāyāṃ sā madhyadeśyānām | yasyāḥ śrṛṅa‍gakrīḍeti prasiddhiḥ | pāñcālānuyānam | bhinnālāpaceṣṭitaiḥ pāñcālakrīḍā yathā mithilāyām | ekaśālmalī ekameva mahāntaṃ kusumanirbharaṃ śālmalīvṛkṣamāśritya tatratyakusumābharaṇānāṃ krīḍā | yathā vaidarbhāṇām | yavacaturthī vaiśākhaśuklacaturthyā śrāvaṇaśuklatṛtīyāyāṃ hindolakrīḍā | madanotsavo madanapratikṛtipūjanam | damanabhañjikā parasparaṃ sugandhapuṣpaviśeṣāvataṃsanam | holākā ... ... .... | aśokottaṃsikā aśokapuṣpaiḥ śirobhūvaṇaracanā | puṣpāvacāyikā puṣpakrīḍā | cūtalatikā cūtapallavāvataṃsanam | ikṣumañjikā ikṣukhaṇḍamaṇḍanam | kadambayuddhāni kadambakusumaiḥ praharaṇabhūtaidvidhāṃ balaṃ vibhajya yuddhāni | kadambagrahaṇaṃ kusumasukumārapraharaṇasūcanārtham | yaṣṭīṣṭakādiyuddhāni tu na kāryāṇi | yathā pauṇḍrāṇāṃ yuddhaṃ kvacitkaciddṛśyate | tāstāśceti | yā yā loke pravṛttipūrvāḥ | māhimānya iti mahimā mahattvaṃ tadvidyate yāsāmiti | ‘saṃjñāyā manmāmyām 5|2|137’ iti nipratyayaḥ | sarvadeśavyāpinya ityarthaḥ | deśe bhavā deśyāḥ | prādeśinya ityarthaḥ | janebhyo viśiṣṭamiti ghaṭādayo nāgarakāṇāmiti | samasyāstu sādhāraṇāḥ | tatra janā nāgarakāśca krīḍanti | tasmāttebhyo viśiṣṭamācareyuḥ nāgaratvadyotanārtham | saṃbhūyakrīḍā iti | āsu nāgarakāṇāṃ dravyamupahārya saṃbhūyakrīḍanāt | kandarpacūḍāmaṇikartā vīrabhadro 'pi—‘kuryācca yakṣarātriṃ sukharātriḥ sā ca kathyate loke | aikyaṃ kojāgarayā kaumudyāstatra nirdiṣṭam || suvasantako 'tra śāstre bhavati vasantasya vāsaraḥ prathamaḥ | bisakhādikā sarasyāṃ bisabhuktiḥ kīrtitā lokaiḥ || madanārthitāmrakusumairavataṃse cāmrabhañjikā proktā | abhyūṣakhādikaivaṃ jñātavyā granthataḥ parataḥ || anyonyaṃ jalasekaḥ pānīyakṣvaiḍikeritā vibudhaiḥ | kṛtrimavivāhalīlā kathitā navapatrikā ta़jjñaiḥ || kṛtrimaputrakalīlā syādanuyānaṃ tathā tu pāñcālyāḥ | śālmalyāmadhiruhya krīḍaikā śālmalī kathitā || yuddhaṃ kadambamukulaiḥ pravibhajya balaṃ parasparaṃ yatra | syāttatkadambayuddhaṃ kuryādanyāstathā līlāḥ ||’ iti jayamaṅa‍galākarturanuvyācaṣṭe |madhupānaṃ ca prakīrṇānīti jānate || 96 || ﻿
nityo naimittikaścānyaḥ‘naimittikaścānyo’ ka gha sāmānyo 'nyo viśeṣavān |
pracchanno 'nyaḥ prakāśo 'nyaḥ kṛtrimākṛtrimāvubhau || 97 ||
sahajāhāryanāmānau parau yauvanajo 'paraḥ |
‘vistrambhajaśca’ ka khavistrambhajaśca premāṇo dvādaśaite maharddhayaḥ || 98 ||
cakṣuḥprītirmanaḥsaṅa‍gaḥ saṃkalpotpattisaṃtatiḥ |
pralāpo jāgaraḥ kārśyamaratirviṣayāntare || 99 ||
lajjāvisarjanaṃ vyādhirunmādo mūrcchanaṃ muhuḥ |
maraṇaṃ ceti vijñeyāḥ krameṇa premapuṣṭayaḥ || 100 ||
‘nāyakaḥ prati pūrvā 'yamupapūrvo 'nunāyakaḥ’ ka khanāyakaḥ pratipūrvo 'sāvupapūrvo 'nunāyakaḥ |
nāyikā pratipurvāsāvupapūrvānunāyikā || 101 ||
nāyikānāyakābhāsāvubhayābhāsa ityapi |﻿
tiryakṣu ca tadābhāsa‘tiryakṣu ca tadābhāsā’ ka kha iti dvādaśa nāyakāḥ || 102 ||
teṣu sarvaguṇopetaḥ kathāvyāpī ca nāyakaḥ |
anyāyavāṃstaducchedya uddhataḥ pratināyakaḥ || 103 ||
tataḥ kaiścidguṇairhīnaḥ pūjyaścaivopanāyakaḥ |
samo nyūno 'pi vā tasya kanīyānanunāyakaḥ || 104 ||
syātkathāvyāpinī sarvaguṇayuktā ca nāyikā |
heturīrṣyāyitādīnāṃ sapatnī pratināyikā || 105 ||
tataḥ kaiścidguṇairhīnā pūjyā caivopanāyikā |
samā nyūnāpi vā kiṃcitkanīyasyanunāyikā || 106 ||
tadābhāsāstathaiva syurbhedāścaiṣāṃ‘bhedāsteṣāṃ’ ka kha guṇādibhiḥ |
nāyakastatra guṇata uttamo madhyamo 'dhamaḥ || 107 ||
‘prākṛtaḥ’ khaprakṛteḥ sāttvikaḥ sa syādrājasastāmasastathā |
sādhāraṇo 'nanyajātiḥ‘ananyajāniḥ’ kha sa vijñeyaḥ parigrahāt || 108 ||
uddhato lalitaḥ śānta udātto dhairyavṛttitaḥ |
śaṭho dhṛṣṭo 'nukūlaśca dakṣiṇaśca pravṛttitaḥ || 109 ||
guṇato nāyikāpi syāduttamā madhyamādhamā |
mugdhā madhyā pragalbhā ca vayasā kauśalena vā‘ca’ ka kha || 110 ||
dhīrādhīrā ca dhairyeṇa svānyadīyāparigrahāt |
ụ̄dhānụ̄dhopayamanātkramājjyeṣṭhā kanīyasī || 111 ||
mānarddheruddhatodāttā śāntā ca lalitā ca sā |
sāmānyā ca punarbhūśca svairiṇī ceti vṛttitaḥ || 112 || ﻿
ājīvatastu gaṇikā rūpājīvā vilāsinī |
avasthāto 'parāścāṣṭau vijñeyāḥ khaṇḍitādayaḥ || 113 ||
‘nidrākūṇita’ ka khanidrākulitatāmrākṣo nārīnakhavibhūṣitaḥ |
prātareti priyo yasyāḥ ‘kutaścitkhaṇḍiteti sā’ ka, ‘kuttaścitkhaṇḍitā tusā’ khakutaścitseha khaṇḍitā || 114 ||
cāṭukāramapi prāṇanāthaṃ kopādapāsya yā |
paścāttāpamavāpnoti kalahāntaritā tu sā || 115 ||
dutīmaharahaḥ preṣya kṛtvā saṃketakaṃ kvacit |
yasyā na militaḥ preyānvipralabdheti tāṃ viduḥ || 116 ||
sā tu vāsakasajjā syātsajjite vāsaveśmani |
priyamāstīrṇaparyaṅa‍kā‘paryaṅa‍ke’ ka kha bhūṣitā yā pratīkṣate || 117 ||
svādhīnapatikā sā tu yasyāḥ pārśvaṃ na muñcati |
priyaścitraratakrīḍāsukhāsvādanalolupaḥ || 118 ||
puṣpeṣupīḍitā kāntaṃ yāti yā sābhisārikā |
priyo deśāntare yasyāḥ sā tu proṣitabhartṛkā || 119 ||
yasyāḥ samucte 'pyahni pravāsī naiti vallabhaḥ |
virahotkaṇṭhitā sā tu uttamādayo vilāsinyantāścaturviṃśatiḥ, khaṇḍitādavo virahoktaṇṭhitāścāṣṭāviti dvātriṃśatdvātriṃśaditi nāyikāḥ || 120 ||
hīnapātrāṇi śeṣāṇi pīṭhamardo vidūṣakaḥ |
viṭaceṭau patākāśca sakhyaścaiṣāṃ parigrahaḥ || 121 ||
mahākulīnataudārye mahābhāgyaṃ kṛtajñatā |
rūpayauvanavaidagdhya‘śīlasaubhāgyasaṃmadaḥ’ kaśīlasaubhāgyasaṃpadaḥ || 122 || ﻿
manitodāravākyatvamadaridrāadaridretyanurāgitāyā viśeṣaṇam, tena sthirānurāgitetyarthaḥnurāgitā |
dvādaśeti guṇānāhurnāyakeṣvābhigāmikān‘nārikerābhrapākādyā’ kha, ‘nārikelābhrapākādyāḥ’ gha || 123 ||
‘premasaṃparkabhaktayaḥ’ ka khamṛdvīkānālikerāmrapākādyāḥ pākabhaktayaḥ |
nīlīkusumbhamañjiṣṭhārāgādyā rāgabhaktayaḥ || 124 ||
antarvyājabahirvyājanirvyājā vyājabhaktayaḥ |
dharmārthakāmodarkāśca ‘rasālaṃkārasaṃkarāt’ kapremasūdarkabhaktayaḥ || 125 ||
vākyavacca prabandheṣu rasālaṃkārasaṃkarān |
niveśayantyanaucityaparīhāreṇa sūrayaḥ || 126 ||
caturvṛttyaṅa‍gasaṃpannaṃ‘caturvṛttyaṅa‍kasaṃpannaṃ’ ka kha caturodāttanāyakam |
caturvargaphalaṃ ko na prabandhaṃ bāndhavīyati || 127 ||
mukhaṃ pratimukhaṃ garbho 'vamarśaśca manīṣibhiḥ |
smṛtānirvahaṇaṃ ceti prabandhe pañca saṃdhayaḥ || 128 ||
avistṛtamasaṃkṣiptaṃ śravyavṛttaṃ ‘susandhi ca’ ka sugandhi ca |
bhinnasargāntavṛttaṃ ca kāvyaṃ loko 'bhinandati || 129 ||
puropavanarāṣṭrādimudrāśramavarṇanaiḥ |
deśasaṃpatprabandhasya rasotkarṣāya kalpate || 130 ||
‘ṛturātriṃ’ ka kha ṛturātriṃ‘divārkendūdayāstamayavarṇanaiḥ’ ka khadivārkendūdayāstamayakīrtanaiḥ |
kālaḥ kāvyeṣu saṃpanno rasapuṣṭiṃ niyacchati || 131 ||
rājakanyākumārastrīsenāsenāṅa‍gabhaṅgibhiḥ |﻿
‘pātrāṇāṃ varṇanātkāvye’ ka khapātrāṇāṃ varṇanaṃ kāvye rasastroto 'dhitiṣṭhati || 132 ||
udyānasalilakrīḍāmadhupānaratotsavāḥ |
vipralambhā vivāhāśca ceṣṭāḥ kāvye rasāvahāḥ || 133 ||
mantradūtaprayāṇājināyakābhyudayādibhiḥ |
puṣṭiḥ puruṣakārasya rasaṃ kāvyeṣu varṣati || 134 ||
nāvarṇanaṃ nagaryāderdoṣāya viduṣāṃ matam |
yadi śailarturātryādervarṇanenaiva ‘puṣyati’ khatuṣyati || 135 ||
guṇataḥ prāgupanyasya nāyakaṃ tena vidviṣām |
nirākaraṇamityeṣa mārgaḥ prakṛtisundaraḥ || 136 ||
‘baṃśavṛttaśruttādīni’ ka khavaṃśavīryaśrutādīni varṇayitvā riporapi |
tajjayānnāyakotkarṣakathanaṃ ca dhinoti naḥ || 137 ||
athaiṣāṃ lakṣaṇodāharaṇāni—
‘tatra’ ka kha nāstitatra,
manonukūleṣvartheṣu sukhasaṃvedanaṃ ratiḥ |
‘āsaṃprayogaviṣayā’ ka khaasaṃprayogaviṣayā saiva prītirnigadyate || 138 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasya bhāvo yathā—
‘harastu kiṃcitpa‘pariluptadhairyaḥ’ kharivṛttadhairyaścandroyārambha ivāmburāśiḥ |
umāmukhe bimbaphalādharoṣṭhe byāpārayāmāsa vilocanāni || 1 ||’
atra bimboṣṭhatvādibhirmanonukūle pārvatīmukhe vilocanavyāpārānumito maheśvarasyābhilāṣaviśeṣaḥ ‘sāttviko’ ka khasāttvikāderanu‘ratyutpādāt’ katpādātsukhānubhavasyotpattimātramanumāpayati ||﻿
tadrūpeṇaiva sāttvikotpattau janma yathā—
‘‘āsīdvaraḥ kaṇṭakitaprakoṣṭhaḥ’ iti mallināthoṭṭaṅkitaḥ pāṭhaḥabhūdvaraḥ kaṇṭakitaprakoṣṭhaḥ khinnāṅa‍guliḥ saṃvavṛte kumārī |
‘vṛttistayoḥ pāṇisamāgamena samaṃ vibhakteva manobhavasya’ mudritapāṭhaḥtasmindvaye tatkṣaṇamātmavṛttiḥ samaṃ vibhakteva manobhavena || 2 ||’
atra svedaromodbhedayoḥ‘svedaromodgamayoḥ’ kha sāttvikayorutpādādrasasya ratirūpeṇāvirbhāvo 'vagamyate |
janmaiva ‘janmaiva sattvādyutpattau yathā’ khasaṃcāryutpattau yathā—
‘atra ca 'tayorupāntapratisāritāni’, ‘tayorapāṅa‍gapraticālicāni’, ‘tayorapāṅa‍gaprativāritāni’ ityevaṃvidhā aneke pāṭhāḥtayorapāṅa‍gapravicāritāni kiṃcivdyaatrāpi ‘kriyāsamāpattinivartitāni’, ‘kriyāsamāpattivivartitāni’, ‘kriyāsamāpattiṣu kātarāṇi’, ‘tayoḥ samāpattiṣu kātarāṇi kiṃcivdyavasthāpitasaṃhṛtāni’ ityevaṃvidhā aneke pāṭhāḥvasthāpitasaṃhṛtāni |
hrīyantraṇāmānaśire manojñāmanyonyalolāni vilocanāni || 3 ||’
atra hrīḥ saṃcāribhāvo jāyamāno rasasya janma jñāpayati |
‘tadevānubhavotpattau’ ka, ‘tadevānubhayotpattau’ khatadevānubhāvotpattau yathā—
‘tataḥ sunandāvacanāvasāne lajjāṃ ‘tanūkṛtya’ mudritapāṭhaḥmṛdūkṛtya narendrakanyā |
dṛṣṭyā prasādāmalayā kumāraṃ pratyagrahītsaṃvaraṇasrajeva || 4 ||’
atra dṛṣṭilakṣaṇaḥ śarīrārambho 'nubhāvo‘śarīrārambhe 'nubhāvo bhavan’ ka kha, ‘śarīrānubhāvo bhavan’ ga bhavan rasāvirbhāvaṃ lakṣayati | anubhāvāderanekasyaikasya vā punarutpattiranubandhaḥ | so 'nekasya yathā—
‘vivṛṇvatī śailasutāpi bhāvamaṅa‍gaiḥ ‘sphuradvālakadambakalpaiḥ’ kha mudritakumārekvacidbālakadambakalpaiḥ |
sācīkṛtā cārutareṇa tasthau mukhena paryastavilocanena || 5 ||’ ﻿
atra devyāḥ ‘śive’ ghasmarārau pūrvamutpannā ratiḥ sābhilāṣatadavalokana‘tadavalokanena’ ka khaviviktavasantādibhiruddīpyamānā romāñcāvahitthalakṣaṇābhyāṃ sāttvikavyabhicāribhyāmanubadhyate ||
ekasyaiva punaḥ ‘punaḥpunarutpattiryathā’ khapunaryathā—
‘yāntyā muhurvalitakaṃdharamānanaṃ ta- dāvṛttavṛntaśatapattranibhaṃ vahantyā |
digdho 'mṛtena ca viṣeṇa ca pakṣmalākṣyā gāḍhaṃ nikhāta iva me hṛdaye kaṭākṣaḥ || 6 ||’
atra mālatyā mādhavaviṣaye pūrvamutpannā ratirvasantāvatāra‘vasantāvatārataḥ saṃnidhiviśeṣa’ ghatatsaṃnidhiviśeṣapradarśanādibhiruddīpyamānā punaḥ punarutpannena valitagrīvakaṭākṣavikṣepalakṣaṇena śarīrārambhānubhāvenānubadhyate | atraiva‘atra ca’ gha pustake pāṭhāntaram mādhavasya mālatīviṣaye tadaharevotpannā ratistairevoddīpanairuddīpyamānā harṣadhṛtismṛtimativyādhyādibhiḥ saṃcāribhāvairvāgārambheṇa cānubhāvenānubadhyate ||
ratirūpeṇaiva rasaniṣpattiryathā—
‘taṃ vīkṣya vepathumatī sarasāṅa‍gyaṣṭi- rnikṣepa‘nikṣepaṇāya’ ka kha mudrite eva padamuddhṛtamarpayantī‘muddhṛtamudvahantī’ kumārasaṃbhavasya mudritapāṭhaḥ |
mārgācalavyatikarākuliteva sindhuḥ śailādhirājatanayā na yayau na tasthau || 7 ||’
atra janmāntarānubhavasaṃskārātpratikūle 'pi śūlini ‘śivāyāḥ’ ghaśailātmajāyāḥ sarvakālamevāvicchinnā ratiści‘ciraṃ viyuktasya’ ka kharaviyuktasya duścareṇāpi tapasā prārthanīya﻿
-saṃgamasya tasyākasmikadarśanenoddīpyamānā sadyaḥsamupajāyamānasāttvikasvedastambhavepathūpalakṣitairharṣa‘harṣadhatismṛtyāvega-’ ka khasmṛtyāvegasādhvasādibhirvyabhicāribhāvaiḥ‘vyabhicāribhirbhāvaiḥ’ ka kha ‘vikṣepalakṣaṇena’ ka khapadanikṣepalakṣaṇena ca śarīrānubhāvena saṃsṛjyate | so 'yaṃ vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyoge‘saṃyogaiḥ’ ka kha ratirūpeṇa raso niṣpadyate |
ratirūpeṇaiva ‘ratipuṣṭiḥ’ karasapuṣṭiryathā—
‘pīnaśroṇi gabhīranābhi nibhṛtaṃ madhye bhṛśoccastanaṃ pāyādvaḥ parirabdhamabdhiduhituḥ kāntena kāntaṃ vapuḥ |
svāvāsānupaghātanirvṛtamanāstatkālamīladdṛśe yasmai so 'cyutanābhipadmavasatirvedhāḥ śivaṃ dhyāyati || 8 ||’
atra sarvadaiva śrīvatsalakṣmaṇo lakṣmīviṣaye mahākulīnataudāryasthirānurāgitārūpayauvanavaidagdhyaśīlasaubhāgyamahābhāgyādibhiḥ samutpannā ratistadavayavaviśeṣakāmanīyakavibhāvanenoddīpanavibhāvātiśayenoddīpyamānāṃ brahmaṇaḥ samakṣamapyāliṅa‍ganalakṣaṇena śarīrārambhānubhāvenānumīyamānāṃ lajjāpraṇāśalakṣaṇāṃ premapuṣṭeraṣṭamīmavasthāmadhyāste | atra cānuktā api sāttvikā vyabhicāriṇo 'nye 'pi cānubhāvaviśeṣāḥ pratīyante | śriyo 'pi ca samagrātmaguṇasaṃpadāśraye śrīvatsalakṣmaṇi tathābhūtā tadabhyadhikā vā‘ca’ gha ratiḥ pravṛddhapremapriyatamāliṅa‍ganalakṣaṇenoddīpanavibhāvevoddīpyamānā nayananimīlanānumeyāṃ samastasāttvikānubhāvavyabhicārihetuṃ premapuṣṭeruttamā‘ruttarā’ khamavasthāmāśrayati | so 'yaṃ viṣayasaundaryādāśrayaprakṛteḥ saṃskārapāṭavāduddīpanātiśayācca parāṃ koṭimāvahan rasaḥ puṣṭa ityucyate | atraiva brahmaṇaḥ śriyaṃ prati manoharā mameyaṃ sṛṣṭiriti, ratnākarasyeyamātmajeti, candrā-﻿
mṛtādīnāmiyaṃ sodaryeti, viṣṇoriyaṃ priyatameti, kāmasyeyaṃ jananītyādibhya ālambanebhyaḥ samutpannā prītiḥ svāvāsānupaghātinā śarīrasaṃniveśena dṛṅmimīlanajanitayā ca tadupaghātaśaṅa‍kayoddīpyamānā tatkṣaṇopajāyamānatayā āvegasmṛtivitarkonmādamohacintādibhirvyabhicāribhāvaistadanumeyaiśca stambhavepathuprabhṛtisāttvikaiḥ śivānudhyānalakṣaṇena budhdyārambhānubhāvena saṃsṛjyamānā paraṃ prakarṣamārohantī‘mārohatīti’ ka kha pratīyate ||
ratau bhayādisaṃkaro yathā—
‘rāhoścandrakalāmivānanacarīṃ daivātsamāsādya me dasyorasya kṛpāṇapātaviṣayādācchindataḥ preyasīm |
ātaṅa‍kādvikalaṃ drutaṃ karuṇayā vikṣobhitaṃ vismayāt krodhena jvalitaṃ mudā vikasitaṃ cetaḥ kathaṃ vartatām || 9 ||’
atra mādhavasya mālatyāṃ pūrvamutpannā ratistadavasthā‘tadavasthāvalokanādibhiḥ’ ga ghalokanādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānā bhayaśokavismayakrodhaharṣairapi rasāntaraiḥ pṛthakpṛthagvibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogānniṣpadyamānaiḥ saṃkīryamāṇā manovāgbuddhi‘śārīrānubhāvaiḥ’ ghaśarīrārambhānubhāvairbhayādyanurūpaiśca sāttvikavyabhicāribhiḥ saṃparke paraṃ prakarṣamārohantī pratīyate | tatra cetaso vaikalyādiparibhāvanaṃ manaārambhaḥ, vākyoccāraṇaṃ vāgārambhaḥ, rāhoriva dasyoścandrakalāmiva preyasīmityādi budhdyārambhaḥ, ‘ācchidyata’ ghaācchindata ityādi śarīrārambhaḥ, bhayādīnāṃ ca pañcānāmapi yathākramaṃ rāhoriti, candrakalāmivānanacarīmiti, daivātsamāsādya me iti, dasyorasya kṛpāṇapātaviṣayāditi, ācchindataḥ preyasīmityālambanavibhāvāstatsvarūpaparibhāvanānyuddīpanavibhāvāḥ, vikalam, ﻿
drutam, vikṣobhitam, ‘calitam’ kajvalitam, vikasitaṃ ceta‘vikasitaṃ ca ta’ gha, ‘vikasitamityanubhāvāḥ’ ka ityanubhāvāḥ, ātaṅa‍kakaruṇāvismayakrodhamudanurūpāśca kampāśrustambhavaivarṇyaromāñcādayaḥ sāttvikāḥ, mohaviṣādavita‘viṣādodakoṃgratā’ ka , ‘viṣādāmarṣogratā’ kharkogratādhṛtyādayo vyabhicāriṇaścānumīyamānā niṣpattihetavo bhavanti | so 'yaṃ tulyakālabalotpattikāraṇānāṃ bhayādiniṣpattīnāṃ ratau saṃsargaḥ saṃkara ityucyate ||
ratirūpeṇa rasaprakarṣasya hrāso yathā—
‘kopo yatra ‘bhṛkuṭiracanā’ ghabhrukuṭiracanā nigraho yatra maunaṃ yatrānyonya‘yatrānyonyaṃ’ kasmitamanunayo dṛṣṭipātaḥ prasādaḥ |
tasya premṇastadidamadhunā vaiśasaṃ paśya jātaṃ tvaṃ pādānte luṭhasi na ca me manyumokṣaḥ khalāyāḥ || 10 ||’
atra yoṣiti roṣākhyarasāntaratiraskārātpuruṣe ‘cānurāgā-’ kha , ‘cānyarāgā’ ghacānyarāgādratiprakarṣasya ‘hāso 'vagamyo’ ka khahrāso 'vasīyate |
ratirūpeṇa hīnapātreṣu rasābhāso yathā—
‘vikkiṇaï māhamāsambhi ‘pāmaro pāraṇaṃ vi illeṇa’ ka, ‘pāmaro pāraḍiṃ vaïlleṇa’ kha, ‘pāmaro pāiḍiṃ vaïlleṇa’ mudritagāthāsa॰pāmaro pāraḍiṃ vaïlleṇa |
‘ṇiddhūmamummure sāmalīṣa thaṇama ṇiacchanto’ ka , ‘ṇiddhamamummura ccia sāmalīe thaṇo paḍicchanto’ iti mudritagāthāsa॰, ‘vidu samummure sāmalīe thaṇa ṇiacchanto’ khadiṭṭhiṃ samummure sāmalīa thaṇae ṇiacchanto || 11 ||’
[vikrīṇīte māghamāse pāmaraḥprāvarakaṃ balīvardena |
dṛṣṭiṃ samurmure śyāmalyāḥ stanake niyacchan ||] ﻿
tiryakṣu yathā—
‘‘paapāḍiaṃ’ ka ‘pāapaḍia’ khapāaḍiaṃ sohaggaṃ taṃbāe ‘usaha goṭṭhamajjhammi’ ka ‘vasahagoṭhṭhamajjhammi’ khauaha goṭṭhamajjhammi |
duṭṭhavasahassa siṃge acchiuḍaṃ kaṇḍuantīe || 12 ||’
[prakaṭitaṃ saubhāgyaṃ gavā paśyata goṣṭhamadhye |
duṣṭavṛṣabhasya śṛṅa‍ge 'kṣipuṭaṃ kaṇḍūyamānayā ||]
nāyakapratiyogiṣu yathā—
‘pulaaṃ ‘jaṇeti’ ka ‘jaṇati’ khajaṇenti dahakaṃdharassa rāhavasarā sarīrammi |
jaṇaasuāphaṃsama‘phaaṃsa’ ka ‘phaṃsa pahaggha’ khahagghavia ‘karaalāṭhṭhavimukkā’ kakaraalāaṭṭhiavimukkā || 13 ||’
[pulakaṃ janayanti daśakaṃdharasya rāghavaśarāḥ śarīre |
janakasutāsparśamahārghā iva karatalākṛṣṭavimuktāḥ ||]
gauṇeṣu yathā—
‘uvvahaï ‘navatiṇaṃkura’ ka khanavataṇaṃkuraromañcapasāhiāiṃ‘pasāhiāi’ ka kha aṃgāiṃ |
‘pāusalacchīe’ ka kha pāusalacchīa paoharehiṃ paḍivelliovijjho‘viṃjho’ kha || 14 ||’
[udvahati navatṛṇāṅa‍kuraromāñcaprasādhitānyaṅa‍gāni |
prāvṛṭlakṣmyāḥ payodharābhyāṃ pratiprerito vindhyaḥ ||]
‘ete catvāro 'pi’ ka, ‘ta ete 'pi catvāro’ kataṃ ete catvāro 'pi rasābhāsā ucyante ||
ratāveva lajjāroṣarūparasāntarayoḥ praśamo yathā—
‘dṛṣṭe locanavanmanāṅyukulitaṃ pārśvasthitevakrava -nnyagbhūtaṃ bahirāsitaṃ pulakavatsparśaṃ samātanvati | ﻿
nīvībandhavadāgataṃ śithilatāmābhāṣamāṇe tato mānenāpagataṃ hriyeva sudṛśaḥ pādaspṛśi preyasi || 15 ||’
atra balavabhdyāṃ priyapremānunayābhyāṃ hrīroṣayorupaśamaḥ kriyate ||
ratāveva roṣarūparasasya śeṣo yathā—
‘eṣyatyutsukamāgate ‘vivalitaṃ’ ka khavicalitaṃ saṃbhāṣiṇi sphāritaṃ saṃśliṣyatyaruṇaṃ gṛhītavasane kopāñcitabhrūlatam |
māninyāścaraṇānativyatikare bāṣpāmbupūrṇaṃ‘bāṣpāmbupūrṇekṣaṇaṃ’ ka 'bāṣpāmbupūrṇaṃ kṣaṇaṃ’ kha kṣaṇāccakṣurjātamaho prapañcacaturaṃ jātāgasi preyasi || 16 ||’
atra kasyāścidbalavatā premṇonmūlitasyāpi mānasya ‘śeṣe 'nuvartate’ kaśeṣo 'nuvartate |
ta ete ‘bhāvā daśāpi’ kabhāvādayo daśāpi rasaprakārā hāsādiṣvapi ‘prāyaśo’ khaprāyo dṛśyante | granthagauravabhayātkva‘nna kvacidudāhriyante’ kha citkvacidudāhriyante ||
tatra
‘nyaṅa‍gaḥ krīḍādibhiḥ’ ka, ‘vyaṅa‍gakrīḍādibhiḥ’ kha, sollavaco nyaṅa‍gavācyamnyaṅa‍gavrīḍādibhiścetovikāro hāsa ucyate |
tadrūpeṇa rasasya bhāvo yathā—
‘kanakakalaśasvacche rādhāpayodharamaṇḍale navajaladharaśyāmāmātmadyutiṃ pratibimbitām |
asitasicayaprāntabhrāntyā muhurmuhurutkṣipan jayati janitavrīḍāhāsaḥ priyāhasito hariḥ || 17 ||’
atra ‘rādhayā vyaṅgitasya’ kharādhāyā harinyaṅa‍gād, harestu vrīḍāto hāsasya sattāmātraṃ pratīyate ||﻿
śokaścittasya vaidhuryamabhīṣṭavirahādibhiḥ || 139 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasya niṣpattiryathā—
‘hṛdayānnāpayāto 'si dikṣu sarvāsu ‘vīkṣyate’ ghadṛśyase |
vatsa rāma gato 'sīti saṃtāpādanumīyase || 18 ||’
atra daśasthasya rāmaviyogādutpannastadguṇasmaraṇādibhiruddīpitaścintāsaṃtāpādirvāgārambheṇa cānuṣajyamānaḥ śokarūpeṇa raso niṣpadyate ||
pratikūleṣu taikṣṇyasya prabodhaḥ krodha ucyate |
tadrūpeṇa rasasya niṣpattiryathā—
‘mayyevamasma‘matsaraṇa’ kharaṇadāruṇacittavṛttau vṛtaṃ rahaḥ praṇayamapratipadyamāne‘pratipādyamāne’ ka |
bhedādbhuvoḥ kuṭilayoratilohitākṣya bhagnaṃ śarāsanamivātiruṣā smarasya || 19 ||’
atra yadyapi ‘vibhāvānubhāvasaṃcārisaṃyoga’ ka khavibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogalakṣaṇāyā rasaniṣpatteḥ 'adhikamatiruṣātilohitākṣyā’ iti prakarṣanimittamatiśabdopādānaṃ vidyate, tathāpyuttamanāyikāśrayaḥ priyaviṣaye na roṣaḥ prakarṣamāsādayati ||
kāryārambheṣu saṃrambhaḥ stheyānutsāha iṣyate || 140 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasya janma yathā—
‘mūrdhnā jāmbavato 'bhivādya caraṇāvāpṛcchya senāpatī- nāśvāsyāśrumukhānmuhuḥ priyasakhīnpreṣyānsamādiśya ca |
ārambhaṃ jagṛhe mahendraśikharādambhonidherlaṅa‍ghane raṃhasvī raghunāthapādarajasāmuccaiḥ smaranmārutiḥ || 20 ||’
atrābhivādanapraśnāśvāsanasamādeśanādriśikharārohaṇeṣṭadevatā‘devasmaraṇānāṃ’ ghasmaraṇānāṃ ﻿
pūrvaraṅa‍gaparyavasāyitvenānuddīpanavibhāvatvādanutsāhānubhāvatvācca nāyamanubandho niṣpattiḥ prakarṣo vā bhavati ||
bhayaṃ cittasya vaiklavyaṃ raudrādijanitaṃ viduḥ |
tadrūpeṇa rasasyānubandho yathā—
‘mantrānmṛtyujito japadbhirasakṛdhdyāyadbhiriṣṭānsurān śuṣyattālubhirākulākulapadairnirvāgbhirutkampibhiḥ |
adhvanyairiha jīviteśamahiṣavyādhūmradhūmāvilā laṅa‍ghyante karimāṃsaghasmara‘raṇātkauleyakāḥ’ ka , ‘ruṇatkauleyakāḥ’ ga gharaṇatkauleyakāḥ pallayaḥ || 21 ||’
atra yadyapi pallīnāmālambanatvam, ‘na tadiśeṣaṇayoḥ’ khatadviśeṣaṇayoruddīpanatvam, mantrajapāderanubhāvatvam, tāluśoṣādīnāṃ vyabhicāritvamiti vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogo 'sti, tathāpi mantrajapeṣṭadevatānudhyānayorlaṅa‍ghanopāyaparatvānna bhayarūpeṇa ‘rasaniṣpattiḥ’ karasasya niṣpattiḥ | adhvanyānāṃ hi tanniṣpattāvalpasattvatayā stambhamohamūrcchāmaraṇādibhirupāyaprayogo na ghaṭate ||
jugupsā garhaṇārthānāṃ doṣasaṃdarśanādibhiḥ || 141 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasyānugamo yathā—
‘‘re hasta’ ka khahe hasta dakṣiṇa mṛtasya śiśordvijasya jīvātave visṛja śūdramunau kṛpāṇam |
rāmasya gātramasi nirbharagarbhakhinnasītā- pravāsanapaṭoḥ karuṇā kutaste || 22 ||’
atra yadyapi dvijaśiśorjīvanāya munirapi śūdro vadhya iti na rāmasyātmakarmanindā tathāpyanapakāriṇaṃ‘pyanayakāriṇaṃ’ kha jighāṃsato ‘ghṛṇā pravarttata iti sītāparityāga’ ka khaghṛṇānuvartata eva | sītā-﻿
parityāgaviṣayatvenaivātra jugupsānugamo grahītavyaḥ | ‘śambūkaviṣaye’ kaśambukaviṣaye punarasyā janmamātrameveti ||
vismayaścittavistāraḥ padārthātiśayādibhiḥ |
tadrūpeṇa ‘rasasya janma yathā’ ka kharasaniṣpattiryathā—
‘kṛṣṇenāmba gatena ‘rantumadhunā’ ka kharantumasakṛnmṛdbhakṣitā svecchayā satyaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ ka evamāha ‘muśalī’ ka khamusalī mithyāmba paśyānanam |
vyādehīti ‘vidārite tu vadane’ ka khavikāsite ca vadane dṛṣṭa‍vā samastaṃ jaga- nmātā yasya jagāma vismayapadaṃ pāyātsa vaḥ keśavaḥ || 23 ||’
atra śiśormuṃkhe jagaddarśanamālambanavibhāvaḥ, tatsāmagryaśaiśavādyā‘śaiśavādyālokana’ ka khalocanamuddīpanavibhāvaḥ, vismayavaśaṃ jagāmetyanenānupāttā api sarve saṃcā‘sarve saṃcāriṇo’ ityasya sthāne ‘kevalaṃ saṃcāriṇaḥ’ ka khariṇo 'nubhāvāśca gṛhyante ||
stambhaśceṣṭāpratīghāto bhayarāgāmayādibhiḥ || 142 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasya puṣṭiryathā—
‘taṃ tāṇa‘taṃ tāṇaṃ’ kha haacchāaṃ ṇiccalaloaṇasihaṃ paütthapaāvaṃ |
ālekkhapaīvāṇiva ṇiaaṃ paaïcaḍulattaṇaṃ pi vialiaṃ || 24 ||’
[tatteṣāṃ hatacchāyaṃ niścalalocanaśikhaṃ proṣitapratāpam |
ālekhyapradīpānāmiva nijakaṃ prakṛticaṭulatvamapi vigalitam ||]
ayaṃ ca puṣṭo 'pi sāttvikatvāt sadaivānyānuyāyīti nānubhāvādibhiranubadhyate ||
harṣādbhutabhayādibhyo romāñco romavikriyā | ﻿
tadrūpeṇa rasasya janma yathā—
‘karimari aālagajjirajalaāsaṇipaüṇapaḍirao eso |
païṇo dhaṇuravakaṃkhiṇi romaṃcaṃ kiṃ muhā vahasi || 25 ||’
[bandi akālagarjanajaladāśanipatanapratirava eṣaḥ |
patyurdhanūravākāṅa‍kṣaṇaśīle romāñca kiṃ mudhā vahasi ||]
asyāpi sāttvikatvādanyānubandhādayo na jāyante |
madapramadapīḍādervaisvaryaṃ gadgadaṃ viduḥ |
tadrūpeṇa rasasya niṣpattiryathā—
‘pipipriya sasasvayaṃ mumumukhāsavaṃ dehi me tatatyaja dududrutaṃ bhabhabhabhājanaṃ kāñcanam |
iti skhalitajalpitaṃ madavaśātkuraṅa‍gīdṛśaḥ prage hasitahetave sahacarībhiradhyeyata || 26 ||’
‘ayamapi’ ka khaatrāpi sāttvikatvānniṣpanno nānyairanubadhyate ||
vaprurjalodgamaḥ khedo ratigharmaśramādibhiḥ || 143 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasya janma yathā—
‘himavyapāyādviśadādharāṇāmā‘pāṇḍarībhūta’ khapāṇḍurībhūtamukhacchavīnām |
khedodgamaḥ kiṃpuruṣāṅa‍ganānāṃ cakre padaṃ ‘pattraviśeṣakeṣu’ ka khacitraviśeṣakeṣu || 27 ||’
atrāpi pūrvavadanyānuṣaṅa‍go na bhavati ||
rāgaroṣabhayādibhyaḥ kampo gātrasya vepathuḥ |
tadrūpeṇa rasasya janma yathā—
‘mā garvamudvaha kapolatale cakāsti kāntasvahastalikhitā mama mañjarīti | ﻿
anyāpi kiṃ na sakhi bhājanamīdṛśānāṃ vairī na cedbhavati vepathurantarāyaḥ || 28 ||’
ayamapi prāgvadevānyairnānugamyate‘nānyairanugamyate’ ka kha |
viṣādamadaroṣādervarṇānyatvaṃ vivarṇatā || 144 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasya niṣpattiryathā—
‘sahi ‘sahi sāhasaṃ teṇa’ kasāhasu teṇa samaṃ ahaṃ pi kiṃ ṇiggaā ‘pahaammi’ khapahāammi |
aṇṇacia dīsaï jeṇa dappaṇe kāvi sā sumuho || 29 ||’
[sakhi sādhaya tena samamahamapi kiṃ nirgatā prabhāte |
anyaiva dṛśyate yena darpaṇe kāpi sā sumukhī ||]
ayamapi nānyairanubadhyate ||
aśru netrodgataṃ vāri duḥkhaśokapraharṣajam |
tadrūpeṇa rasasyānubandho yathā—
‘utpakṣmaṇornayanayoruparuddhavṛtti bāṣsaṃ kuru sthiratayā śithilānubandham |
asminnalakṣitanatonnatabhūmibhāge mārge padāni khalu te viṣamībhavanti || 30 ||’
atra bāṣpaśavdena locanāśrayamaśrūcyate na kaṇṭhādyāśrayo duḥkhāveśaḥ | yathā—‘vilalāpa sa bāppagadgadam', ‘ ‘muhurlagnaḥ kaṇṭhe’ ka khamuhurmagnaḥ kaṇṭhe taralayati bāṣpaḥ stanataṭīm’ ityādi‘iti’ kha ||
pralayastīvraduḥkhāderindriyāstamayo mataḥ || 145 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasya niṣpattiryathā—
‘tīvrābhiṣaṅa‍gaprabhaveṇa vṛttiṃ mohena saṃstambhayatendriyāṇām |
ajñātabhartṛvyasanā muhūrtaṃ kṛtopakāreva ratirbabhūva || 31 ||’ ﻿
atra mohaśabdena mūrcchocyate, na vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇo mohaḥ ||
smṛtiḥ pūrvānubhūtārthaviṣayaṃ jñānamucyate || 146 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasyānubandho yathā—
‘itaḥ pratyādeśātsvajanamanugantuṃ vyavasitā sthitā tiṣṭhetyuccairvadati guruśiṣye gurusame |
punardṛṣṭiṃ ‘bāṣpaprakara’ ka khabāṣpaprasarakaluṣāmarpitavatī mayi krūre yattatsaviṣamiva śalyaṃ dahati mām || 32 ||’
atra saviśeṣā smṛtiricchayā vāgārambheṇa cānubadhyate | ‘tiṣṭhetyādayaḥ’ khaniṣpattyādayaḥ punarasyā ratyādiniṣpattiṣveva draṣṭavyāḥ | ‘ratyādayo hi smṛtimūlatatprakaṣāpakarṣāvanuvartante’ ka kharatyādayo 'smṛtimūlatvāttatprakarṣāpakarṣāvanuvartante ||
ūho vitarka ityuktaḥ padārtheṣu yathāmati |
tadrūpeṇa rasasya niṣpattiryathā—
‘citte niveśya parikalpitasattvayogā‘sattvayogāt’ ka kha- n‍rūpoccayena ‘vidhinā vihitā kṛtāṅa‍gī’ pāṭhaḥghaṭitā manasā kṛtā nu |
strīratnasṛṣṭiraparā pratibhāti sā me dhāturvibhutvamanucintya vapuśca tasyāḥ || 33 ||’
so 'yamasatyaḥ satyo vā smṛtijñānacintanādidvāreṇa nirṇayānto niṣpanna ityucyate ||
utkaṇṭheṣṭānavāptau yo 'bhilāṣaḥ syāttadāptaye || 147 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasya niṣpattihrāsau yathā—
‘yāsyatyadya śakuntaleti hṛdayaṃ saṃspṛṣṭamutkaṇṭha‍yā ‘bāṣpastambhitakaṇṭhavṛttivacanam’ khakaṇṭhaḥ stambhitabāṣpavṛttikaluṣaścintājaḍaṃ darśanam | ﻿
vaiklavyaṃ mama tāvadīdṛśamidaṃ snehādaraṇyaukasaḥ pīḍyante gṛhiṇaḥ kathaṃ nu‘na’ kha tanayāviśleṣaduḥkhairnavaiḥ || 34 ||’
atra vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogāt prītirivotkaṇṭhāpi tadanuṣaṅgiṇī niṣpannā uttarārdhapratipādyena ‘tathāvidhenaiva’ khaniṣedhenaiva vismayādinābhibhūyamānā hrāsa ityucyate | prakarṣaścāsyā mamāraṇyaukasa ityanena nivāryate ||
prayatnapūrvikārtheṣu smṛtiścinteti ‘kathyate’ ka khacocyate || 148 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasya prakarṣo yathā—
‘cintāṇiadaïasamāgamammi kaamaṇṇuāiṃ‘maṇṇuāi’ kha mariūṇa |
suṇṇaṃ kalahāantī ‘sahīhi’ khasahīhiṁ ruṇṇā ṇa‘nāvahasiā’ gha o hasiā || 35 ||’
[cintānītadayitasamāgame kṛtamanyukāni smṛtvā |
śūnyaṃ kalahāyamānā sakhībhī ruditā na vā hasitā ||]
atra sakhīrodanena śūnyakalahaḥ, śūnyakalahena sākṣātkāraḥ, sākṣātkāreṇa cintā, cintayā tu mūlabhūtā ratiḥ prakṛṣyate ||
ātmaprakāśanaparā ceṣṭā capalatocyate || 149 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasya janma yathā—
‘kaścitkarābhyāmupagūḍhanālamālolapattrābhihatadvirepham |
rajobhirantaḥpariveṣabandhi līlāravindaṃ bhramayāṃcakāra || 36 ||’
‘atra līlāravindabhramaṇaceṣṭayā’ ka khaatra kaścillīlāravindabhramaṇaceṣṭayā ‘kaścidindumatyai’ ka khaindumatyai tiṣṭhate ||
śāstroktārthānusaṃdhānādarthanirdhāraṇaṃ matiḥ | ﻿
tadrūpeṇa rasasyānubandho yathā—
‘asaṃśayaṃ kṣattraparigrahakṣamā yadāryamasyāmabhilāṣi me manaḥ |
satāṃ hi saṃdehapadeṣu vastuṣu pramāṇamantaḥkaraṇapravṛttayaḥ || 37 ||’
atra pūrvārdhoktārthanirdhāraṇarūpā matiruttarārdhenānubadhyate ||
garvo 'nyeṣāma‘abhijñānam’ ghavajñānamātmasaṃbhāvanādibhiḥ || 150 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasya puṣṭiryathā—
‘dhṛtāyudho yāvadahaṃ tāvadanyaiḥ kimāyudhaiḥ |
yadvā na siddhamastreṇa mama tatkena setsyati || 38 ||’
atra karṇasyātmasaṃbhāvanayāśvatthā‘avajñānam’ ka kha manyavajñā prakṛṣyate ||
aheturanivartī‘anivartyāṃ ca’ ka kha ca snehaścittārdratā matā |
tadrūpeṇa ‘rasaniṣpattiryathā’ gharasasya niṣpattiryathā—
‘anena kasyāpi kulāṅa‍kureṇa spṛṣṭasya gātreṣu sukhaṃ mamaitat |
kāṃ nirvṛtiṃ cetasi tasya kuryā- dyasyāyama‘yasyāyamaṅa‍kātkṛtinaḥ prarūḍhaḥ’ṅa‍gātkṛtinaḥ prarūḍhaḥ || 39 ||’
atra duṣyantasya sattvadamanaḥ śakuntalātanayaḥsattvadamanadarśanādutpannastadaṅa‍gasparśasukhādibhiruddīpitaḥ spṛhāmativitarkavāgārambhaiḥ saṃsṛjyamānaḥ sneho niṣpadyate ||
abhīṣṭārthasya saṃprāptau spṛhāparyāptatā dhṛtiḥ | ﻿
tadrūpeṇa ‘rasaniṣpattiryathā’ gharasasya prakarṣo yathā—
‘nīto vikramabāhurātmasamatāṃ prāpteyamurvītale sāraṃ sāgarikā samāgaramahīprāptyekahetuḥ priyā |
devī prītimupāgatā ca bhaginīlābhājjitāḥ ‘kośalāḥ’ khakosalāḥ kiṃ nāsti tvayi satyamātyavṛṣabhe ‘yasmai’ ratnāvalyā mudrite pāṭhaḥyasminkaromi spṛhām || 40 ||’
atra vatsarājasya sarvātmanā manorathasiddhayo dhṛteḥ prakarṣamāvahanti ||
cetonimīlanaṃ vrīḍā‘nvaṅa‍ga’ khanyaṅa‍garāgastavādibhiḥ || 151 ||
tadrūpeṇa ‘rasaṃprakarṣāt’ ka kharasasya prakarṣe krodha‘kopaśokābhyāṃ’ kha śokābhyāṃ saṃkaro yathā—
‘akṣudrārikṛtābhimanyunidha‘nidhanātsaṃkrāntaṃtīvrakudhaḥ’ ka kha naprodbhūtatīvrakrudhaḥ pārthasyākṛtaśātravapratikṛterantaḥśucā muhyataḥ |
kīrṇā bāṣpakaṇaiḥ patanti dhanuṣi vrīḍājaḍā dṛṣṭayo hā vatseti giraḥ sphuranti na punarniryānti kaṇṭhādbahiḥ || 41 ||’
atrārjunasyānyāyenābhimanyuvadhādudbhūtau dīptāveva krodhaśokā‘akṛtavipratīkārotthayā’ ghavudbhūtavipratīkārotthayā tathāvidhayaiva vrīḍayā saṃkīryete | tathāhi krodhaśokayoranubhāvabhūtā dṛṣṭayo vācaśca vrīḍājaḍā‘vrīḍā iti viśeṣaṇāni’ gha iti viśeṣaṇāni saṃbadhyante ||
avahitthaṃ tu lajjāderharṣādyākāragopanam || 152 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasyānubandho yathā—
‘evaṃvādini devarṣau pārśve pituradhomukhī |
līlākamalapattrāṇi gaṇayāmāsa pārvatī || 42 ||’ ﻿
atra—
‘praṇamya śitikaṇṭhāya vibudhāstadanantaram |
caraṇau rañjayantvasyāścūḍāmaṇimarīcibhiḥ || 43 ||’
‘ityādidevarṣivākyādudbhūtaḥ’ dha, ‘ityādermunivākyādudbhūtaḥ’ ka khaityāderdevarṣivākyādudbhūtaḥ‘udbhūtapraharṣākāro’ kha praharṣākāro gurusaṃnidhau lajjitayā līlākamalapatragaṇanavyājena‘gaṇanena’ ka kha gauryā gopyate ||
sukhaduḥkhādijanito mohaścittasya mūḍhatā |
tadrūpeṇa ‘rasasya niṣpattiḥ’ kharasaniṣpattiryathā—
‘kānte talpamupāgate vigalitā nīvī svayaṃ bandhanā- dvāso viślathamekhalāguṇadhṛtaṃ kiṃcinnitambe sthitam |
etāvatsakhi vedmi kevalamahaṃ tasyāṅa‍gasaṅa‍ge punaḥ ‘ko 'sau kāsmi rataṃ nu kiṃ kathamiti’ ka khako 'yaṃ kā vayamatra kiṃ nu surataṃ svalpāpi me na smṛtiḥ 44’
atra sthāyinī ratirmohaniṣpattyā prakṛṣyate ||
saṃmohānandasaṃbhedo madirādikṛto madaḥ || 153 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasya niṣpattiryathā—
‘ghūrṇamānanayanaṃ skhalatkathaṃ khedabindumadakāraṇasmitam |
ānanena na tu tāvadīśvaraścakṣuṣā ciramumāmukhaṃ papau || 45 ||’
atra nayanaghūrṇanākāraṇasmitādayaḥ saṃmohānandasaṃbhedā‘saṃbhedā udbhavanto’ khadudbhavanto madaṃ niṣpādayanti |
manaḥprasādo harṣaḥ syādiṣṭāvāptistavādibhiḥ | ﻿
tadrūpeṇa ‘rasaniṣpattiryathā’ gharasasya prakarṣo yathā—
‘jātasya te piturapīndrajito nihantu- rvatsasya vatsa kati nāma dinānyamūni |
tasyāpyapatyamadhitiṣṭhati ‘vīradharmam’ ghavīradharme diṣṭyā gataṃ daśarathasya kulaṃ pratiṣṭhām || 46 ||’
atra ‘daśarathasya suhṛdaḥ’ ghadaśarathasuhṛdaḥ sumanttrasāratheḥ ‘prabhukulapratiṣṭhā’ khaprabhukulasya pratiṣṭhāmāśaṃsatastatsūnumindrajito hantāraṃ paśyato manorathāvāptyā harṣo niṣpannastadapatye 'pi vīradharmamācariṣṇau prakṛṣṭo diṣṭyetyavyayena sūcyate ||
krodhaḥ ‘kṛtāpakāreghu’ ghakṛtāparādheṣu sthiro 'marṣatvamaśnute || 154 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasya prakarṣo yathā—
‘lākṣāgṛhānalaviṣānnasabhāpraveśaiḥ prāṇeṣu vittanicayeṣu ca naḥ ‘prakṛtya’ ghaprahṛtya |
ākṛṣṭapāṇḍavavadhūparidhānakeśāḥ svasthā bhavanti mayi jīvati dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ || 47 ||’
atra ‘bhīmasya’ ghabhīmasenasya dhārtarāṣṭreṣu svasthā iti nāmno 'pya‘pyasahamānāt’ ghasahanāt lākṣāgṛhādyapakārajanmāmarṣaḥ ‘prakṛṣyate’ ghapratīyate ||
asūyānyaguṇarddhīnāmauddhatyādasahiṣṇutā |
tadrūpeṇa rasasya janma yathā—
‘vandyāste na vicāraṇīyacaritāstiṣṭhantu huṃ vartate sundastrīnidhane 'pyakhaṇḍayaśaso loke mahānto hi te | ﻿
yāni trīṇi ‘trīṇyakutomukhāni’ ka, ‘trīṇyakutobhayāni’ ka ṭippaṇyām, ‘trīṇi kutosukhāni’ khakutomukhānyapi padānyāsankharāyodhane yadvā kauśalamindrasūnudamane‘indrasūnudalane’ ga gha tatrāpyabhijño janaḥ || 48 ||’
atra yadyapi solluṇṭhadoṣakīrtanādibhirjugupsā niṣyadyate tathāpi na tayā svaniṣpattiheturasūyā saṃkīryate ||
īrṣāmāhuḥ samāneṣu mānadānādyamarṣaṇam‘mānadānādyamarṣaṇāt’ ga || 155 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasya prakarṣo yathā—
‘huṃ‘hum’ gha nāsti ṇillajja samosara taṃ ccia‘via’ kha aṇuṇesu jāi de eaṃ |
‘pāagga’ kha pāaggaṃguṭṭhālattaeṇa tilaaṃ viṇimmaviaṃ || 49 ||’
[huṃ nirlajja samapasara tāmevānunaya yasyāsta etat |
pādāgrāṅa‍guṣṭhālaktakena tilakaṃ vinirmitam ||]
atra kasyāścit preyasi sapatnīṃ prasādayituṃ gate tanmānamamṛṣyamāṇāyāḥ samutpannerṣyā priyānunayādibhirbhṛśāyamānatayā niṣpannālaktakatilakānumeyaistatpādapatanādibhiruddīptā huṃkārākṣepabhartsanapratibhedāvinābhūtairbhrūbhaṅa‍gatāḍanāṅa‍gakṣepavepathusvedagadgadādibhiḥ saṃsṛjyamānā prakṛṣyate ||
viṣādaścetaso glānirupāyābhāvanāśayoḥ |
tadrūpeṇa rasasya prakarṣo yathā—
‘vyarthaṃ yatra kapīndrasakhyamapi me kleśaḥ‘vīrya harīṇāṃ vṛthā’ ka kha kapīnāṃ vṛthā prajñāṃ jāmbavato 'pi yatra na gatiḥ putrasya vāyorapi |
mārgaṃ yatra na viśvakarmatanayaḥ kartuṃ nalo 'pi kṣamaḥ saumitrerapi pattriṇāmaviṣayastatra priyā kvāpi me || 50 ||’
﻿
atra sītāsamāgamaviṣaye rāmasya dṛṣṭāvadānasugrīvasakhyāderupāyasyābhāvādviṣādaḥ prakṛṣyate ||
sattvatyāgādanutkarṣo vākyāderdainyamucyate || 156 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasyānubandho yathā—
‘asmānsādhu vicintya saṃyamadhanānuccaiḥ kulaṃ cātmana- stvayyasyāḥ kathamapyabāndhavakṛtāṃ bhāvapravṛttiṃ ca tām |
sāmānyapratipattipūrvakamiyaṃ dāreṣu dṛśyā tvayā bhāgyādhīnamataḥ paraṃ na khalu tadvācyaṃ vadhūbandhubhiḥ || 51 ||’
atra snehaprabhavaṃ pādatrayoktamarthitādainyaṃ turīṃyapādopakṣiptayācñādainyāntareṇānubadhyate ||
vidurvāgdaṇḍapāruṣyamugratāmapakāriṣu |
tadrūpeṇa rasasya prakarṣo yathā—
‘praṇayisakhīsalīlaparihāsarasādhigatai- rlalitaśirīṣapuṣpahananairapi tāmyati yat |
vapuṣi vadhāya tatra tava śastramupakṣipataḥ patatu śirasyakāṇḍayamadaṇḍa ivaiṣa bhujaḥ || 52 ||’
atra mādhavasya prakṛṣṭāpakāriṇyaghoraghaṇṭe viṣaye prakṛṣṭameva vākpāruṣyaṃ daṇḍapāruṣyaṃ ca jāyate ||
trāsaścittacamatkāra ākasmikabhayādibhiḥ || 157 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasya janma yathā—
‘parisphuranmīnavighaṭṭito ravaḥ surāṅa‍ganāsrāsaviloladṛṣṭayaḥ |
upāyayuḥ kampitapāṇipallavāḥ sakhījanasyāpi vilokanīyatām 53’
﻿
atra loladṛṣṭitā karābadhūnanaṃ ca strīṇāṃ svabhāvabhīrutvavilāsitvābhyāmapi bhavatīti trāsāvirbhāve 'pyasamarthamiti nānubangho bhavati ||
aniṣṭābhyāgamotprekṣāṃ śaṅa‍kāmācakṣate budhāḥ |
tadrūpeṇa rasasya prakarṣo yathā—
‘sahasā mā sāhijjaü piāgamo tīa virahakisiāe |
accaṃtapahariseṇa vi jā a muā sā muā ccea || 54 ||’
[sahasā mā sādhyatāṃ priyāgamastayā virahakṛśayā |
atyantapraharṣeṇāpi yā ca mṛtā sā mṛtaiva ||]
atra virahiṇyāḥ kārśyātiśayamudvīkṣamāṇāyāḥ kasyāścidvayasyāyāḥ snehātiśayāt 'prema paśyati bhayānyapade 'pī'ti priyāgamapraharṣātiśayabhāve 'pyasahiṣṇutayā tanmaraṇaśaṅa‍kā prakṛṣyate ||
virahādermanastāpaḥ ‘śarīrāntakado gadaḥ’ khaśarīrātaṅa‍kado gadaḥ || 158 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasya janma yathā—
‘sthitamurasi viśālaṃ padminīpattrametat kathayati na tathāntarmanmathotthāmavasthām |
atiśayaparitāpaglāpitābhyāṃ yathāsyāḥ stanayugapariṇāhaṃ maṇḍalābhyāṃ bravīti || 55 ||’
atra sāgarikāyāḥ stananihitasarojinīdalaglāpanena vapuḥsaṃtāpo niṣpadyate ||
balasyāpacayo glānirādhivyādhiprakarṣabhūḥ |
tadrūpeṇa rasasyānubandho yathā—
‘kisalayamiva mugdhaṃ ‘vandanādvipralūnam’ ghabanghanādvipralūnaṃ hṛdayakusumaśoṣī dāruṇo dīrghaśokaḥ | ﻿
glapayati paripāṇḍukṣāmamasyāḥ śarīraṃ śaradija iva gharmaḥ ketakīgarbhapattram || 56 ||’
atra prakṛṣṭaśokānubandhinī glānirvaivarṇyakṣāmatābhyāmanubadhyate ||
utkaṇṭhāharṣaśokāderunmādaścittaviplavaḥ || 159 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasya janma yathā—
‘‘kvākāryaṃ śaśa lakṣmaṇaḥ’ vikramorvasīye | ‘kvākāryaṃ kva kalākarasya’ ca kha, ‘kva kalādharasya’ ca khakvākāryaṃ kva kalādharasya ca kulaṃ bhūyo 'pi dṛśyeta sā doṣāṇāmupaśāntaye śrutamaho kope 'pi śāntaṃ mukham |
kiṃ vakṣyantyapakalmaṣāḥ kṛtadhiyo rekhaiva‘lekhaiva’ gha sānyādṛśī cetaḥ svāsthyamupaihi kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ dhāsyati 57’
atra virahiṇaḥ purūravasa utkaṇṭhādibhiḥ premaprakarṣādasatpralāparūpa unmādo niṣpadyate ||
ādarātiśayāccetasyāvegaḥ saṃbhramo mataḥ |
tadrūpeṇa rasasya saṃkaro yathā—
‘alamalamatimātraṃ sāhasenāmunā te tvaritamapi vimuñca tvaṃ latāpāśamenam |
calitamiva niroddhuṃ jīvitaṃ jīviteśe kṣaṇamiha mama kaṇṭhe bāhupāśaṃ nidhehi || 58 ||’
atra ratijanmā saṃbhramātiśayo ratijanmanaiva matiprakarṣeṇa saṃkīryate ||
manaḥśarīrayoḥ khedaḥ kriyātiśayataḥ śramaḥ || 160 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasya saṃkaro yathā—
‘skhalayati vacanaṃ te saṃśrayatyaṅa‍gamaṅa‍gaṃ janayati mukhacandrodbhāsinaḥ khedabindūn | ﻿
mukulayati ca netre sarvathā subhru khedastvayi vilasati tulyaṃ ‘mādhavālokanena’ ghavallabhālokanena || 59 ||’
atra mālatyāḥ puṣpāvacayajanmā śramaḥ, mādhavāvalokanajā ca ratiḥ, svedagadgadāṅa‍gasādanayanamukulaistulyadharmiṇau mithaḥ saṃkīryete ||
cittasya khedo nirvedastattvajñānodayādibhiḥ |
tadrūpeṇa rasasya śeṣo yathā—
‘jarāmaraṇadaurgatyavyādhayastāvadāsatām |
manye janmaiva dhīrāṇāṃ bhūyobhūyasttrapākaram || 60 ||’
atra mokṣāyotsahamānasya kasyacinnirvedāvadamo gamyate ||
kriyāsvapāṭavaṃ jāḍyaṃ cintotkaṇṭhābhayādibhiḥ |
tadrūpeṇa rasasya‘rasaniṣpattiḥ’ gha niṣpattiryathā—
‘śithilaśithilaṃ nyasya svairaṃ dhanuḥśikhare śiro nayanasalilaiḥ kurvanmaurvīlatāmaparāmiva |
ahaha vikalaḥ śrutvā śrutvā ghanastanitadhvaniṃ kimapi kimapi dhyāyannāryo na yāti na tiṣṭhati || 61 ||’
atra virahiṇo rāmasya kriyāsvapāṭavaṃ niṣpādyate ||
kriyāvidveṣa ālasyaṃ sukhasaṃvinmadādibhiḥ || 161 ||
tadrūpeṇa rasasya niṣpattiryathā—
‘ghariṇighaṇatthaṇa‘pekkhaṇa’ dhapellaṇasuhelli‘ṇipaḍiassa’ ka khapaḍiassa honta‘honti’ ka khapahiassa |
‘avasaduṇaṃgara’ kha avasaüṇaṅa‍gāraavāraviṭṭhidiahā‘diasā suhāventi’ ka kha suhāventi || 62 ||’
[gṛhiṇīghanastanapreraṇasukhakelipatitasya bhaviṣyatpathikasya |
apaśakunāṅa‍gārakavāraviṣṭidivasāḥ sukhayanti ||] ﻿
atra ratisukhānubhavājjigamiṣorapyagacchata ālasyaṃ niṣpadyate ||
nidrā vyāpāravaimukhyamindriyāṇāṃ śramādibhiḥ |
tadrūpeṇa ‘rasānubandho’ gharasasyānubandho yathā—
‘ṇiddālasapari‘ghuṇṇirataṃ’ kha, ‘ghummirataṃ ga, ‘ghummirata’ ghaghummirataṃsavalantaddha‘saṃvalataddhā’ katāraāloā |
kāmassa vi duvvisahā diṭṭhiṇivāā sasimuhīe || 63 ||’
[nidrāla‘ghūrṇanāsracalanādibhiḥ’ ka, ‘ghūrṇanatryasracalanādibhiḥ’ khasaparighūrṇanaśīlatiryagvaladardhatārakālokāḥ |
kāmasyāpi durviṣahā dṛṣṭinipātāḥ śaśimukhyāḥ ||]
atra ratiśramajāgarādijanitanidrālasā‘nidrālasadṛṣṭinipātāḥ’ ka kha dṛṣṭinipātāstā‘bāhyendriyanimīlanam’ ka kharakāghūrṇanatryasravalanādibhiranubadhyante ||
nidrādijanitaṃ suptamindriyādinimīlanam || 162 ||
tadrūpeṇa ‘rasasya’ ga rasaprakarṣo yathā—
‘osuaï diṇṇa‘paḍivakkhe aṇaṃ’ khapaḍivakkhaveaṇaṃ pasịdhilehiṁ aṅa‍gehiṁ |
ṇivvattiasuraarasāṇubaṃdhasuhaṇibbharaṃ‘nibbharaṃ’ ka soṇhā || 64 ||’
[avasvapiti dattapratipakṣavedanaṃ praśithilairaṅa‍gaiḥ |
nirvartitasuratarasānubandhasukhanirbharaṃ snuṣā ||]
atra nirbharapadenaiva prakarṣaḥ pratipādyate ||
nidrāpagamahetubhyaḥ prabodhaścetanāgamaḥ |
tadrūpeṇa rasasyānubandho yathā—
‘pratyagronmeṣajihmā kṣaṇamanabhimukhī ratnadīṃpaprabhāṇāmātmavyāpāragurvī janitajalalavājṛmbhaṇaiḥ sāṅa‍gabhaṅa‍gaiḥ | ﻿
‘nāgāṅa‍gaṃ’ ka khanāgāṅa‍kaṃ moktumicchoḥ śayanamuruphaṇācakravālopadhānaṃ nidrācchedābhitāmrā‘nidrācchedātitāmrā’ ka kha ciramavatu harerdṛṣṭirākekarā vaḥ || 65 ||’
atra dṛṣṭeḥ pratyagronmeṣajihmatādibhiḥ prabodho nādyāpi niṣpadyata iti pratīyate ||
uktā bhāvādibhedena te 'mī ratyādayo rasāḥ |
athaiteṣveva keṣāṃcidviśeṣānabhidadhmahe || 163 ||
tatra
śṛṅa‍gāravīrakaruṇaraudrādbhutabhayānakāḥ |
bībhatsahāsyapreyāṃsaḥ śāntadāntoddhatā rasāḥ || 164 ||
ratirnisargasaṃsargaupamyādhyātmābhiyogajā |
saṃprayogābhimānotthā viṣayotthā ca kathyate || 165 ||
prītirapyevameva syānna tvasyāṃ sāṃprayogikī |
‘abhyāsikī’ ka, ‘anyāsikī’ khaābhyāsikī tu tatsthāne tadudāhṛtayo yathā || 166 ||
‘mṛteti pretya saṃgantuṃ yayā me maraṇaṃ matam |
saivāvantī mayā labghā kathamatraiva janmani || 66 ||’
atra sthāyino vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogādrasaniṣpattiriti ratireva śṛṅa‍gārarūpeṇa niṣpadyate | atrāvantyā vāsavadattāyā ālambanavibhāvabhūtāyāḥ sakāśādutpanno vatseśvarasya ratisthāyibhāvaḥ, tasyāḥ punarjīvanādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamāno mṛtetyādinā vāgārambhānubhāvenānumīyamānairharṣadhṛtiprabhṛtibhiḥ sukhātmakairvyabhicāribhiḥ saṃsṛjyamānaḥ karuṇānantaraḥ saṃbhogaḥ śṛṅa‍gārākhyāṃ labhate ||﻿
‘ajitvā sārṇavāmurvīmaniṣṭa‍vā vividhairmakhaiḥ |
adattvā cārthamarthibhyo bhaveyaṃ pārthivaḥ katham || 67 ||’
atra vasudhāvijayāderālambanavibhāvādutpannaḥ sthāyyutsāhabhāvaḥ sthairyadhairyādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaiḥ samutpanneṣu vāgārambhānumīyamāneṣu smṛtimativitarkādiṣu niṣpanno vīrarasasaṃjñayā vyavahriyate ||
‘yasyāḥ kusumaśayyāpi komalāṅa‍gyā rujākarī |
sādhiśete kathaṃ devī hutāśanavatīṃ citām || 68 ||’
atra cālambanavibhāvabhūtadevīmaraṇādutpannaḥ śokaḥ sthāyibhāvaścitāniveśanahutāśanāṅa‍gajvālādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamāno vāgārambhānumeyairnirvedaglānivaivarṇyādibhirvyabhicāribhiḥ saṃsṛjyamānaḥ karuṇa iti jñāyate ||
‘nigṛhya keśeṣvākṛṣṭā kṛṣṇā yena mamāgrataḥ |
so 'yaṃ duḥśāsanaḥ pāpo lavdhaḥ kiṃ jīvati kṣaṇam || 69 ||’
atra duḥśāsanālambanavibhāvāya krudhyato bhīmasenasya pūrvamutpannaḥ krodhaḥ sthāyibhāvastadavāpteḥ smaryamāṇasamakṣakṛtadraupadīnigrahakeśakarṣaṇādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ samutpanneṣu vāgārambhānumīyamāneṣvasūyāvegavepathuśramādiṣu duḥkhātmakeṣu vyabhicāriṣu ‘niṣpādyamāno’ khanippadyamāno raudra iti niṣpadyate ||
‘aṃśukāni pravālāni puṣpaṃ hārādibhūṣaṇam |
phalaṃ madhūni harmyāṇi śākhā nandanaśākhinām || 70 ||’
atra śākhināṃ pravālapuṣpaphalaśākhāsaṃpannaṃ nijaṃ rūpaṃ nandanaśākhināṃ punaḥ pravālādisthāne‘pravālādisthāneṃśukahāra’ ka khaṣvaṃśukahāramadhumandirāṇi tadetadāścaryam | ataścaitebhya ālambanavibhāvebhyaḥ kasyaciddevabhūyaṃgatasya samutpanno vismayaḥ‘vismayasthāyibhāvaḥ’ ka kha﻿
sthāyibhāvastadīyāvayavadarśanādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ samutpanneṣu vāgārambhānumeyeṣu harṣaromodgamakhedagadgadādiṣu vyabhicāriṣu niṣpadyamāno 'dbhuta ityucyate ||
‘idaṃ maghonaḥ kuliśaṃ dhārāsaṃnihitānalam |
smaraṇaṃ yasya daityastrīgarbhapātāya kalpate || 71 ||’
atra mahendrakuliśāddhārāsaṃnihitānalādālamba‘saṃnihitānalālambana’ khanavibhāvātsmaryamāṇādapi daityastrīṇāmutpanno ‘bhayasthāyibhāvaḥ’ ka khabhayasthāyibhāvastadvidīrṇadānavamaraṇasmaraṇādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ ‘sagarbhapātādibhiḥ’ dhasvagarbhapātādibhiranubhāvādibhistadanumitaiśca svedastambhavepathuprabhṛtibhirvyabhicāribhiḥ saṃsṛjyamāno bhayānakarasarūpeṇa niṣpannaḥ kenacidākhyāyamāno 'pi bhayānaka ityākhyāyate ||
‘pāyaṃ pāyaṃ tavārīṇāṃ śoṇitaṃ ‘karasampuṭaiḥ’ ka khapāṇisaṃpuṭaiḥ |
kauṇapāḥ saha nṛtyanti kabandhairanttrabhūṣaṇāḥ || 72 ||’
atrālambanavibhāvabhūtebhyaḥ kauṇapebhyaḥ kasyaci‘ripuvijayāśaṃsinaḥ’ khadripujayaśaṃsinaḥ puṃsa utpanno jugupsāsthāyibhāvaḥ śiraśchedavigaladrudhiraghārāparipluta‘pravartita’ khapraṇartitakabandhakauṇapānttrabhūṣaṇaśoṇitapānādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ samutpanneṣu ‘vyabhicārādiṣu’ kavāgārambhānumeyeṣu bhayāveśaśaṅa‍kāvahitthādiṣu vyabhicāriṣu niṣpanno bībhatsa iti nigadyate ||
‘idamamlānamānāyā lagnaṃ stanataṭe tava |
chādyatāmuttarīyeṇa navaṃ nakhapadaṃ sakhi || 73 ||’ ﻿
atra kācit sakhīṃ pūrvaṃ bhartari ‘pragṛhītamānāṃ’ ka khagṛhītamānāṃ tenaiva nakha‘padāṅkitastanām’ khapadāṅkitastanīmālambanavibhāvabhūtāmupalabhamānāyāḥ kasyāścitsakhyā utpanno hāsaḥ sthāyibhāvastadīyamānaparigrahasmaraṇādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ samutpanneṣu vāgārambhānumiteṣu śaṅa‍kāvahitthagadgadādivyabhicāriṣu ‘niṣpādyamāno’ kaniṣpadyamāno hāsyaśabdenābhidhīyate ||
‘yadeva rocate mahyaṃ tadeva kurute priyā |
iti vetti na ‘jānāmi’ khajānāti ‘yatpriyaṃ tatkaroti sā’ ka khatatpriyaṃ yatkaroti sā || 74 ||’
atra vatsalaprakṛterdhīratayā lalitanāyakasya ‘priyānubhāva’ ka khapriyālambanavibhāvādutpannaḥ ‘snehasthāyibhāvo’ ka snehasthāyibhāvo viṣayasaukumāryātmaprakṛtyādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ samupajāyamānairmoha‘mohamatidhṛtismṛti’ ka khadhṛtismṛtyādibhirvyabhicāribhāvairanubhāvaiśca‘praśaṃsādibhiḥ’ ityadhikaḥ pāṭhaḥ ka kha saṃsṛjyamāno niṣpannaḥ preyāniti pratīyate ||
ratiprītyorapi cāyameva mūlaprakṛtiriṣyate | yaditthamāhuḥ—
‘ahetuḥ pakṣapāto yastasya nāsti pratikriyā |
sa hi snehātmakastanturantarmarmāṇi sīvyati || 75 ||
sarvāḥ saṃpattayastasya saṃtuṣṭaṃ yasya mānasam |
upānadgṛḍhapādasya nanu ‘carmāvṛtaiva’ ka khacarmāstṛtaiva bhūḥ || 76 ||’
atra kasyacidupaśāntaprakṛterdhīraśā‘dhīrapraśānta’ ka khantanāyakasya yathopanatamanonukūladārādisaṃpatterālambanavibhāvabhūtāyāḥ samutpanno dhṛtisthāyibhāvo vastutattvālocanādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamānaḥ samupajāyamāna‘smṛtimatyāsatyā’ ka 'smṛtimatyādibhiḥ’ khasmṛtyādibhirvyabhi-﻿
cāribhāvairvāgārambhādibhiranuṣajyamāno niṣpannaḥ śānta ityabhigīyate‘iti gīyate’ ka kha ||
anye punarasya śamaṃ prakṛtimāmananti sa tu dhṛtereva viśeṣo bhavati ||
‘sādhāraṇyānnirātaṅa‍kaḥ kanyāmanyo 'pi yācate |
kiṃ punarjagatāṃ jetā prapautraḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ || 77 ||’
atra rāmasyodāttaprakṛternisargata eva tattvābhiniveśinī matirnākṛtyaviṣaye pravartate, na ca pravṛttopāramati, sā ca sīteyaṃ mama svīkārayogyetyevaṃrūpeṇa ‘pravṛttoparamati’ ka khapravṛttā rāvaṇaprārthanālakṣmaṇaprotsāhanābhyāmuddīpyamānā samupajāyamānacintāvitarkavrīḍāvahitthasmṛtyādibhiḥ kālocitottarānumīyamānaiśca vivekacāturyaudāryadhairyādibhiḥ ‘saṃsṛjyamāna udāttarasarūpeṇa’ kasaṃsṛjyamānodāttarasarūpeṇa niṣpadyate ||
‘apakartāhamasmīti mā te manasi bhūdbhayam |
vimukheṣu na me khaṅa‍gaḥ prahartuṃ jātu vāñchati || 78 ||’
atra mayāsyāpakāraḥ kṛta iti ‘yatte cetasi bhayam’ khayaccetasi bhayaṃ tanmābhūt ‘na mama khaṅa‍gaḥ parāṅyukheṣu kadācidapi prahartumutsahata’ ka kha gaparāṅyukheṣu me khaṅa‍gaḥ kadācidapi na prahartumutsahate’ iti sarvadaiva rụ̄dho 'haṃkāraḥ pratīyate | so 'yaṃ garvaprakṛtiruddhato nāma rasaḥ | kecit punaḥ—
‘āsthāmālambya nīteṣu vaśaṃ kṣudreṣvarātiṣu |
vyaktimāyāti mahatāṃ māhātmyamanukampayā || 79 ||’
ityevamūrjakhītyudāttapakṣe nikṣipantaḥ pūrvoktameva garvaprakarṣodāharaṇaṃ dhṛtāyudho yāvadahamityādyuddhataniṣpattau varṇayanti ||
rativiśeṣeṣu naisargikī yathā—
‘iyaṃ mahendraprabhṛtīnadhiśriyaścaturdigīśānavamanya‘avamatya māninī’ ka kha māninī |
arūpahāryaṃ madanasya nigrahātpinākapāṇiṃ patimāptumicchati || 80 ||’ ﻿
atra janmāntaravāsanayā nisargata iyaṃ bhavati ||
sāṃsargikī yathā—
‘bhittvā sadyaḥ kisalayapuṭān devadārudrumāṇāṃ ye tatkṣīrasrutisurabhayo dakṣiṇena pravṛttāḥ |
āliṅgyante guṇavati mayā te tuṣārādrivātāḥ pūrvaspṛṣṭaṃ‘pūrvaṃ spṛṣṭam’ ka kha yadi kila bhavedaṅa‍gamebhistaveti || 81 ||’
atra śaityasaurabhādibhirvirahija‘virahiṇa udvejanīyā’ ka khanodvejanīyā api vāyavaḥ priyatamāṅa‍gasaṃsargasaṃbhāvanayā ‘samāliṅgyanta iti saṃsargādiyaṃ ratibhavati’ ka khasamāśliṣyanta iti saṃsargata iyaṃ bhavati ||
aupamānikī yathā—
‘api janakasutāyāstacca taccānurūpaṃ sphuṭamiha śiśuyugme naipuṇonneyamasti |
nanu punariva tanme gocarībhūtamakṣṇo- rabhinavaśatapattraśrīmadāsyaṃ‘śatapattragrīva’ ka priyāyāḥ || 82 ||’
seyaṃ sītāviṣayiṇī ratistadupamānadarśanena rāmaṃ ‘ramayate’ ka kharamayati ||
ādhyātmikī yathā—
‘kāmaṃ‘kāmaṃ pratyādiṣṭam’ ka pratyādiṣṭāṃ smarāmi na parigrahaṃ munestanayām |
balavattu dūyamānaṃ pratyāyayatīva me cetaḥ || 83 ||’
atra seyaṃ durvāsasaḥ śāpādvismṛtavivāhādivṛttāntasya duṣyantasya śakuntalāyāṃ ratiradhyātmaṃ bhavati ||
ābhiyogikī yathā—
‘alasavalitamugdhasnigghaniṣpandamandairadhikavikasadantarvismayasmeratārai; |
hṛdayamaśaraṇaṃ‘hṛdayamaśaraṇaṃ me’ ka me pakṣmalākṣyāḥ kāṭākṣairapahṛtamapaviddhaṃ pītamunmūlitaṃ ca || 84 ||’
seyamanurāgātiśayasūcakamālatīkaṭākṣābhiyoge mādhavasya ‘ratirevotpadyate’ ka kharatiratīvotpadyate ||
sāṃprayogikī yathā—
‘unnamayya sakacagrahamāsyaṃ cumbati priyatame haṭhavṛttyā |
huṃhuṁ muñca mamameti ca mandaṃ jalpitaṃ jayati mānadhanāyāḥ || 85 ||’
atra tarjanārtha—mokṣārtha—vāraṇārthānāṃ mandaṃ mandaṃ prayogānmānavatyāḥ saṃprayoge ratyutpattiḥ pratīyate ||
ābhimānikī yathā—
‘iyaṃ gehe lakṣmīriyamamṛtavartirnayanayo- rasāvasyāḥ sparśo vapuṣi ‘bahulaḥ’ khabahalaścandanarasaḥ |
ayaṃ bāhuḥ kaṇṭhe śiśiramasṛṇo‘śiśirasamṛṇo’ gha mauktikasaraḥ kimasyā na preyo yadi paramasahyastu virahaḥ || 86 ||’
atra ruciviśeṣo 'bhimānastata evaṃprāyā ratayo bhavanti ||
‘vaiṣayikī śabdeṣu yathā’ kavaiṣayikīṣu śabde yathā—
‘vilāsamasṛṇollasanmusalaloladoṣkandalīparasparapariskhaladvalayaniḥkhanodbandhurāḥ |
lasanti kalahuṃkṛtiprasabha‘kampitoraḥsthalī’ khakampitoraḥsthala‘luṭadgamakasaṃkulāḥ’ khatruṭadgamakasaṃkulāḥ ‘kalamakaṇḍanī’ ghakalamakaṇḍanīgītayaḥ || 87 ||’
sparśe yathā—
‘badhnannaṅa‍geṣu romāñcaṃ kurvanmanasi nirvṛtim |
netre nimīlayanneṣa priyāsparśaḥ pravartate || 88 ||’
rūpe yathā—
‘tā rāghavaṃ dṛṣṭibhirāpibantyo nāryo na jagmurviṣayāntarāṇi |
tathā hi śeṣendriyavṛttirāsāṃ sarvātmanā cakṣuriva praṃviṣṭā 89’
rase yathā—
‘kasya no kurute ‘tanvi’ ka khamugdhe pipāsākulitaṃ manaḥ |
ayaṃ te vidrumacchāyo marumārga ivādharaḥ || 90 ||’
‘gandho yathā’ kha gandhe yathā—
‘randhaṇakammaṇiuṇie mā jūrasu‘mā ūra su’ ka, ‘mā surasu’ kha rattapāḍalasuandham |
muhamāruaṃ pianto dhūmāi sihī ṇa pajjalaï || 91 ||’
[randhanakarmanipuṇike mā ‘mā khidyasva’ iti gha-pustake cchāyākradhyasva raktapāṭalasugandham |
mukhamārutaṃ piban dhūmāyate śikhī na prajvalati ||]
prītiviśeṣeṣu naisargikī yathā—
‘ālakṣya dantamukulāna‘nimittasārān’ ka, ‘nimittahāsaiḥ’ khanimittahāsā- navyaktavarṇaramaṇīyavacaḥphrvṛttīn |
aṅa‍kāśrayapraṇayinastanayānvahanto dhanyāstadaṅa‍garajasā ‘paruṣībhavanti’ ga malinībhavanti || 92 ||’
‘atra yadā ratirjāyate tadā putreṣu snihyati’ khaatra yadā yadā ratirjāyate tadā tadā putreṣu snihyati putrarūpeṇa vā jāyata iti janmāntaravāsanārūpo nisargaḥ saṃgacchate ||
sāṃsargikī yathā—
‘viśvaṃbharā bhagavatī bhavatīmasūta rājā prajāpatisamo janakaḥ pitā te |
teṣāṃ vadhūstvamasi nandini pārthivānāṃ yeṣāṃ ‘kuleṣu’ ka khakule ca savitā ca gururvayaṃ ca || 93 ||’
atra viśvaṃbharādisaṃsargāt sītāyāṃ vasiṣṭhamiśrāḥ snihyanti |
aupamānikī yathā—
‘kuvalayadalasnigdhaśyāmaḥ śikhaṇḍakamaṇḍano baṭupariṣadaṃ puṇyaśrīkaḥ śriyaiva sabhājayan |
punariva śiśurbhūtvā vatsaḥ sa me raghunandano jhaṭiti kurute dṛṣṭaḥ ko 'yaṃ dṛśoramṛtāñjanam || 94 ||’
atra rāmaupamyāllave janakaḥ prīyate ||
ādhyātmikī yathā—
‘paritastaṃ pṛthāsūnuḥ snehena paritastare |
avijñāte 'pi bandhau hi balātprahlādate‘prahnādate’ gha manaḥ || 95 ||’
atrāvijñāto 'pi vāsavaḥ svasūnumarjunaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ prīṇayati ||
ābhiyogikī yathā—
‘‘duḥkhaikabandhu’ ka khaajñātabandhurayamṛkṣaharīśvaro me paulastya eṣa samareṣu puraḥ prahartā |
ityādṛtena kathitau raghunandanena ‘vyutkramya’ ka kha gavyutkrāntalakṣmaṇamubhau bharato vavande || 96 ||’
atra sītānveṣaṇāderabhiyogādrāmasya sugrīvabibhīṣaṇayoḥ prītirudayate‘rutpadyate’ ka kha | sāṃprayogikīsthāne ābhyāsikī yathā—
‘iti vismṛtānyakaraṇīyamātmanaḥ sacivāvalambitadhuraṃ narādhipam |
parivṛddharāgamanubaddhasevayā mṛgayā jahāra catureva kāminī || 97 ||’
atra
‘śabdādibhyo bahirbhūtā yā karmābhyāsalakṣaṇā |
prītiḥ sābhyāsikī jñeyā mṛgayādiṣu karmasu ||’
iti lakṣaṇaṃ ghaṭate ||
ābhimānikī yathā—
‘dattendrābhayadakṣiṇairbhagavato vaivasvatādāmano- rdṛptānāṃ dahanāya dīpitanijakṣāttrapratāpāgnibhiḥ |
ādityairyadi vigraho nṛpatibhirdhanyaṃ mamaitattato dīptāstrasphuradugra‘dīdhitibharainīṃrājitajyaṃ’ ka khadīdhitiśikhānīrājitajyaṃ dhanuḥ || 98 ||’
atrābhimatapratidvandvilābhāllavānupadī kuśastuṣyati ||
‘vaiṣayikī yathā—’ kavaiṣayikīṣu śabde yathā—
‘lāvaṇyaiḥ kṣaṇadāvirāmamadhurāḥ kiṃcidvinidrālasa‘vinidrālasaṃ’ ka khaśrotraiḥ savraṇamugdhacāraṇavadhūdantacchadāvāsinaḥ |
pīyante mṛdutrakrapītamarutaḥ paurāṇarītikrama‘gītikrama’ ka khavyālolāṅa‍guliruddhaśukta‘mukta’ ka khasuṣiraśreṇīravā‘śreṇīdharā’ ka kha veṇavaḥ || 99 ||’
sparśe yathā—
‘praśāntagharmābhibhavaḥ śanairvivānvilāsinībhyaḥ parimṛṣṭapaṅa‍kajaḥ |
dadau bhujālambamivāttaśīkarastaraṅa‍gamālāntaragocaro 'nilaḥ || 100 ||’
rupe yathā—
‘ayamabhinavameghaśyāmalottuṅa‍gasānu- rmadamukharamayūrīmu‘baddhaviśrabdhanṛtyaḥ’ ghaktasaṃsaktakekaḥ |
śakuniśabalanīḍānokahasnigdhavarṣmā vitarati bṛhadaśmā parvataḥ prītimakṣṇoḥ || 101 ||’
rase yathā—
‘ikṣudaṇḍasya maṇḍasya dadhnaḥ piṣṭakṛtasya‘piṣṭaghṛtasya’ ka kha ca |
‘varāhasya’ ka khavarāhasya ca māṃsasya so 'yaṃ gacchati phālgunaḥ || 102 ||’
gandhe yathā—
‘kapolakaṇḍūḥ karibhirvinetuṃ vighaṭṭitānāṃ saraladrumāṇām |
yatra ‘snuta’ gasrutakṣīratayā prasūtaḥ sānūni ganghaḥ surabhīkaroti || 103’
upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat | tenotsāhasya yuddhadānadayāvīrādayaḥ, krodhasya
‘bhīmamanyutrāsādayaḥ’ ka khabhāmamanyūtprāsādayaḥ, hāsasya smitahasitavihasitādayaḥ, ‘prasuptapralayamatyādīnāṃ’ ka khasuptapralayamatyādīnāṃ tu‘tu’ kha ka pustakayornāsti svapnamaraṇaśamādayo bhedā jāyante | tatra yadyapi ‘ajitvā sārṇavāmurvīm’ ityanena yuddhavīraḥ, ‘aniṣṭa‍vā vividhairmakhaiḥ’ ityanena dānavīraḥ, ‘adattvā cārthamarthibhyaḥ’ ityanena dayāvīraścotsāharūpeṇa niṣpattau varṇitaḥ‘rasaniṣpattau vartate’ ka kha, ‘tathāpyekaśo 'pyetadrasaniṣpattirastīti pradarśyante’ ka khatathāpyekaśo 'pyete rasaniṣpattyai prabhavantīti pradarśyante ||
teṣu yuddhavīro yathā—
‘etāṃ paśya ‘purastaṭī’ ka kha puraḥsthalīmiha kila krīḍākirāto haraḥ kodaṇḍena kirīṭinā sarabhasaṃ cūḍāntare tāḍitaḥ |
ityākarṇya kathādbhutaṃ himanidhāvadrau subhadrāpate- rmandaṃ mandamakāri yena nijayordordaṇḍayormaṇḍanam 104’
dānavīro yathā—
‘dadhikṣīraghṛtāmbhodhivyañjanaspṛhaṇīyayā |
mahādānotsave yasya hantakārāyitaṃ bhuvā || 105 ||’
dayāvīro yathā—
‘sa tvaṃ madīyena śarīravṛttiṃ dehena nirvartayituṃ yatasva |
dināvasānotsukabālavatsā vimucyatāṃ dhenuriyaṃ maharṣeḥ || 106 ||’
krodhasya yadyapi ‘bhīkādayo’ ka , ‘krodhasya bhīmādayo’ kha bhāmādayo ‘mānabhedāḥ’ ityasya ‘viśeṣāḥ’ iti ṭippaṇarūpeṇa gha, ‘viśeṣāḥ’ ka khamānabhedāścaturviṃśatiḥ saṃbhavanti tathāpi lalitālalitobhayabhedena rūpeṇa krameṇa sarvasaṃgrahāttatra traya eva prakārāḥ pradarśyante ||
teṣu strīṇāṃ ‘lalitaḥ kopābhāvo yathā’ ka khalalitakopo bhāmo yathā—
‘bhrūbhedibhiḥ prakampauṣṭhairlalitāṅa‍gulitarjanaiḥ |
yatra kopaiḥ kṛtā srīṇāṃ saṃprasādārthinaḥ priyāḥ || 107 ||’
priyāparādhajanmā duḥkhotpīḍo manyuryathā—
‘dhaṇuovappaṇavallariviraïakaṇṇāvaaṃsaduppecche |
vāhaguruā‘vāhagaruī’ ka kha ‘nisammaï’ ghaṇisammaï vāhīea bahumuhe diṭṭhī || 108 ||’
[dhanudhanvapanavallarīviracitakarṇāvataṃsaduṣprekṣye |
bāṣpagurukā niśāmyati bādhyā vadhūmukhe dṛṣṭiḥ ||]
nanviyamīrṣyā kasmānna bhavati, nātra ‘mānadānāmarṣaṇamātraṃvivakṣā’ ka khamānadānāmarṣamātraṃ vivakṣitamapi tu tajjanito duḥkhātiśaya iti ||
priyādiṣu vyājanindotprāso yathā—
‘pahavaṃti ccia‘vvia’ ka purisā mahilāṇaṃ kiṃ ‘khu’ ka khatha suhaa vihiosi |
‘lolliāe’ ka kha aṇurāaṇolliāe ko doso ‘apahajāie’ ka , ‘āhijāie’ kha āhijāīe || 109 ||’
[prabhavantyeva puruṣā mahilānāṃ kimatra subhaga vihito 'si |
anurāganoditāyāḥ ko doṣa ābhijātyāyāḥ ||]
hāsasya yadyapyupahāsādayo bhedāḥ saṃbhavanti tathāpi vihasitena teṣāṃ ‘apasaṃgrahāt’ khasaṃgrahādīṣannyūnādhikamiti ‘trayastriśadbhedāḥ’ ghatrayastadbhedā udāhriyante—
tatreṣaddhasitaṃ smitaṃ yathā—
‘puṣpaṃ pravālopahitaṃ yadi syānmuktāphalaṃ vā sphuṭavidrumastham |’
tato 'nukuryādviśadasya tasyāstāmrauṣṭhaparyastarucaḥ smitasya || 110 ||’
dṛṣṭadaśanakānti hasitaṃ yathā—
‘timiraniruddhabhīmarajanīmukhacandrikayā ‘gaṇayati’ khagaṇapatitāṇḍavābhinayadarśanadīpikayā |
abhibhavasi tvamadya śaśinaḥ ‘śriyamutkaṇṭhayā’ khaśriyamutkaṭayā daśanamayūkhamañjaritayā hasitaprabhayā || 111 ||’
tadeva saviśeṣaṃ ‘vihasitam’ ka khahasitaṃ yathā—
‘cyutāmindorlekhāṃ ratikalahabhagnaṃ ca valayaṃ dva‍yaṃ cakrīkṛtya prahasitamukhī‘prahasitavatī’ gha śailatanayā |
avocadyaṃ paśyetyavatu sa śivaḥ sā ca girijā sa ca krīḍācandro daśanakiraṇāpūritatanuḥ || 112 ||’
suptaviśeṣaḥ svapno yathā—
‘jāne kopaparāṅmukhī priyatamā svapne 'dya dṛṣṭā mayā mā mā saṃspṛśa pāṇineti rudatī gantuṃ pravṛttā puraḥ |
no yāvatparirabhya cāṭukaśatairāśvāsayāmi priyāṃ‘kṣaṇaṃ’ ka kha bhrātastāvadahaṃ śaṭhena vidhinā nidrādaridrīkṛtaḥ || 113 ||’
mūrcchāviśeṣo maraṇaṃ yathā—
‘kṣaṇamātrasakhīṃ sujātayoḥ stanayostāmavalokya vihvaṃlā |
nimimīla narendrasundarī hṛtacandrā tamaseva śarvarī || 114 ||’
mativiśeṣaḥ ‘svapno yathā’ ‘narottamapriyā’ S.P. Pandit saṃpādite raghuvaṃśeśamo yathā—
‘yadāsīdajñānaṃ smaratimirasaṃskārajanitaṃ tadā dṛṣṭaṃ nārīmayamidamaśeṣaṃ jagaditi |
idānīmasmākaṃ paṭutaravivekāñjanajuṣāṃ samībhūtā dṛṣṭistribhuvanamapi brahma manute || 115 ||’
evamanye 'pi vijñeyā ‘rasābhavādi’ ka kharasabhāvādisaṃśrayāḥ |
viśeṣāḥ prāptakālo 'tha ‘pariśeṣo’ ka, ‘paripoṣo’ khapariśeṣo ‘nigadyate’ ka khanidarśyate || 167 ||
tatrāśrayastridhā—pumān—strī—tiryagādayaḥ ||
teṣu pumān yathā—
‘āścaryamutpaladṛśo vadanāmalendu- sāṃnidhyato mama muhurjaḍimānametya |
jātyena‘jāḍyena’ kha candramaṇineva mahīdharasya saṃdhāryate dravamayo manasā vikāraḥ || 116 ||’
strī yathā—
‘tenātha nātha durudāharaṇātapena‘duradāharaṇātapena’ kha saumyāpi nāma paruṣatvamabhiprapannā |
jajvāla tīkṣṇaviśadāḥ sahasodgirarantī‘sahasodgirantīḥ’ ka gha vāgarciṣastapanakāntaśileva sītā || 117 ||’
tiryagādiṣu yathā—
‘utkūjati śvasiti muhyati yāti tīraṃ tīrāttaruṃ tarutalātpunareti‘punareva’ ka kha vāpīm |
vāpyāṃ na rajyati na cātti mṛṇālakhaṇḍaṃ cakraḥ kṣapāsu virahe khalu cakravākyāḥ || 118 ||’
viṣayastridhā—cetanaḥ, tiryagū, acetanaśca ||
teṣu cetano yathā—
‘iyaṃ sā lolākṣī tribhuvanalalāmaikavasatiḥ sa cāyaṃ duṣṭātmā svasurapakṛtaṃ yena mama tat |
itastīvraḥ kāmo gururayamitaḥ krodhadahanaḥ kṛto veṣaścāyaṃ kathamidamiti bhrāmyati manaḥ || 119 ||’
tiryagū yathā—
‘āyāte dayite marusthalabhuvāṃ ‘udvīkṣya’ subhāṣitāvalau, ‘utprekṣya’ śārṅa‍garadharapaddhatausaṃcintya durlaṅa‍ghyatāṃ ‘tanvaṅa‍ga‍yā’ subhāṣitāvalau, ‘gehinyāḥ’ khagehinyā paritoṣabāṣpataralāmāsajya dṛṣṭiṃ ‘mayi’ ka khamukhe |
dattvā pīluśamīkarīrakavalān ‘lolāñcalena’ śārṅa‍gadharapaddhatausvenāñcalenādarā- dunmṛṣṭaṃ karabhasya kesarasaṭābhārāgralagnaṃ‘bhārāvalagnaṃ rajaḥ’ subhāṣitāvalau rajaḥ || 120 ||’
acetano yathā—
‘kṣiptaṃ puro na jagṛhe muhurikṣukāṇḍaṃ nāpekṣate sma nikaṭopagatāṃ kareṇum |
sasmāra vāraṇapatiḥ parimīlitākṣa- micchāvihāravanavāsamahotsavānām‘mahotsavāntam’ kha || 121 ||’
jñānaṃ tridhā—dṛṣṭam, śrutam, anumānajaṃ ca ||
teṣu dṛṣṭaṃ yathā—
‘sarasijamanuviddhaṃ śaivalenāpi ramyaṃ malinamapi himāṃśorlakṣma lakṣmīṃ tanoti |
iyamadhikamanojñā valkalenāpi tanvī kimiva hi madhurāṇāṃ ‘maṇḍanena’ ga maṇḍanaṃ nākṛtīnām || 122 ||’
śrutaṃ yathā—
‘kiṃ rūpaṃ sphuṭameva sā śaśimukhī dhatte tadatyadbhutaṃ māmutsāhayituṃ parāpakaraṇe cittaṃ kimasmatsvasuḥ |
ityantarvikasadvitarkavidhuraṃ cetastathā vartate svalpo 'pyeṣa mama prayāti purataḥ panthā yathā dīrghatām 123’
anumānaṃ yathā—
‘śāntamidamāśramapadaṃ sphurati ca bāhuḥ kutaḥ phalamihāsya |
athavā bhavitavyānāṃ dvārāṇi bhavanti sarvatra || 124 ||’
saṃskārastridhā—ādṛtaḥ, paṭuḥ, abhyastaśceti‘iti’ ityadhikaṃ kha | tatrāśrayaguṇenādarapratyayādutpanna‘ādarādutpanna’ ka kha ādṛto yathā—
‘kanyāratnamayonijanma bhavatāmāste vayaṃ cārthino ratnaṃ yatkvacidasti‘cetkvacidasti’ mudritamahāvīracarite tatpariṇamatyasmāsu śakrādapi |
kanyāyāśca parārthataiva hi matā tasyāḥ pradānādahaṃ bandhurvo bhavitā pulastyapulahapraṣṭhāśca saṃbandhinaḥ || 125 ||’
viṣayaguṇena paṭupratyayādutpannaḥ paṭuryathā—
‘utpattirdevayajanādbrahmavādī nṛpaḥ pitā |
suprasannojjvalā mūrtirasyāḥ‘mūrtirasyāṃ sneha’ mudritamahāvīracarite snehaṃ karoti me || 126 ||’
jñānapaunaḥ‘paunaḥpunyena’ ga ghapunyenābhyāsapratyayādutpanno 'bhyastaḥ ||
sa yathā—
‘bhūyo bhūyaḥ savidhanagarīrathyayā paryaṭantaṃ dṛṣṭa‍vā dṛṣṭa‍vā bhavanavalabhītuṅa‍gavātāyanasthā |
sākṣātkāmaṃ navamiva ratirmālatī mādhavaṃ yadgạ̄dhotkaṇṭhālulitalulitairaṅa‍gakaistāmyatīti || 127 ||’
atra yadyapi viṣayaguṇāt paṭuḥ, āśrayaguṇādāhato 'pi‘ccādṛto 'pi’ ka kha pratyayaḥ, paṭumāhataṃ ca‘ca’ ka kha nāsti saṃskāraṃ ‘prasūyate’ ka khaprasūte tathāpyabhyāsātpaṭīyānāhatatamaśca jāyamāno 'bhyasta ityucyate ||
uddīpanavibhāveṣu mālyavastravibhūṣaṇādayo mālyādayaḥ ||
teṣu mālyaṃ yathā—
‘aśokanirbhartsitapadmarāgamākṛṣṭahemadyutikarṇikāram‘karnikāram’ kha |
muktākalāpīkṛtasindhuvāraṃ vasantapuṣpābharaṇaṃ vahantī || 128 ||’
vastraṃ yathā—
‘āvarjitā kiṃcidiva stanābhyāṃ vāso vasānā taruṇārkarāgam |
sujātapuṣpastabakāvanamrā‘stavakāvananrasaṃcāriṇī’ ka saṃcāriṇī pallavinī lateva || 129 ||’
vibhūṣaṇaṃ yathā—
‘kaṇṭhasya tasyāḥ stanabandhurasya muktākalāpasya ca ‘nistulasya’ ka nistalasya |
anyonyaśobhājananādbabhūva sādhāraṇo bhūṣaṇabhūṣyabhāvaḥ 130’
‘ṛturvayomadādayaḥ’ ka khaṛtuvayomadādaya ṛtvādayaḥ |
teṣu ṛturyathā—
‘idamapulabhavastu prārthanādunirvāraṃ prathamamapi mano me pañcabāṇaḥ kṣiṇoti |
kimuta malayavātonmūlitāpāṇḍupattrai- rupavanasahakārairdarśiteṣvaṅa‍kureṣu || 131 ||’
vayo yathā—
‘māmūmuhatkhalu bhavantamananyajanmā mā te malīmasavikāraghanā matirbhūt |
ityādi nanviha nirarthakameva yasmā- tkāmaśca jṛmbhitaguṇo navayauvanaṃ ca || 132 ||’
mado yathā—
‘tatkṣaṇaṃ viparivartitahriyorneṣyatoḥ‘nekṣatoḥ’ gha śayanamiddharāgayoḥ |
sā babhūva vaśavartinī ‘tayoḥ’ ka khadvayoḥ śūlinaḥ suvadanā madasya ca 133’
candanasnānadhūpādayaścandanādayaḥ |
teṣu candanaṃ yathā—
‘candanaṃ viṣadharāśrayaḥ śaśī vāruṇī ca viṣasodarāvubhau |
tāpayanti virahe kimucyate mārayanti na yadetadadbhutam 134’
snānaṃ yathā—
‘āambaloaṇāṇaṃ ‘ullu tua’ ka, ‘uttuṃsua’ khaollaṃsuapā‘paaḍorujahaṇā’ kaaḍorujahaṇāṇaṃ |
‘avaruhṇa’ ka khaavaraṇhamajjirīṇaṃ kae ṇa kāmo ‘vahaï cāvaṃ’ iti kāvyamālāmudritagāthāsaptaśatyām, ka kha cadhaṇuṃ vahaï || 135 ||’
[ātāmralocanānāmārdrāṃśukaprakaṭorujaghanānām |
aparāhṇamajjanaśīlānāṃ kṛte na kāmo dhanurvahati ||]
dhūpo yathā—
‘snānārdramukteṣva‘śuṣkeṣu’ ghanudhūpavāsaṃ vinyastasāyantanamallikeṣu |
kāmo ‘vasantātapa’ khavasantātyayamandavīryaḥ keśeṣu lebhe balamaṅa‍ganānām 136’
candrodayo ghanadhvanirupakārasmaraṇamityādyāścandrodayādayaḥ |
teṣu candrodayo yathā—
‘‘vilimpantyetasmin’ ghavilimpatyetasminmalayajarasārdreṇa‘malayarajasādreṃṇa’ ka kha mahasā diśāṃ vaktraṃ candre sukṛtamatha tasyā mṛgadṛśaḥ |
dṛśorbāṣpaḥ pāṇau vadanamasavaḥ kaṇṭhakuhare hṛdi tvaṃ hrīḥ pṛṣṭhe vacasi ca guṇā eva bhavataḥ || 137’
ghanadhvaniryathā—
‘ajja mae teṇa viṇā ‘aṇubhūasuhāiṃ aṇisaṃbharantīe’ ka khaaṇuhūasuhāiṁ saṃmaraṃtīe |
‘ahiṇavamohaṇaravo’ kha ahiṇavamehāṇaṁ ravo ṇisāmio ‘vajjapaḍahovva’ ghavajjhapaḍaho vva || 138 ||’
[adya mayā tena vinānubhūtasukhāni saṃsmarantyā |
abhinavameghānāṃ ravo niśāmito vadhyapaṭaha iva ||]
upakārasmaraṇaṃ yathā—
‘tanme manaḥ kṣipati yatsarasaprahāramālokya māmagaṇitaskhaladuttarīyā |
trastaika‘hāyaṇa’ khahāyanakuraṅa‍gaviloladṛṣṭirāśliṣṭavatyamṛtasaṃvalitairivāṅa‍gaiḥ || 139 ||’
anubhāveṣu ‘smaratirthathā’ ka khasmarati yathā—
‘khaṇamettaṃ pi‘vi’ gha ṇa phiṭṭaï aṇudiahaṃ ‘aṇudiahaviiṇṇagaruasaṃtāvā’ gāthāsapta॰ ‘diṇṇaguruasaṃtāvā’ ghadiṇṇagaruasaṃtāvā |
‘pacchaṇṇapāpasaṃkavva’ gha, ‘pacchannapāvasaṃkevva’ gāthāsapta॰pacchaṇṇapāvasaṃkavva sāmalī majjha ‘hiaāo’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘hiaāhi’ ka kha gahiaāhiṁ || 140 ||’
[kṣaṇamātramapi nāpagac‍chatyanudivasaṃ dattagurukasaṃtāpā |
pracchannapāpaśaṅa‍keva śyāmalāṅa‍gī mama hṛdayāt ||]
vāñchati‘vāñchatiryathā’ ka kha yathā—
‘emea ‘akaapuṇṇā’ ghaakaaüṇṇā appattamaṇorahā vivajjisaṃ |
jaṇavāo vi ṇa jāo teṇa samaṃ haliaütteṇa‘haliaputteṇa’ gha || 141 ||’
[evamevākṛtapuṇyāprāptamanorathā vipatsye |
janavādo 'pi na jātastena samaṃ halikaputreṇa ||]
dveṣṭi‘dveṣṭiryathā’ ka kha yathā—
‘gottakkhalaṇaṃ soūṇa piaame ajja ‘tīa’ gāthāsapta॰māmi ‘khaṇadiahe’ iti tatraivachaṇadiahe |
vajjhamahisassa mālavva maṃḍaṇaṃ se ṇa ‘uaha’ paśyata ityapi capaḍihāi || 142 ||’
[gotraskhalanaṃ śrutvā priyatame 'dya sakhi utsavadivasekṣaṇadivase |
vadhyamahiṣasya māleva maṇḍanamasyā na pratibhāti ||]
prayatate yathā—
‘anugacchanmunitanayāṃ sahasā vinayena vāritaprasaraḥ |
svasthānādacalannapi gatveva punaḥ pratinivṛttaḥ || 143 ||’
‘avaitiryathā’ ka khaavaiti yathā—
‘candasarisaṃ muhaṃ se sariso amaassa muharaso tissā |
sakaaggaharahasujjalacuṃbaṇaaṃ kassa sarisaṃ se || 144 ||’
[candrasadṛśaṃ mukhamasyāḥ sadṛśo 'mṛtasya mukharasastasyāḥ |
sakacagraharabhasojjvalacumbanakaṃ kasya sadṛśamasyāḥ ||]
manyate yathā—
‘‘parivaṭṭa diva’ ka, ‘parivaṭṭadivaṃ’ khaparivaṭṭaṃtiva ṇisaṃsa(ma)i maṃḍaliakusumāuhaṃ va aṇaṃgaṃ |
virahammi maṇṇaï harīṇahe‘hariṇahe agatthe’ ka, ‘harīṇāhe’ ‘aṇatthe’ kha aṇatthapaḍiuṭṭhiaṃ va miaṃkam || 145’
[parivartamāneva(?) niśāmyate maṇḍalitakusumāyudhamivānaṅa‍gam |
virahe manyate hārinakhe anarthapratyutthitamiva mṛgāṅa‍kam ||]
vakti yathā—
‘ālāo mā dijjaü loaviruddhatti ṇāma kāūṇa |
samuhāvaḍie ko verie vi diṭṭhiṃ ṇa pāḍei || 146 ||’
[ālāpo mā dīyatāṃ lokaviruddha iti nāma kṛtvā |
saṃmukhāpatite ko vairiṇyapi dṛpṭiṃ na pātayati ||]
ceṣṭate yathā—
‘ajja mae gaṃtavvaṃ ghaṇaṃdhaāre vi tassa suhaassa |
ajjā ṇimīliacchī paaparivāḍiṃ ghare kuṇaï || 147 ||’
[adya mayā gantavyaṃ ghanāndhakāre 'pi tasya subhagasya |
āryā nimīlitākṣī padaparipāṭīṃ gṛhe karoti ||]
saṃcāriṣu svedaromāñcavepathavo yathā—
‘diṭṭhe jaṃ pulaïjjasi ‘rahagharasi’ ka khatharaharasi piammi jaṃ samāsaṇṇe |
tuha saṃbhāsaṇa‘seoli’ ka, ‘seolli’ khaseulliphaṃsaṇe kiṃ vi ‘ṇijjihasi’ ka khaṇijjihisi || 148 ||’
[dṛṣṭe yatpulakāyase tharaharāyase priye yatsamāsanne |
tava saṃbhāṣaṇasvedārdrīkṛtasparśe kimapi nīyase ||]
aśru yathā—
‘‘ṇaaṇavbhaṃtara’ ka kha, ‘ṇaaṇaṃtara’ ga ghaṇaaṇabbhaṃtaragholaṃtabāhabharamaṃtharāi‘mantharāe’ ka kha ga gha diṭṭhīe |
puṇaruttapechirīe‘peccharīe’ ka kha vālaa kiṃ jaṃ ṇa bhaṇio si || 149 ||’
[nayanābhyantaraghūrṇamānabāṣpabharamantharayā dṛṣṭayā |
punaruktaprekṣaṇaśīlayā bālaka kiṃ yanna bhaṇito 'si ||]
harṣo yathā—
‘savvassammi vidaddhe(ḍ̣dhe)‘vidaṭṭe’ ka kha taha vi hu hiaassa ṇivvudi ccea |
jaṃ teṇa gāmaḍāhe hatthāhatthiṃ kuḍo gahio || 150 ||’
[sarvasve 'pi dagdhe tathāpi khalu hṛdayasya nirvṛtireva |
yattena grāmadāhe hastāhasti kuṇḍo gṛhītaḥ ||]
amarṣo yathā—
‘katto saṃpaḍaï ‘mahampi’ ka, ‘maī’ kha maha pi piasahi piasaṃgamo paose vi |
jaṃ jiajaï‘aï’ gha gahia‘kūra’ ka khakaraṇiara khiṃkhirīśaranirmitavādyaviśeṣaḥ ‘khikkhirī ḍumbacindhalaṭhṭhīe’ iti deśīnāmamālā | ḍumbādīnāṃ sparśaparihārāryaṃ cihnayaṣṭiḥ caṃdacaṃḍālo’ ||
[kutaḥ saṃpatati mamāpi priyasakhi priyasaṃgamaḥ pradoṣe 'pi |
yajjīvati gṛhītakaranikarakhiṃkhirī candracaṇḍālaḥ ||]
līlādiṣu priyajanaceṣṭānukṛtilīṃlā yathā—
‘jaṃ jaṃ karesi jaṃ jaṃ jappasi jaṃ‘jaha tuma’ kāvyamālāmudritagāthāsapta॰ jaṃ ṇiacchesi |
taṃ tamaṇusikkharīe‘śikkhirīe’ kha, ‘sikkhirīe’ ityapi gāthāsapta॰ dīho diaho ṇa saṃpaḍaï || 152 ||’
[yadyatkaroṣi yadyajjalpasi yadyannirīkṣase |
tattadanuśikṣaṇaśīlāyā dīrgho divaso na saṃpadyate ||]
netrabhrūvaktrakarmaṇāṃ viśeṣaṇe lasanaṃ vilāso yathā—
‘sabhrūvilāsamatha so 'yamitīrayitvā sapratyabhijñamiva māmavalokya tasyāḥ |
anyonyabhāvacatureṇa sakhījanena muktāstadā smitasudhāmadhurāḥ kaṭākṣāḥ || 153 ||’
vibhūṣaṇādīnāmanādaravinyāso vicchittiryathā—
‘aṅa‍gāni candanarajaḥparidhūsarāṇi tāmbūlarāgasulabho 'dharapallavaśca |
acchāñjane ca nayane vasanaṃ tanīyaḥ kāntāsu bhūṣaṇamidaṃ vibhavaśca śeṣaḥ || 154 ||’
vibhūṣaṇādīnāmasthānaprayogo vibhramo yathā—
‘cakāra kācitsitacandanāṅa‍ke kāñcīkalāpaṃ stanabhārapṛṣṭhe |
priyaṃ prati preṣitacittavṛtti- rnitambabimbe ca ‘babandha’ ga ghababhāra hāram || 155 ||’
smitaruditahasitādīnāṃ harṣādasakṛdekīkaraṇaṃ kilakiñcitaṃ yathā—
‘pāṇipallavavidhūnanamantaḥsītkṛtāni ‘ghanaromavibhedāḥ’ ga nayanārdhanimeṣāḥ |
yoṣitāṃ rahasi gadgadavācāmastratāmupayayurmadanasya || 156 ||’
dṛṣṭajanakathāyāṃ tadbhāvabhāvanotthitavikāro moṭṭāyitaṃ yathā—
‘tava sā kathāsu parighaṭṭayati śravaṇaṃ yadaṅa‍gulimukhena muhuḥ |
ghanatāṃ dhruvaṃ nayati tena bhavadguṇapūgapūritamatṛptatayā || 157 ||’
keśastanādharādigrahaṇādduḥkhe 'pi sukhabuddhiceṣṭā kuṭṭamitaṃ yathā—
‘hnībharādavanataṃ parirambhe rāgavānavaṭujeṣvavakṛṣya |
arpitoṣṭhadalamānanapadmaṃ yoṣito mukulitākṣamadhāsīt || 158 ||’
abhīṣṭaprāptāvabhimānagarvasaṃbhāvanānādarakṛto viṃkāro ‘vicchoko’ ghavivvoko yathā—
‘nirvibhujya daśanacchadaṃ tato vāci bharturavadhīraṇāparā |
śailarājatanayā samīpagāmālalāpa vijayāmahetukam || 159 ||’
sukumāratayā karacaraṇāṅa‌‍ganyāso lalitaṃ yathā—
‘gurutarakala‘nūpurānurāvaṃ’ khanūpurānunādaṃ‘nurāvaṃ’ ka kha salalitanartitavāmapādapadmā |
itaradanatilolamādadhānā padamatha manmathamantharaṃ jagāma 160’
vaktavyasamaye 'pi vacasābhibhāṣya kriyānuṣṭhānaṃ vihṛtaṃ yathā—
‘patyuḥ śiraścandrakalāmanena spṛśeti sakhyā parihāsapūrvam |
sā rañjayitvā caraṇau kṛtāśīrmālyena tāṃ nirvacanaṃ jaghāna || 161 ||’
bālyakaumārayauvanasādhāraṇo vihāraviśeṣaḥ krīḍitaṃ yathā—
‘mandākinīsaikatavedikābhiḥ sā kandukaiḥ kṛtrimaputrakaiśca |
reme muhurmadhyagatā sakhīnāṃ krīḍārasaṃ nirviśatīva bālye || 162 ||’
krīḍitameva ‘priyatamaviṣayaṃ’ ghapriyatamaviṣaye keliryathā—
‘vyapohitaṃ locanato mukhānilai- rapārayantaṃ kila puṣpajaṃ rajaḥ |
payodhareṇorasi kācidunmanāḥ priyaṃ jaghānonnatapīvarastanī || 163 ||’
