‘snātā tiṣṭhati kuntaleśvarasutā vāro 'ṅa‍garājasvasu- rdyūtai rātririyaṃ jitā kamalayā devī prasādyādya ca |
ityantaḥpurasundarī prati mayā vijñāya vijñāpite devenāpratipattimūḍhamanasā dvitrāḥ sthitaṃ nāḍikāḥ || 364 ||’
ananyajānirasādhāraṇo yathā—
‘āvivāhasamayādgṛhe vane śaiśave tadanu yauvane punaḥ |
svāpahetura‘anupāśrito 'nyayā’ iti mudrita uttararāmacaritenupāsito 'nyayā rāmabāhurupadhānameṣa te || 365 ||’
ahaṃkārapradhāno dhīroddhato yathā—
‘cakraṃ vā madhuhā ‘kṛtāntagṛhiṇāṃ’ kha﻿kṛtāntagṛhiṇīdattāgrapañcāṅa‍gulaṃ vajraṃ bhūdharapakṣaśoṇitasurāpānonmadaṃ vā vṛṣā |
śūlaṃ ‘śūlaṃ cāsura’ khavāsuraraktabindunicitaṃ gṛhṇātu śūlāyudho dhṛṣṭadyumnamahaṃ nihanmi samare kaścitparitrāyatām || 366 ||’
ratyupacārapradhāno dhīralalito yathā—
‘ādhātuṃ vinayaṃ nirāgasi nare kupyantu nāmeśvarā- stena svāśayaśuddhireva sukarā prāyaḥ prabhūṇāṃ puraḥ |
mithyāmānini manyase yadi tadā nityaṃ manovartinī dhyātā tāmarasākṣi citrapaṭake‘citraphalake’ ka, ‘cittaphalake’ kha kā vā tvadanyā mayā || 367 ||’
upaśamapradhāno ‘dhīraśānto’ ghadhīrapraśānto yathā—
‘kulamamalinaṃ bhadrā mūrtirmatiḥ śrutiśālinī bhujabalamalaṃ sphītā lakṣmīḥ prabhutvamakhaṇḍitam |
prakṛtisubhagā hyete‘hyante’ kha bhāvā madasya ca hetavo vrajati puruṣo yairunmādaṃ ta eva tavāṅa‍kuśāḥ‘navāṅa‍kuśāḥ’ ka kha || 368 ||’
‘viśravyodārakarmā’ ka, ‘visrabdhadārakarmā’ khavisrabdhodārakarmā dhīrodāttaḥ | sa yathā—
‘kapole jānakyāḥ karikalabhadantadyutimuṣi smarasmeraṃ gaṇḍoḍḍamarapulakaṃ vaktrakamalam |
muhuḥ paśyañśrṛṇvanrajanicarasenākalakalaṃ jaṭājūṭagranthiṃ draḍhayati raghūṇāṃ parivṛḍhaḥ || 369 ||’
kaitavapradhānaḥ śaṭho yathā—
‘dṛṣṭa‍vaikāsanasaṃsthite priyatame paścādupetyādarādekasyā nayane nimīlya vihitakrīḍānubandhacchalaḥ |
īṣadvakritakandharaḥ sapulakaḥ premollasanmānasāmantarhāsalasatkapolaphalakāṃ dhūrto 'parāṃ cumbati || 370 ||’
kṛtāparādho 'pyavilakṣo dhṛṣṭo yathā—
‘śataṃ vārānuktaḥ priyasakhi vacobhiḥ sa paruṣaiḥ sahasraṃ nirdhūtaḥ padanipatitaḥ pārṣṇihatibhiḥ |
‘kiyatkṛtvā’ khakiyatkṛtvo baddhāḥ punariha na vedmi bhrukuṭaya- stathāpi kliśyanmāṃ kṣaṇamapi na dhṛṣṭo viramati || 371 ||’
hṛdayaṃgamapravṛttiranukūlo yathā—
‘muñca kopama‘mānaṃ’ khanimittakopane sandhyayā praṇamito 'smi nānyayā |
kiṃ na vetsi sahadharmacāriṇaṃ cakravākasamavṛttimātmanaḥ || 372 ||’
auparodhikapravṛttirdakṣiṇo yathā—
anena kalyāṇi mṛṇālakomalaṃ vratena gātraṃ glapayasyakāraṇam |
prasādamākāṅa‍kṣati yastavotsukaḥ sa kiṃ tvayā dāsajanaḥ prasādyate ||’
nāyikāguṇeṣu sarvaguṇasaṃpadyogāduttamā yathā—
hasiāiṃ samaṃsalakomalāiṃ vīsaṃbhakomalaṃ vaaṇaṃ |
‘sabbhāvakomalapulāiaṃ’ ka , ‘sabbhāva komacchapulāiaṃ va’ khasabbhāvakomalaṃ pulaïaṃ ca ṇamimo sumahilāṇaṃ || 374 ||’
[hasitāni samāṃsalakomalāni visrambhakomalaṃ vacanam |
sadbhāvakomalaṃ pralokitaṃ ca namāmaḥ sumahilānām ||]
pādonaguṇasaṃpadyogānmadhyamā yathā—
‘ṇiadaïadaṃsaṇukkhitta pahia aṇena vaccasu paheṇa |
‘gahavaïhahūā’ khagahavaïbahuā ‘dullaṅghivāurā haa iha ggāmo’ ka, ‘dullaṅghivāudāhaapa iha ggāmo’ khadullaṃghiavāurā iha ggāme‘ihaa ggāme’ gha || 375 ||’
ardhaguṇasaṃpadyogādadhamā yathā—
‘‘takiṃ khaṇa’ khataṃ kira khaṇā virajjasi taṃ kira ‘uvaharasi’ ghauvahasasi ‘alamahilāo’ ka khasaalamahilāo |
ehehi vāravālii ‘aṃsūmaïmalaṃ’ ka khaaṃsū maïlaṃ samuppisimo‘samuppisio’ kha, ‘samuppusimo’ gha || 376 ||’
[tvaṃ kila kṣaṇādvirajyase tvaṃ kilopahasasi sakalamahilāḥ |
ehyehi vārapālike aśru malinaṃ samutproñchāmaḥ ||]
vayaḥkauśalābhyāmasaṃpūrṇā mugdhā yathā—
‘sahiāhiṁ bhaṇṇamāṇā thaṇae laggaṃ kusuṃbhapupphaṃ‘laggakumbhapupputi’ kha tti |
‘muddhabahūā’ khamuddhabahuā hasijjaï papphoḍaṃtī ṇahavaāiṃ || 377 ||’
[sakhībhirbhaṇyamānā stane lagnaṃ kusumbhapuṣpamiti |
mugdhavadhūkā hasyate prasphoṭayantī nakhapadāni ||]
vayasā paripūrṇā madhyamā yathā—
‘paḍivakkhamaṇṇuuṃje‘maṇṇupuñje’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘maṇṇuuḍe’ ka, ‘mattaüje’ kha lāvaṇṇaüḍe‘lāvasaüde’ kha aṇaṃgagaakumbhe‘aṇaṅa‍gaakumbha’ kha |
purisasaahiaadharie kīsa thaṇaṃtī thaṇe vahasi || 378 ||’
[pratipakṣamanyupuñjau lāvaṇyapuṭāvanaṅa‍gagajakumbhau |
puruṣaśatahṛdayadhṛtau kimiti stanantī stanau vahasi ||]
vayaḥkauśalābhyāṃ saṃpūrṇā pragalbhā yathā—
‘‘khiṇṇassa ure païṇo ṭhatrei’ gāthāsapta॰khiṇṇassa ‘ṭhaveiü païṇo’ ka, ‘vaceira païṇo’ khaṭhavei ure païṇo gimhāvaraṇharamiassa‘gimhāvaraṇaharaṇamiassa’ kha |
ollaṃ galantaüpphaṃ‘galantakusumaṃ’ iti gāthāsapta॰ ṇhaṇasuandhaṃ ciurabhāram || 379 ||’
[khinnasya sthāpayatyurasi patyurgrīṣmāparāhṇaramitasya |
ārdre galatkusumaṃ snānasugandhaṃ cikurabhāram ||]
yatnāpaneyamānā dhīrā yathā—
‘ṇa vi taha aṇālavaṃtī hiaaṃ dūnei māṇiṇī ahiam‘hiaam’ ka |
‘jaï’ ghajaha ‘dūre viamhia’ ka, ‘dūraviamhia’ ga gha, ‘dūre viamia’ khadūraviambhia‘garūa’ khagaruarosamajjhatthabhaṇiehiṃ || 380 ||’
[nāpi tathānālapantī hṛdayaṃ dunoti māninyadhikam |
yathā dūravijṛmbhitakaroṣamadhyasthabhaṇitaiḥ ||]
‘yatnāpaneyamānā 'dhīrā’ gha, ‘ayatnāpaneyamānā dhīrā’ ga, ‘ayatnāpaneyamānā 'dhīrā’ ka kha, ‘apalāyane 'pamānā 'dhīrā’ iti, evaṃ prathame 'pi bhede 'palāyane 'pamānā dhīrā’ itiayatnāpaneyamānā 'dhīrā yathā—
‘avalaṃbiamāṇaparaṃmuhīa‘parammuhīe’ iti gāthāsapta॰ ‘ta etassa’ khaeṃtassa māṇiṇi piassa |
‘puṭṭha’ gāthāsapta॰ | ‘puṭhṭhi pulagāmo’ khapuṭṭhipulaüggamo tuha kahei ‘saṃmuhaṭhiaṃ’ iti gāthāsapta॰saṃmuhaṭṭhiaṃ hiaaṃ || 381 ||’
[avalambitamānaparāṅa‍bhukhyā āgacchato mānini priyasya |
pṛṣṭhapulakodgamaste kathayati saṃmukhasthitaṃ hṛdayam ||]
ātmīyā svā yathā—
‘dhariṇīa‘ghariṇīe’ ka kha gāthāsapta॰ mahāṇasakammalaggamasimaliieṇa‘masimaïleṇa’ ka kha hattheṇa |
chittaṃ muhaṃ hasijjaï caṃdāvatthaṃ gaaṃ païṇā‘gaa païṇa’ ka, ‘gaha païṇā’ kha || 382 ||’
[gṛhiṇyā mahānasakarmalagnamalinitena hastena |
spṛṣṭaṃ mukhaṃ hasyate candrāvasthāṃ gataṃ patyā ||]
parakīyānyadīyā yathā—
‘vaïvivaraṇiggaadalo eraṇḍo‘eraṇṇo’ ka, ‘eraṇo’ kha sāhaïvva‘sāhaïvva’ ka taruṇāṇaṃ |
ettha ghare haliavahū eddahamettatthaṇī vasaï || 383 ||’
[vṛtivivaranirgatadala eraṇḍaḥ sādhayatīva taruṇebhyaḥ |
atra gṛhe hālikavadhūretāvanmātrastanī vasati ||]
pāṇigṛhītā ụ̄dhā yathā—
‘‘balattaṇa’ khabālattaṇadullaliāe ajja aṇajjaṃ kaaṃ ṇavavahūe |
‘ābhā (bhāā?) mi’ khabhāāmi ghare eāiṇitti‘eāiṇi vi’ kha ṇiṃto‘ṇitto’ ka kha paī ruddho || 384 ||’
[bālatvadurlalitayādya anārye kṛtaṃ navavadhvā |
bibhemi gṛhe ekākinīti niryan patī ruddhaḥ ||]
anụ̄dhā kumārī yathā—
‘kassa karo bahupuṇṇaphalekkataruṇo tuhaṃ ‘ṇisammihii’ ka kha, ‘ṇisimmihii’ ga gha, ‘visammihaï’ gāthāsapta॰visimmihii |
thaṇapariṇāhe mammahaṇihāṇakalaso vva‘ṇihāṇakalasovva’ ga ‘pārohe’ ka kha ga gha, ‘nidhānakalasevva pāroho’ iti gāthāsapta॰ pāṭhaḥpāroho || 385 ||’
[kasya karo bahupuṇyaphalaikatarostava viśramiṣyati |
stanapariṇāhe manmathanidhānakalśa iva prarohaḥ ||]
prathamọdhā jyeṣṭhā yathā—
‘paṇaaṃ ‘upaṇaaṃ’ ka , ‘upaṇaaṃ paṇaaṃ’ khapaḍhamapiāe ‘rakkhina(u?) kāmo vi mahurerhi’ karakkhiukāmo vi ‘madhuramadhurerhi’ kha , ‘mahuramahurehi’ ga ghamahuramahurehiṃ |
‘ccheāvaro’ khacheavaro ‘viṇalijjaï’ ka khaviṇaḍijjaï ahiṇavabahu‘ahiṇavabahūā’ khaāvilāsehiṃ || 386 ||’
[praṇayaṃ prathamapriyāyā rakṣitukāmo 'pi madhuramadhuraiḥ |
chekavaraḥ sukhāyate 'bhinavavadhūkāvilāsaiḥ ||]
paścādụ̄dhā kanīyasī yathā—
‘mahārambhatthaṇae’ kha‘uṭṭhantamahārambhe thaṇae ‘iṭṭeṇa’ khadaṭṭhūṇa muddhavahuāe‘muddhabahūāe’ kha |
‘osiṇṇa’ ka, ‘osiṇa’ khaosaṇṇakavolāe ṇīsasiaṃ paḍhamaghariṇīe || 387 ||’
[uttiṣṭhanmahārambhau stanakau dṛṣṭa‍vā mugdhavadhvāḥ |
avasannakapolayā niḥśvasitaṃ prathamagṛhiṇyā ||]
ahaṃkārarddhiruddhatā yathā—
‘aṇṇamahilāpasaṃgaṃ de deva‘dai dekka’ ka, ‘de dekka’ kha, ‘de devva’ gha karesu amha daïassa‘daraassa’ ka |
purisā ekkaṃtarasā‘ekatarassa’ kha ṇa hu dosaguṇe viāṇaṃti || 388 ||’
[anyamahilāprasaṅa‍gaṃ he deva kurvasmākaṃ dayitasya |
puruṣā ekāntarasā na khalu doṣaguṇau vijānanti ||]
gūḍhamānarddhirudāttā yathā—
‘‘jāṇāi’ kajāṇaï jāṇāveuṃ ‘aṇuṇaaviddaviamāṇaparisesaṃ’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘anunayavidrāvitamānapariśeṣam’ iti cchāyā ca; ‘vihīṇarīamāṇaparisesaṃ’ kaaṇuṇaavihurīamāṇaparisesaṃ |
‘aïrikkami vi’ iti gāthāsapta॰, ‘vijane 'pi’ iti cchāyā ca | atha ca tatra 'païrikaśabdo 'tirikte païrikketi vijane deśīti kecit | tadā ‘païrikkami vi’ iti pāṭhaḥ | vijane 'pītyarthaḥ’ iti kulabāladevaḥraïvikkamammi viṇaāvalaṃbaṇaṃ sa ccia kuṇantī‘paṅa‍kuṇantī’ ka || 389 ||’
[jānāti jñāpayitumanunayavidhuritamānapariśeṣam |
rativikrame vinayāvalambanaṃ saiva kurvantī ||]
nirvāṇamānā‘nirviṇṇamānā’ ka kha śāntā yathā—
‘jaïā pio ṇa dīsaï bhaṇaha halā kassa kīrae māṇo |
aha diṭṭhammi‘diummi’ ka vi māṇo tā tassa piattaṇaṃ katto‘kaṃso’ ka, ‘kanto’ kha || 390 ||’
[yadā priyo na dṛśyate bhaṇata halā kasya kriyate mānaḥ |
atha dṛṣṭe 'pi mānastattasya priyatvaṃ kutaḥ ||]
ślāghanīyamānā lalitā yathā—
‘hasiehiṁ uvālaṃbhā ‘acchavaārehi’ khaaccuvaārehiṁ rūsiavvāiṃ |
‘asūi’ khaaṃsūhi ‘bhaṇḍāi’ kabhaṃḍaṇāhiṃ eso maggo ‘maṇṇe’ kasumahilāṇaṃ || 391 ||’
[hasitairupālambhā atyupacārai rūṣitavyāni |
aśrubhiḥ kalahā eṣa mārgaḥ sumahilānām ||]
aniyatānekopabhogyā sāmānyā yathā—
‘‘kaṃḍūe’ ka, ‘kaḍae’ khakaḍue ‘dhūmaṅa‍ghāre’ ka, ‘dhūmaghāre’ khadhūmaṃdhāre ‘adbhuttaṇamaggiṇo’ ka, ‘abbhuttaṇamāgāṇo’ khaabbhuttaṇamaggiṇo ‘samappahii’ ghasamappihii |
muhakamalacuṃbaṇalehalammi ‘āsatthie’ ka khapāsaṭṭhie diare || 392 ||’
[kaṭuke dhūmāndhakāre 'bhyuttejanamagneḥ samāpsyate |
mukhakamalacumbanābhilāṣiṇi pārśvasthite devare ||]
patyantaraṃ prāptā punarpbhūryathā—
‘mayena nirmitāṃ padyametat ka nāsti | atha ca ‘taha sā jāṇaï’ ityādigāthātrodāharaṇatvena vartate ‘ātmacchandā svairiṇī yathā’ ityetadīyāvataraṇikāpi nāstyeva | ‘laṅa‍kāṃ labdhvā’ khalabdhvā laṅa‍kāṃ mandodarīmapi |
reme mūrtāṃ daśagrīvalakṣmīmiva vibhīṣaṇaḥ || 393 ||’
ātmacchandā svairiṇī yathā—
‘taha sā jāṇaṃi ‘jārā’ khapāvā loe ‘pacchaṇṇām’ khapacchaṇṇamaviṇaaṃ kāum‘kāram’ kha |
jaha paḍhamaṃ cia saccia‘saccia’ kha nāsti ‘lii’ kalikkhaï majjhe carittavaṃtīṇa || 394 ||’
[tathā sā jānāti pāpā loke pracchannamavinayaṃ kartum |
yathā prathamameva saiva lekhyate madhye caritravatīnām‘carittavattīṇa’ ka, ‘carittavatīṇa’ kha ||]
kalācatuḥṣaṣṭivid gaṇikā yathā—
‘sachandaramaṇadaṃsaṇarasavaḍ̣dhiagaruavammahavilāsaṃ |
‘suviạdhḍhasavevita’ ka, ‘suviaṭṭhavesavāṇi’ khasuviaḍḍhavesavaṇiāramiaṃ ko vaṇṇiuṃ taraï || 395 ||’
[svacchandaramaṇadarśanarasavardhitagurukamanmathavilāsam |
suvidagdhaveṣavanitāramitaṃ ko varṇituṃ śaknoti ||]
rūpayauvanamātropajīvinī rūpājīvā yathā—
‘ayameva dahyamānasmaranirgatadhūmavartikākāraḥ |
cikurabharastava sundari kāmijanaṃ rkikarīkurute || 396 ||’
kuṭṭamitādīnāṃ kartrī vilāsinī yathā—
‘sāmaṇṇasundarīṇaṃ vibbhamamāvahaï aviṇao ccea |
dhūma ccia pajjaliāṇaṃ bahu mao surahidārūṇa || 397 ||’
[sāmānyasundarīṇāṃ vibhramamāvahatyavinaya eva |
dhūṃma eva prajvālitānāṃ bahu mataḥ surabhidārūṇām ||]
yathoktalakṣaṇāsu khaṇḍitā yathā—
‘‘paccūsāgaa raṃjitadeha piāloa loaṇāṇaṃda’ iti gāthāsapta॰ ‘pratyūṣāgata rañjitadeha priyāloka locanānanda’ iti cchāyā ca | atha ‘pratyūṣāgatto dvīpāntarāt, pakṣe mahilāntarāvasathāt | anuraktadehaḥ svabhāvataḥ, pakṣe tadaṅa‍gasaṃgatakuṅa‍gumādinā | trailokyalocanānanda, atha ca strīlokalocanānanda | anyatra dvīpāntare, pakṣe nāyikāntaragṛhe kṣapitaśarvarīka | nabhobhūṣaṇa, pakṣe parastrīdattanakhabhūṣaṇa | bhāsvāniva dūrādevābhivandanīyastvaṃ na tvabhigamya iti ṭīkānirgalitārthaḥ | ‘paccasāgaaṇuravāavattaṃ taïloaloaṇāṇandam’ ka , ‘paccasāgaaṇuratāavattaṃ taïloaloṇāṇanda’ khapaccūsāgaaṇurattadeha taïloaloṇāṇanda |
aṇṇatthakhaviasavvaria ṇahabhūsaṇa diṇavaï‘vaï’ kha ṇamo de || 398 ||’
﻿
[pratyūṣāgatānuraktadeha trailokyalocanānanda |
anyatrakṣapitaśarvarīka nabhobhūṣaṇa dinapate namaste ||]
kalahāntaritā yathā—
‘aha so vilakkhahiao mae ‘ahavvāeṁ agahiāṇuṇao’ gāthāsapta॰ ‘abhavyayā agṛhītānunayaḥ’ iti cchāyā ca, ‘ahavāi’ ga ghaahavvāi agaṇiappaṇao |
paravajjaṇaccirīhiṁ tumhehiṁ uvekkhio jaṃ(jeṃ)to‘ṇeṃto’ iti gāthāsapta॰ ‘niryan’ iti cchāyā ca, ‘janto’ ka, ‘jeto’ kha || 399 ||’
[atha sa vilakṣahṛdayo mayā bhavyayāgaṇitapraṇayaḥ |
paravādyanartanaśīlābhiryuṣmābhirupekṣito gacchan ||]
vipralabdhā yathā—
‘aha sā tahiṃ tahiṃ vvia‘cia’ ka ga gha, ‘via’ kha, ‘vvia’ iti gāthāsapta॰ vāṇīravaṇammi ‘cukkasaṃkeo’ kacukkasaṃkeā |
tuha daṃsaṇaṃ vimaggaï‘viaggaï’ ka, ‘vimāgaï’ kha pabbhaṭṭhaṇihāṇaṭhāṇaṃ va‘nihaṇaṭāṇava’ ka, ‘nihāṃṇaṭhāṇāvva’ kha || 400 ||’
[atha sā tatra tatraiva vānīravane vismṛtasaṃketā |
tava darśanaṃ vimārgati prabhraṣṭanidhānasthānamiva ||]
vāsakasajjā yathā—
‘ehii pio tti ṇimisaṃ va jaggiaṃ jāmiṇīa paḍhamaddhaṃ |
sesaṃ saṃtāvaparavvasāe barisaṃ ba bolīṇam || 401 ||’
[eṣyati priya iti nimiṣamiva jāgṛtaṃ yāminyāḥ prathamārdham |
śeṣaṃ saṃtāpaparavaśayā varṣamiva vyatikrāntam ||]
svādhīnapatikā yatha—
‘sāloe ccia‘vvia’ iti gāthāsapta॰ sūre ghariṇī gharasāmiassa ghettūṇa |
ṇecchaṃtassa vi pāe dhuaï‘dhuaï’ ka kha hasaṃtī hasaṃtassa || 402 ||’
[sāloka eva sūrye gṛhiṇī gṛhasvāmino gṛhītvā |
necchato 'pi pādau dhāvati hasantī hasataḥ ||]
abhisārikā yathā—
‘gammihisi ‘gammahisi’ ka, ‘rammihisi tassa ṇaṃ saṃmāra sūrasu’ khatassa pāsaṃ mā ‘jhūrasu’ ka, ‘sundari mā turaa’ gāthāsapta॰, ‘sundarimā tvarasva’ iti ca cchāyājūrasu taruṇi vaḍḍhaü‘vaṭṭhaü’ kha miaṃko |
‘ule duddhammi vaha’ khaduddhe duddhambhiva‘mia’ iti hāthāsapta॰ caṃdiāe‘candiāi’ gāthāsapta॰ ko pecchaï‘pecchāi’ ka muhaṃ de || 403 ||’
[gamiṣyasi tasya pārśvaṃ mā khidyasva taruṇi vardhatāṃ mṛgāṅa‍ka |
dugdhe dugdhamiva candrikāyāṃ kaḥ prekṣate mukhaṃ te ||]
proṣitabhartṛkā yathā—
‘gimhe ‘davagga’ ga ghadavaggimasimaïliāiṁ dīsaṃti ‘vijjha’ gāthāsapta॰viṃjhasiharāiṃ |
‘āsaü’ ka khaāsasu paütthavaïe ṇa hoṃti ṇavapāusabbhāiṃ || 404 ||’
[griṣme dāvāgnimaṣīmalinitāni dṛśyante vindhyaśikharāṇi |
āśvasihi proṣitapatike na bhavanti navaprāvṛḍabhrāṇi ||]
virahotkaṇṭhitā yathā—
‘asmin varṣamahe na vartata idaṃ yatkāmadevotsave stheyaṃ putri nirannayā tadadhunā kiṃcinmukhe dīyatām |
ityuke jaratījanena kathamapyadhvanyavadhvā tataḥ paryaste 'hani kalpitaśca kavalo dhautaśva ‘dhārāmbubhiḥ’ ka khadhārāśrubhiḥ || 405 ||’
hīnapātreṣu śakāro yathā—
‘‘jadicchaśe’ iti Bombay Sanskrit Series mudrite mṛcchakaṭike | ‘paliśca le’ gā, ‘paliṃśca le’ ghapalicca le ‘lambadaśāviśālaṃ’ iti mudrite mṛcchakaṭikelaṃbadaśākalāaṃ pāvālaaṃ ‘śuttaśadehiṃ’ iti mudrite mṛcchakaṭikeśuttaśadeṇa ‘juttaṃ’ iti mudrite mṛcchakaṭike, ‘chatram’ ka khachattaṃ |
maṃśaṃ ca khāduṃ‘khāduṃ’ iti mudrite mṛcchakaṭike kha ‘taha tuṣṭi kāduṃ’ iti mudrite mṛcchakaṭike, ‘tuha tuṭṭi kāduṃ’ khatuha oṭṭhakāṃhiṁ cuṃkuścakuścucukuścukuṃti‘cuhū cuhū cukku cuhū cuhūtti’ iti mudrite mṛcchakaṭike || 406 ||’
[pratīccha re lambadaśākalāpaṃ pravārakaṃ sūtraśatena channam |
māṃsaṃ ca khādituṃ tava oṣṭhakābhyāṃ cukuścukuścukkucukuścukuṃti ||]
lalako yathā—
‘‘kaṃbalivāṇṇie’ ka, ‘kaṃbalavāṇie’ kha, kaṃbalavālie’ vakaṃbalivālie kaṃtti‘katti’ ka kha ‘kuṭṭaṃmaladanti’ ka khakuḍammaladanti dhiddhiluddhie‘tuddhie’ ka kha maïveālasi |
lattiṃsovari ‘jaggirikka’ ka khajaggiri tuma sahiṃ kharāvidupopphali‘pupphali’ kha ṇa lekīsi‘lokī’ ka kha ṇa āgasi || 407 ||’
[. . . . . . . . . . . . . |
. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . ||]
amātyādirādirāsanārhaḥ pāṣaṇḍādirvā pīṭhamardaḥ | tayoramātyeṣu mālyavān yathā—
‘hā vatsāḥ kharadūṣaṇatriśiraso vadhyāḥ stha pāpasya me hā hā vatsa vibhīṣaṇa tvamapi me kāryeṇa heyaḥ ‘sthiteḥ’ iti mudrite mahāvīracaritesthitaḥ |
hā madvatsala vatsa rāvaṇa mahatpaśyāmi te saṃkaṭaṃ vatse kaikasi‘naikaśi’ ka, ‘naikaṣi’ ga, ‘naikapi’ gha hā hatāsi ‘na cirāt’ iti mudrite vīracaritena ciraṃ trīnputrakāndrakṣyasi 408’
pāṣaṇḍeṣu bhairavānando yathā—
‘daṃsemi taṃ pi ‘dasiṇaṃ’ khasasiṇaṃ vasuhāvaïṇṇaṃ‘vasuhāvaīṇaṃ’ kha thambhemi tassa vi raïssa‘radassa gaī’ ka kha, ‘ravissa rahaṃ’ iti ca kāvyamālāmudritakarpūramañjaryām rahaṃ ṇahaddhe |
āṇemi jakkhasurasiddhagaṇaṃgaṇāo taṃ ṇatthi bhūmivalae‘bhūmivalaye’ ka maha jaṃ ṇa ‘sajjam’ ka kha mudritakarpūramañjaryāṃ casajjham || 409 ||’
[darśayāmi tamapi śaśinaṃ vasudhāvatīrṇaṃ stabhnāmi tasyāpi rave rathaṃ nabho 'rdhe |
ānayāmi yakṣasurasiddhagaṇāṅa‍ganāstannāsti bhūmivalaye mama yanna sādhyam ||]
vaihāsikaḥ krīḍanako viśvāsyaśca vidūṣakaḥ |
yathā—
‘phullukkaraṃ kalamakūrasamaṃ vahaṃti je siṃduvāraviḍavā maha vallahā de |
je gālidassa mahisīdahiṇo saricchā ‘te kiṃ ca’ Harvard Oriental Series mudritāyāṃ karpūramañjaryām, kāvyamālāmudritāyāṃ caruccaṃti muddhaviaïllapasūṇapuṃjā || 410 ||’
[puṣpotkaraṃ kalamabhaktasamaṃ vahanti ye sinduvāraviṭapā mama vallabhāste |
ye gālitasya mahiṣīdadhnaḥ sadṛkṣā rocante mugdhavicakilaprasūnapuñjāḥ ||]
mānyaḥ kalatravānbhuktavibhavo guṇavānviṭaḥ || 170 ||
sa yathā—
‘śakāra kiṃ prārthanayā prāvāreṇāmiṣeṇa vā‘prāvāreṇa miṣeṇa vā’ ka, ‘prāvāreṇāmiṣeṇa vā’ gha |
‘ākāryavarjaṃ’ gaakāryavarjaṃ me brūhi kimabhīṣṭaṃ ‘karoti’ ga karomi te || 411 ||’
dhātreyakādiśceṭo yathā—
‘candrāpīḍo 'tha saṃjātapīḍaḥ kādambarīṃ prati |
prāhiṇotsrastakeyūraḥ keyūrakamupasthitam || 412 ||’
patākāsu—
svātmopayoginyanyopayoginyanupayoginī |
patāketyāpatāketi prakarīti prakīrtyate || 171 ||
tāsu patākā hanūmān yathā—
‘diṣṭyā so 'yaṃ mahābāhurañjanānandavardhanaḥ |
yasya vīryeṇa kṛtino vayaṃ ca bhuvanāni ca || 413 ||’
āpatākāprakaryau mārīcajaṭāyuṣau yathā—
‘rakṣasā mṛgarūpeṇa vañcayitvā sa rāghavau |
jahāra sītāṃ pakṣīndraprayāsakṣaṇavighnitaḥ || 414 ||’
sahajā pūrvajāgantuḥ sakhīha trividhocyate |
tāsu lavāṅgikādiḥ sahajā yathā—
‘ujjvalālokayā snigdhā tvayā tyaktā na rājate |
malīmasamukhī vartiḥ pradīpaśikhayā yathā || 415 ||’
kāmandakyādiḥ pūrvajā yathā—
‘tathā vinayanamrāpi ‘yathā’ khamayā mālatyupāyataḥ |
nītā ‘katipayāhena’ Dr, R. G. Bhandarkar mudrite mālatīmādhavekatipayāhobhiḥ sakhī visrambhasevyatām || 416 ||’
trijaṭādirāganturyathā—
‘jāṇaï siṇehabhaṇiaṃ mā raaṇiaritti me ‘jaüchase’ ghajuucchasu vaaṇam |
ujjāṇammi ‘vaṇimmi’ kavaṇammi a jaṃ surahiṃ taṃ laāṇa ‘geṇhaï’ kāvyamālāmudrite setubandhegheppaï kusumaṃ 417’
[jānaki snehabhaṇitaṃ mā rajanīcarīti me jugupsasva vacanam |
udyāne vane ca yatsurabhi tallatānāṃ gṛhyate kusumam ||]
nāyakaguṇeṣu mahākulīnatvaṃ puṃso yathā—
‘vāsiṣṭhaiḥ sukṛtonadbhavo 'dhvaraśatairastyagnikuṇḍodbhavo bhūpālaḥ paramāra ityadhipatiḥ saptābdhikāñcerbhuvaḥ |
adyāpyadbhutaharṣagadgadagiro gāyanti yasyedbhaṭaṃ viśvāmitrajayorjitasya bhujayorvisphūrjitaṃ gurjarāḥ‘gūrjarāḥ’ ga gha || 418 ||’
audāryaṃ yathā—
‘diṅmātaṅa‍gaghaṭāvibhaktacaturāghāṭā mahī sādhyate siddhā ‘sātha’ ga ghasāpi vadanta eva hi vayaṃ romāñcitāḥ paśyata |
viprāya pratipādyate kimaparaṃ rāmāya tasmai namo yasmādāvirabhūtkathādbhutamidaṃ yatraiva‘yannaiva’ ka cāstaṃ gatam || 419 ||’
mahābhāgyaṃ yathā—
‘‘drāṅ’ mudrite mahāvīracaritedorniṣpeṣaviśīrṇavajraśakalapratyuptarūḍhavraṇa- granthyudbhāsini bhagnamoghamaghavanmātaṅa‍gadantodyame |
bharturnandanadevatāviracitasragdāmni bhūmeḥ sutā vīraśrīriva tasya vakṣasi jagadvīrasya viśrāmyatu || 420 ||’
kṛtajñatā yathā—
‘kṛtakakupitairbāṣpāmbhobhiḥ sadainyavilokitai- rvanamasi gatā yasya prītyā dhṛtāpi tathāmbayā |
navajalasadharaśyāmāḥ paśyandiśo bhavatīṃ vinā kaṭhinahṛdayo jīvatyeva priye sa kava priyaḥ || 421 ||’
rūpasaṃpad yathā—
‘vyụ̄dhorasko vṛṣaskandhaḥ śālaprāṃśurmahābhujaḥ |
ātmakarmakṣamaṃ dehaṃ kṣāttro dharma ivāśritaḥ‘ivāsthitaḥ’ ga || 422 ||’
yauvanasaṃpad yathā—
‘mahokṣatāṃ vatsataraḥ spṛśānniva dvipendrabhāvaṃ kalabhaḥ śrayanniva |
raghuḥ kramādyauvanabhinnaśaiśavaḥ pupoṣa gambhīramanoharaṃ vapuḥ || 423 ||’
vaidagdhyasaṃpad yathā—
‘ko 'yaṃ bhāmini bhūṣaṇaṃ kitava te śoṇaḥ kathaṃ kuṅkumā- tkūrpāsāntaritaḥ priye vinimayaḥ paśyāparaṃ ‘kāsti’ khakvāsti me |
paśyāmītyabhidhāya sāndrapulakau mṛdnanmṛḍānyāḥ stanau hastena pratinirjitenduravatādda‍yūte hasanvo haraḥ || 424 ||’
śīlasaṃpad yathā—
‘kā tvaṃ śubhe kasya parigraho vā kiṃ vā madabhyāgamakāraṇaṃ te |
ācakṣva matvā vaśināṃ raghūṇāṃ manaḥ parastrīvimukhapravṛtti || 425 ||’
saubhāgyasaṃpad yathā—
‘asau vidyādhāraḥ śiśurapi vinirgatya bhavanādihāyātaḥ saṃpratyavikalaśaraccandramadhuraḥ |
yadālokasthāne bhavati puramunmādataralaiḥ kaṭākṣairnārīṇāṃ kuvalayitavātāyanamiva || 426 ||’
mānitā yathā—
‘yadāttha kāmaṃ bhavatā sa yācyatā- miti kṣamaṃ naitadanalpacetasām |
kathaṃ prasahyāharaṇaiṣiṇāṃ priyāḥ ‘parānavatyā’ śrīmatpitṛcaraṇasaṃpādite kirātārjunīyeparānuvṛttyā malinīkṛtāḥ śriyaḥ || 427 ||’
udāravākyatvaṃ yathā—
‘‘jñātā’ mudrite mahāvīracaritekhyātā eva vayaṃ jagatsu caritairvāgbhiḥ kimākhyāyate saṃyatto bhava ‘satyamasti’ mudrite vīracariteśaktirasti bhavataḥ satyaṃ manuṣyo bhavān |
śastrairavyavadhīyamānayaśasaḥ‘vijayāḥ’ mudrite vīracarite prāyo vayaṃ teṣu ce- tprāhuste nanu santi‘grāhaste sukhamāśvasanti’ mudrite vīracarite te 'pi girayo yairvānarāḥ śastriṇaḥ || 428’
sthirānurāgitā yathā—
‘tataḥ kairapyukte pariṇayavidhau kāṣṭhamunibhiḥ purāṇairataṅa‍kaglapitahṛdayena kṣitibhṛtā |
vinā vācaṃ naitatkṣamamiti‘kṣapayati’ kha nidhāyānanamadhaḥ patadbāṣpāmbhobhirnikhilamiva dattaṃ prativacaḥ || 429 ||’
nāyikāguṇeṣu striyā mahākulinatā yathā—
‘‘mānuṣībhyaḥ’ khamānuṣīṣu kathaṃ vā syādasya rūpasya saṃbhavaḥ |
na prabhātaralaṃ jyotirudeti vasudhātalāt || 430 ||’
audāryaṃ yathā—
‘‘bhrabhaṅge’ mudritaratnāvalyāmbhrūbhede sahasodgate 'pi‘sahasā kṛte 'pi’ ka vadanaṃ nītaṃ parāṃ namratā- mīṣanmāṃ prati bhedakāri hasitaṃ noktaṃ vaco niṣṭhuram |
antarbāṣpajalīkṛtaṃ‘antarbāṣpajaḍīkṛtaṃ’ kha, mudritaratnāvalyāṃ ca prabhutayā cakṣurna visphāritaṃ kopaśca prakaṭīkṛto dayitayā muktaśca na ‘pratyayaḥ’ khapratyayaḥ || 431 ||’
mahābhāgyaṃ yathā—
‘tāṃ nāradaḥ kāmacaraḥ kadācitkanyāṃ kila prekṣya pituḥ samīpe |
samādideśaikavadhūṃ bhavitrīṃ premṇā śarīrārdhaharāṃ harasya || 432 ||’
kṛtajñatā yathā—
‘purisasarisaṃ tuha imaṃ rakkhasasarisaṃ ‘kiaṃ’ ghakaaṃ ṇisāaravaïṇā |
kaha tā ‘ācintijjaṃ’ ka khaciṃtijjaṃtaṃ‘cintiasulahaṃ’ iti kāvyamālāmudrite setubandhe mahilāsarisaṃ ṇa saṃpaḍaï me maraṇaṃ || 433 ||’
[puruṣasadṛśaṃ tavedaṃ rākṣasasadṛśaṃ kṛtaṃ niśācarapatinā |
kathaṃ tāvaccintitasulabhaṃ mahilāsadṛśaṃ na saṃpadyate me maraṇam ||]
rūpasaṃpad yathā—
‘ābharaṇasyābharaṇaṃ prasādhanavidheḥ prasādhanaviśeṣaḥ |
upamānasyāpi sakhe pratyupamānaṃ vapustasyāḥ || 434 ||’
yauvanasaṃpad yathā—
‘unmīlitaṃ tūlikayeva citraṃ sūryāṃśubhirbhinnamivāravindam |
babhūva tasyāścaturasraśobhi vapurvibhaktaṃ navayauvanena || 435 ||’
vaidagdhyasaṃpad yathā—
‘ekatrāsanasaṃsthitiḥ parihṛtā pratyudgamāddūrata- ‘tāmbūlāharaṇacchalena’ gha, kāvyamālāmudrite 'maruśatake castāmbūlānayanacchalena rabhasāśleṣo 'pi saṃvighnitaḥ |
ālāpo 'pi na miśritaḥ parijanaṃ vyāpārayantyāntike kāntaṃ ‘pratyupakārataḥ’ khapratyupacārataścaturayā kopaḥ kṛtārthīkṛtaḥ || 436 ||’
śīlasampad yathā—
‘‘caturaghariṇī’ ka kha, ‘catvaraghariṇī’ ga, ‘catvaragharaṇī’ gha, ‘cattaraghariṇī’ ca gāthāsapta॰cattaraghariṇī piadaṃsaṇā a ‘taruṇī’ gāthāsapta॰bālā paütthavaïā‘paütthapaïā’ gāthāsapta॰ a |
‘asaïsaaṇṇaā’ ka, ‘asara(i)saajjiā’ kha, ‘asaīsapajjiā' gāthāsapta॰asaī saajjhiā duggaā a ṇa hu khaṃḍiaṃ sīlam || 437 ||’
[catvaragṛhiṇī priyadarśanā ca bālā proṣitapatikā ca |
asatī prativeśinī durgatā ca na khalu khaṇḍitaṃ śīlam ||]
saubhāgyasampad yathā—
‘saṃcāriṇī dīpaśikheva rātrau yaṃ yaṃ vyatīyāya patiṃvarā sā |
narendramārgāṭṭa iva prapede vivarṇabhāvaṃ sa sa bhūmipālaḥ || 438 ||’
mānitā yathā—
‘śailātmajāpi piturucchiraso 'bhilāṣaṃ vyarthaṃ samarthya lalitaṃ vapurātmanaśca |
sakhyoḥ samakṣamiti cādhikajātalajjā śūnyā jagāma bhavanābhimukhaṃ kathaṃcit || 439 ||’
udāravākyatvaṃ yathā—
‘yathā śrutaṃ vedavidāṃ vara tvayā jano 'yamuccaiḥ padalaṅa‍ghanotsukaḥ |
tapaḥ kiledaṃ tadavāptisādhanaṃ manorathānāmagatirna vidyate || 440 ||’
sthirānurāgitā yathā—
‘alaṃ vivādena yathā śrutaṃ tvayā‘śrutastvayā’ iti mudrite kumārasaṃbhave tathāvidhastāvadaśeṣamastu saḥ |
mamātra bhāvaikarasaṃ manaḥ sthitaṃ na kāmavṛttirvacanīyamīkṣate || 441 ||’
pākabhaktiṣu ādāvasvādu, ante svādu mṛdvīkāpākaṃ yathā—
‘prākkāmaṃ dahatā kṛtaḥ paribhavo yenātha ‘saṃdhyānataḥ’ khasaṃdhyāvatau serṣyā vo 'vatu caṇḍikā caraṇayostaṃ pātayantī patim |
‘kurvantyabhyadhikaṃ’ khakurvantyābhyadhikaṃ kṛte pratikṛtaṃ muktena maulau muhu- ‘bāṣpeṇādṛtakajjalena’ itirbāṣpeṇāhṛtakajjalena likhitaṃ lakṣmeva candre yathā || 442’ ||
ādyantayoḥ svādu nārikelīpākaṃ‘nārikelīrītipāko’ ka, ‘nārikelīpākaṃ’ gha yathā—
‘jaha icchā taha ramiaṃ jāā pattā ‘padaṃ’ khapaïṃ gaā dhūā |
gharasāmiassa‘gharasāmiassa assa’ kha ajja vi ‘sokoūhachāi aïm' ka, ‘sokouhacchāi acchīi’ kha sakouhallāiṁ acchīiṃ || 443 ||’
[yathecchā tathā ramitaṃ jāyā prāptā patiṃ gatā duhitā |
gṛhasvāmino 'dyāpi sakautūhalānyakṣīṇi ||]
ādimadhyānteṣu svādu svādutaraṃ svādutamamityāmrapākaṃ yathā—
‘śāpādasi pratihatā smṛtiloparūkṣe‘smṛtirodharūkṣe’ iti mudrite śākuntale bhartaryapetatamasi‘bharturvyapetatamasi’ ka prabhutā tavaiva |
chāyā na mūrcchati malopahataprasāde śuddhe tu darpaṇatale sulabhāvakāśā || 444 ||’
yannāpaiti na cātiśobhate tannīlīrāgaṃ yathā—
‘‘sītāṃ hitvā’ S. P. Pandit M. A. saṃpādite raghuvaṃśehītvā sītāṃ daśamukharipurnopayeme yadanyāṃ tasyā evaṃ pratikṛtisakho yatkratūnājahāra |
vṛttāntena śravaṇaviṣayaprāpiṇā tena bhartuḥ sā ‘durvāraṃ kathamapi’ kha mudrite raghuvaṃśe cadurvāravyathamapi parityāgaduḥkhaṃ viṣehe || 445 ||’
‘yadapaiti na ca śobhate ca’ kayadapaiti ca śobhate ca tatkusumbharāgaṃ yathā—
‘vahuvallahassa jā hoi vallahā kaha vi paṃcadiahāiṃ |
sā kiṃ chaṭṭhaṃ ‘maggaī’ gāthāsapta॰maggaï katto ‘miṭhṭhaṃ a’ iti gāthāsapta॰miṭṭhaṃ ca bahuaṃ ca‘bahuaa’ iti gāthāsapta॰ || 446 ||’
[bahuvallabhasya yā bhavati vallabhā kathaṃ kathamapi paścadivasāni |
sā kiṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ mārgate kuto mṛṣṭaṃ ca bahukaṃ ca ||]
‘yannāpaiti api ca śobhate’ khayannāpaityati ca śobhate tanmañjiṣṭhārāgaṃ yathā—
‘vevaï jassa saviḍiaṃ valiuṃ mahaï pulaāiatthaṇaalasaṃ |
pemmasahāvavimuhiaṃ ‘vīāvāsagamaṇūsuaṃ’ iti kāvyamālāmudrite setubandhe, ‘dvitīyāvakāśagamanotsukaṃ iti cchāyā cavīovāsagamaṇūsuaṃ vāmaddham || 447 ||’
[vepate yasya savrīḍaṃ valituṃ vāñchati pulakāñcitastanakalaśam |
premasvabhāvavimuktaṃ dvitīyapārśvagamanotsukaṃ vāmārdham ||]
gūḍhavyalīkamantarvyājaṃ yathā—
‘pratyagrojjhitagokulasya śayanādutsvapnamūḍhasya me sā gotraskhalanādapaitu ca divā rādheti bhīroriti |
rātrāvasvapato divā ca vijane ‘nāmeti cābhyasyatā rādhāṃ॰’ kalakṣmīti cābhyasyato rādhāṃ prasmarataḥ śriyaṃ ramayataḥ khedo hareḥ pātu vaḥ 448’
agūḍhavyalīkaṃ bahirvyājaṃ yathā—
‘cakṣuryasya tavānanādapagataṃ nābhūtkvacinnirvṛtaṃ yenaiṣā satataṃ tvadekaśayanaṃ vakṣaḥsthalī kalpitā |
yenoktāsi vinā tvayā mama jagacchūnyaṃ kṣaṇājjāyate so 'yaṃ dambhadhṛtavrataḥ priyatamaḥ kartuṃ kimapyudyataḥ‘kimabhyudyataḥ’ ka kha || 449 ||’
‘avyalīkanirvyājaṃ yathā’ kaavyalīkaṃ nirvyājaṃ yathā—
‘kiṃ kaṇṭhe śithilīkṛto bhujalatāpāśaḥ pramādānmayā ‘nidrocchedavivartaneṣu’ ka khanidrācchedavivartaneṣvabhimukhī nādyāpi saṃbhāvitā‘saṃbhāṣitā’ ka kha |
anyastrījanasaṃkathālaghurahaṃ svapne tvayā lakṣito‘vīkṣito’ ka kha doṣaṃ paśyasi kaṃ‘kim’ ka kha priye parijanopālambhayogye mayi || 450 ||’
dharmānubandhi ‘dharmodakaṃ’ ghadharmodarkaṃ yathā—
‘atha sa viṣayavyāvṛttātmā yathāvidhi sūnave nṛpatikakudaṃ datvā yūne sitātapavāraṇam |
munivanatarucchāyāṃ devyā tayā saha śiśriye galitavayasāmikṣvākūṇāmidaṃ hi kulavratam || 451 ||’
arthānubandhi arthodarkaṃ yathā—
‘bhūtvā cirāya caturantamahīsapatnī‘sadigantamahīsapatnī’ kha ‘dauṣṣantim’ khadauṣyantimapratirathaṃ tanayaṃ prasūya‘niveśya’ iti mudrite śākuntale |
‘tatsaṃniveśitabhareṇa sahaiva bhartrā’ ka khamartrā tadarpitakuṭumbabhareṇa sārdhaṃ śānte kariṣyasi padaṃ punarāśrame 'smin || 452 ||’
yatpunaḥ kāmamevānubadhnāti tatkāmodarkaṃ yathā—
‘advaitaṃ sukhaduḥkhayoranuguṇaṃ‘anugataṃ’ iti mudrita uttararāmacarite sarvāsvavasthāsu ya- dvisrambho‘viśrāmo’ ka kha mudrita uttararāmacarite ca hṛdayasya yatra jarasā yasminnahāryo rasaḥ |
kālenāvaraṇātyayā‘pariṇateryat’ kha gatpariṇate yatsnehasāre‘premasāre’ iti mudrita uttararāmacarite sthitaṃ ‘bhadre’ gha, ‘bhadra’ (dre vā draṃ?)gabhadraṃ tasya sumānuṣasya kathamapyekaṃ hi yatprāpyate‘tatprārthyate’ ka mudrita uttararāmacarite ca | ‘yatprārthyate’ kha || 453 ||’
‘nānālaṃkārasaṃsṛṣṭeḥ ‘prakārāśca’ ghaprakārāśca rasoktayaḥ |
ityuktaṃ tatra ‘alaṃkārasaṃsṛṣṭeḥ’ itīyatyeva‘ityeva’ ka kha vaktavye nānālaṃkāragrahaṇaṃ‘nānālaṅa‍kāragrahaṇaṃ’ kha guṇarasānāmupasaṃgrahārtham | teṣāmapi hi kāvyaśobhākaratvenālaṃkāratvāt || yadāha—
kāvyaśobhākarāndharmānalaṃkārānpracakṣate |
te cādyāpi vikalpyante kastānkārtsnyena vakṣyati ||
kāścinmārgavibhāgārthamuktāḥ prāgapyalaṃkriyāḥ |
sādhāraṇamalaṃkārajā‘alaṅa‍kāraṃ jātamanyat’ khatamanyat pradarśyate ||
tatra ‘kāvyaśobhākarān’ ityanena śleṣopamādivadguṇarasabhāvatadābhāsapraśamā‘prasādādīn’ khadīnapyupagṛhṇāti‘anuguhṇāti’ ka | mārgavibhāgaṃkṛdguṇānāmalaṃkriyopadeśena śleṣādīnāṃ guṇatvamivālaṃkāratvamapi jñāpayati—
śleṣaḥ prasādaḥ samatā mādhuryaṃ sukumāratā |
arthavyaktirudāratvamojaḥkāntisamādhayaḥ ||
iti vaidarbhamārgasya prāṇā daśa guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ |
teṣāṃ viparyayaḥ prāyo ‘gauḍavartmani lakṣyate’ kalakṣyate gauḍavartmani ||
iti śleṣādīnāṃ daśānāmeva ‘mārgapratibhākāritāṃ’ kamārgapravibhāgakāritāṃ bruvankāvyaśobhākaratvena guṇāntarāṇāmapyalaṃkāratvamupakalpayati || tadāha, ‘kastānkārtsnyena ‘iti’ ityadhikaṃ kavakṣyati’ | yuktamidamuktam | ayuktaṃ tvidamuktaṃ rasānāmalaṃkārateti ||
teṣāṃ guṇānāmivālaṃkāravyapadeśābhāvāt | nāyuktam | ‘uktotkarṣāṇām’ khayuktotkarṣāṇāmūrjasvirasava‘preyānāmupadeśena’ katpreyasāmalaṃkāreṣūpadeśāt | tad yathā—
preyaḥ priyatarākhyānaṃ rasavad rasapeśalam |
ūrjasvi rụ̄dhāhaṃkāraṃ yuktotkarṣaṃ ca tattrayam || 172 ||
tatrorjasvi rụ̄dhāhaṃkāramityanena ātmaviśeṣaniṣṭhasyotkṛṣṭā‘utkṛṣṭajanmano’ khadṛṣṭajanmano 'nekajanmānubhava‘saṃskārā hi taddrạdhimnaḥ’ khasaṃskārāhitadrạdhimnaḥ ‘saṃgrāmeṇa sampadutpādātiśayahetoḥ’ kasaṃgrāme guṇasaṃpadutpādātiśayahetoralaṃkāra‘alaṃkāraviśeṣasya’ ityasya sthāne ‘viśeṣasya’ khaviśeṣasyopasaṃgrahādahaṃkārābhimānaśrṛṅa‍gārāparanāmno rasasya mānamayavikārarūpeṇābhimānināṃ manasi jāgrataḥ parāṃ koṭimupavarṇayati | rasa-
vadrasapeśalamityanena vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisāttvikasaṃyogādrasaniṣpattiriti ratyādirūpeṇānekadhāvirbhavato 'bhivardhamānasya‘vivardhamānasya’ ga paraprakarṣagāminaḥ śrṛṅa‍gārasya ‘madhyamāvasthām’ ka khamadhyāvasthāṃ sūcayati | preyaḥ ‘pre[yaḥ pri ?]yatarākhyānam’ ka, kha pustake ‘priyaḥ’ nāstipriyatarākhyānamityanena samastabhāvamūrdhābhiṣiktāyā rateḥ ‘paraprakarṣādhigamāt’ ityasya sthāne ‘prakarṣādhigamāt’ khaparaprakarṣādhigamād ‘bhāvanābhigame’ ka khabhāvanādhigame bhāvarūpatāmullaṅa‍ghya premarūpeṇa ‘pariṇatāyāmupādānāt’ ka, ‘pariṇatā [yā] upādānāt’ gapariṇatāyā upādānād bhāvāntarāṇāmapi paraprakarṣādhigame rasarūpeṇa pariṇatiriti ‘jñāpayannalaṅa‍kārasyottarāṃ’ kha jñāpayannahaṃkārasyottarāṃ koṭimupalakṣayati | sarveṣāmapi hi ratyādiprakarṣāṇāṃ ratipriyo raṇapriyaḥ parihāsapriyo 'marṣapriya iti ‘premaṇyeba’ ka, ‘premṇaeva’ kha premṇayeva paryavasānaṃ bhavati | yuktotkarṣaṃ ca tat trayamityanenāyuktotkarṣāṇāṃ trayāṇāmapyūrjasviprabhṛtīnāṃ guṇatvameva nālaṃkāratvamityavasthāpayati | tathā hi—aurjityaṃ bhāvikatvaṃ bhāvikaṃ preya’ ka kha preya iti guṇeṣūpadiśyate,‘guṇeṣu bhaṇyate’ ka kha kutaḥ punaridamekadorjasvi—rasavat—preyasāmalaṃkāratvamanyadā guṇatvam‘anyadā guṇatvam’ ka |
ucyate—
bhūmanindāpraśaṃsāsu nityayoge 'tiśāyane |
saṃsarge 'stivivakṣāyāṃ bhavanti matubādayaḥ ||
yathā gomān deśaḥ, vācālo baṭuḥ, vāgmī vipaścit, ‘phalino vṛkṣāḥ’ kakṣīriṇo vṛkṣāḥ, balavān mallaḥ‘mando’ ka daṇḍī, gomatī ‘śoṇeti’ kaśāleti | tatrorjasvirasavatoralaṃkāratvavivakṣāyāmatiśāyane‘atiśāyane vā’ ka kha bhūmni vā ‘matubarthīyaḥ’ ka khamatvarthīyaḥ | guṇatvavivakṣāyāṃ tu
praśaṃsānityayoriti yogayoriti draṣṭavyam | nityo hi kāvye guṇayoga iva rasādiyogaḥ | guṇavato rasavataśca niścitaivāsya praśaṃsā | saṃsargastu guṇānāmavaśyamupādāneṣu | nindā punardoṣahānernāvatarati‘doṣahānerna’ vitarati’ ka, ‘doṣahānena vitarati’ kha | guṇeṣu ‘prema iti’ khapreya iti rūpābhedāt kathamalaṃkāratve tadutkarṣapratītiḥ | yathā ‘yudhiṣṭhiraḥ śreṣṭhatamaḥ kurūṇām’ iti tatrātiśāyikāntareṇa‘tatrātiśāyiguṇāntareṇa’ ka kha tadavagatiriti cet ihāpi ‘yuktotkarṣaṃ ca tattrayam’ iti vākyāntareṇa bhaviṣyati | na cātiśāyikā svārthātiriktaṃ kimapi bruvate, api tu prakṛtyupāttameva prakarṣādikaṃ gamayanti | svārthikeṣu hyete vidhīyante | evamavasthāpite guṇarasānāmalaṃkāratve ‘ṣaṭprakārako’ kaṣaṭprakāro rasālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ saṃbhavati—guṇasaṃkaraḥ, alaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ, guṇālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ, rasasaṃkaraḥ, rasaguṇasaṃkaraḥ, ‘rasālaṃkārasaṃkaraśceti’ ka kharasālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ iti | ‘nanvatra’ ka khananu ca guṇānāṃ saṃkaravyavahāro nopapadyate bahuṣvapi guṇeṣu guṇavadityeva vyapadeśāt | maivam | trividhā guṇāḥ—śabdaguṇāḥ, arthaguṇāḥ, doṣaguṇāśca | te tu pratyekaṃ dvidhā—ullekhavantaḥ, nirullekhāśca | tatra śabdaguṇeṣu samādhimādhuryaudāryagāmbhīryādayaḥ sollekhāḥ, śleṣaprasādasamatā‘saukumāryādayo’ ka khamādhuryādayo nirullekhāḥ | arthaguṇeṣu prasādarītikāntyādayaḥ sollekhāḥ, arthavyaktisaukṣmya‘gāmbhīryādayo’ khagāmbhīryasaṃmitatvādayo nirullekhāḥ | doṣaguṇeṣu grāmyapunaruktāpārthānyārthādayaḥ sollekhāḥ, śabdahīnasaṃbhramāpakramaviṃsandhyādayo nirullekhāḥ | tatra sajātīyānāṃ sollekhānāmevaṃ, ‘vijātīyānāṃ vijātīyānāṃ tu’ ghavijātīyānāṃ tu nirullekhānāmapi saṃkaravyavahāraḥ pravartate ||
sajātīyānāṃ śabdaguṇeṣu samādhyādīnāṃ yathā—
‘ṇavapallavesu lolaï gholaï ‘vilavesu’ ka kha gaviḍavesu valaï siharesu |
thavaï thavaesu a ‘mahā’ katahā vasaṃtalacchī asoassa || 455 ||’
[navapallaveṣu lolati ghūrṇate viṭapeṣu valate śikhareṣu |
sthagati stabakeṣu ca tathā vasantalakṣmīraśokasya ||]
atrānyadharmāṇāmanyatrāropaṇaṃ samādhiḥ pṛthakpadatā mādhuryaṃ, ‘bandhavigūḍhatvam’ khabandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, ‘ 'dhvanimattā’ ghadhvanimattā, gāmbhīryamiti sajātīyāḥ saṃkīryante | yato vasantalakṣmīraśokasyeti padayoḥ śabdadhvanirapi parisphurati | yathā kasyacidaśokasya mānino 'ṅa‍geṣu priyāṅa‍ganā savilāsaṃ ceṣṭate tathāsyeyamiti ||
‘anyārthaguṇeṣu’ kaarthaguṇeṣu śleṣādīnāṃ yathā—
‘janaḥ puṇyairyāyājjaladhijalabhāvaṃ jalamuca- stathāvasthaṃ cainaṃ nidadhatu ‘śubhe’ kaśubhaiḥ śuktivadane |
tatastāṃ śreyobhiḥ pariṇatimasau vindatu ‘yathā’ ka khayayā ruciṃ tanvanpīnastani hṛdi tavāyaṃ viluṭhati || 456 ||’
atra ‘saṃvidhāneṣu sūtratā’ khasaṃvidhāne susūtratā śleṣaḥ, arthasya prākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, utpattyādikriyākramo rītiḥ dīptarasatvaṃ kāntirityarthaguṇāḥ sajātīyāḥ saṃkīryante ||
doṣaguṇeṣu ‘śramādīnāṃ’ kagrāmyādīnāṃ yathā—
‘hanyate sā varārohā smareṇākāṇḍavairiṇā |
hanyate cārusarvāṅa‍gī hanyate mañjubhāṣiṇī || 457 ||’
atra hanyata ‘ityasaṅa‍gatārtham’ khaityamaṅa‍galārtham, varārohetyaślīlārtham, ‘hanyate’ ka khahanyate hanyata
iti punaruktam, cārusarvāṅa‍gītyuktvā ‘uktau’ ka khavarāroheti vyartham, ta ete sajātīyāścatvāro 'pi doṣaguṇāḥ saṃkīryamāṇāḥ kasyacidunmattabhāṣiṇo 'nukampādyatiśayavivakṣāyāmabhyanujñāyante || yadāha—
‘anukampādyatiśayaṃ’ khaanukampādyatiśayo yadi kaścidvivakṣyate‘vivakṣate’ kha |
na doṣaḥ punaruktādau pratyuteyamalaṃkriyā ||
‘atha sajātīyām’ kha ghaarthāsajātīyānāṃ śabdaguṇānāmarthaguṇānāṃ ca saṃkaro yathā—
‘ko nāma nodayati nāstamupaiti ko vā lokottaraḥ punarayaṃ savitā jagatsu |
yatrodayāstamayabhāji rucāṃ nidhāne dvedhā bhavatyahariti kṣaṇadeti kālaḥ || 458 ||’
atra yāvadarthapadatā ‘sasmitatvam’ khasaṃmitatvam, samyagbandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, ‘ślāghyaviśeṣaguṇayoga’ ityasya sthāne ‘viśeṣaguṇayoga’ ka khaślādhyaviśeṣaguṇayoga udāttatvamiti śabdaguṇāḥ, uktārthanirvahaṇaṃ praụdhiḥ, arthaprākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, rụ̄dhāhaṃkārataurjityamityarthaguṇāḥ saṃkīryante ||
śabdaguṇānāṃ doṣaguṇānāṃ ca yathā—
‘ehyehi vatsa raghunandana pūrṇacandra cumbāmi mūrdhani ‘cirāya’ ka kha mudrite mahāravīracarite caciraṃ ca pariṣvaje tvām |
āropya vā hṛdi divāniśamudvahāmi vande 'thavā caraṇapuṣkarakadvayaṃ te || 459 ||
atra bhāvato ‘vākpratipattiḥ’ ka khavākpravṛttirbhāvikatvam, prasiddhārthapadatā prasādaḥ, ‘priyārthapadopādānam’ ka khapriyārthapadopādānaṃ preya iti śabdaguṇāḥ, ehyehīti punaruktam, vatse-
tyuktvā tvatpādābjadvayaṃ vanda iti viruddham, mūrdhni cumbāmi hṛdi vahāmītyādau vanda iti kriyāsvanupayogāt ‘pūrṇacandranidarśanādi—’ khapūrṇacandretidarśanādikriyopayogi vyarthaṃ ceti ‘doṣaguṇāḥ parasparaṃ saṃkīryante’ ka khadoṣaguṇāḥ saṃkīryante | rasākṣiptacittādau hi punaruktādayo ‘na’ ga nāstina duṣyanti ||
arthaguṇānāṃ doṣaguṇānāṃ yathā—
‘kiṃ dvāri daivahatike sahakārakeṇa saṃvardhitena viṣapādapa eṣa pāpaḥ |
asminmanāgapi vikāsavikārabhāji bhīmā bhavanti madanajvarasaṃnipātāḥ || 460 ||’
atra dīptarasatvaṃ kāntiḥ, arthaprākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, uktārthanirvahaṇaṃ praụdhirityarthaguṇāḥ, daivahatike viṣapādapo 'yaṃ pāpa ityamaṅa‍galārthaṃ grāmyaṃ, kimanena saṃvardhitenetyatra madanajvarasaṃnipātā ityatra ca kṛtyaprayojanādervirahiṇo draṣṭurityādeścādhyāhārādasaṃpūrṇavākyatāyāmarthavyaktiviparyayaḥ | asminvikāsavikārabhājīti vikāsaśabdasya puṣpaviṣayatvādvṛkṣe 'pi prayogo 'vācakatvādasamartha iti doṣaguṇā mithaḥ saṃkīryante | yato rasākṣepātparihāsaleśoktyāmaṅa‍galam, praviśa piṇḍīṃ dvāraṃ bhakṣaya iti nyāyātprasiddhādhyāhāraḥ, ‘darī vadati, mañcāḥ krośantī’ ti prayogadarśanādādhārādheyayorabhedopacāraśca viruddhalakṣaṇādibhiḥ prayujyamāno na doṣāyeti ||
athālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ |
sa yadyapi vyaktāvyaktobhayātmatayā tilataṇḍulakādibhedaiḥ pradhānāṅa‍gabhāvasamakakṣatābhyāṃ purastāduktaḥ tathāpi teṣāṃ guṇādisaṃkarāsādhāraṇa-
tvātsaṃprati sādhāraṇaḥ prakāra ucyate | sa ṣọdhā śabdālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ, arthālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ, ubhayālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ śabdārthālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ, ‘śabdobhayālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ’ khaśabdārthobhayālaṃkārasaṃkaraḥ, arthobhayālaṃkārasaṃkaraścaatra ‘ca’ ityadhikaṃ ka kha | teṣu śabdālaṃkārasaṃkaro yathā—
‘haṃsānāmālī paṅktiḥ | ambaramākāśamaramatyantamārụ̄dhā | kiṃbhūtā |’ bhayena cañcalā | punaḥ kiṃbhūtā | sarasā rasasahitā | punaḥ kiṃbhūtā | sarāsāḥ saśabdā ye sārasāsteṣāṃ rāsaḥ krīḍā yasyāstathā | punaḥ kiṃbhūtā | ārāse śabde yo rasastatsahitā | punaḥ kiṃbhūtā | sarasaṃ saraḥ gamanaṃ tenāsyate kṣipyate sarāsaḥ | sarasi bhavaḥ sārasaḥ | sa cāsau sa ca | evaṃvidho rāsaḥ krīḍā yasyāstatheti’ gha pustakasyāyuṣi ṭippaṇīhaṃsālī bhayataralā sārā sarasā sarāsasārasarāsā‘sarāsusā’ ka |
‘ambaramārụ̄dhā’ ka, ‘ambarasārarụ̄dhā’ khaambaramaramārụ̄dhā sārāsarasā sarāsasārasarāsā ||
atra saṃskṛtaprākṛtabhāṣāsaṃśleṣaḥ, gatapratyāgataṃ citraṃ, ‘pādāvṛttiyamakam’ ka khapadāvṛttiyamakaṃ, varṇānuprāsaśceti catvāraḥ ‘śabdālaṃkārāḥ’ ka khaśabdālaṃkārāḥ saṃkīryante ||
arthālaṃkārasaṃkaro yathā—
‘vāsāvasthitatāmracūḍavayasāmāyāmibhiḥ kūjitairdūrādapyanumīyamānavasatirgrāmo 'yamantarvaṇam |
yatroddīptakukūla‘sṛgālakūlavisaradhūmyāndhanaṃ’ ka, ‘kukūlakūṭabisaraddhūmyāghanaṃ’ khakūṭavisarajjhampāghanaṃ ghūrṇate sandhyāntollasadacchabhallapaṭalacchāyājaṭālaṃ tamaḥ || 461 ||’
atra tāmracūḍavayasāṃ kūjitairityanumānam, yatra tamo ghūrṇata iti jñāpakahetuḥ, kukūlakūṭavisarajjhampāghanamiti sandhyāntollasadacchabhallapaṭa-
lacchāyājaṭālamiti ca kārakahetuḥ, jāyamānapadārthasvarūpābhidhānaṃ jātirityarthālaṃkārāścatvāro mithaḥ saṃkīryante ||
ubhayālaṃkārasaṃkaro yathā—
‘ṇa hu ṇavaraṃ dīvasihāsāricchaṃ‘saricchaṃ’ kha caṃpaehiṃ‘campaehi’ kha paḍivaṇṇam |
kajjalakajjaṃ ri ‘kajjammi’ kakaaṃ ‘ābhamantehi bhamalehi’ khauari bhamantehiṁ bhamarehiṁ || 462 ||’
[na khalu kevalaṃ dīpaśikhāsādṛśyaṃ campakaiḥ pratipannam |
kajjalakāryamapi kṛtamupari bhramadbhirbhramaraiḥ ||]
atra campakādīnāṃ pradīpaśikhābhirākārakāntibhyāmupamā,‘ākārakāntimupamāṃ’ ka virahiṇīhṛdayadāhodyā‘virahiṇīhṛdayadāhodyamadyotanārthakriyābhyāṃ’ ka, ‘virahiṇīhṛdayadāhapradyotanārthakriyābhyāṃ’ khanadyotanārthakriyābhyāṃ sāmyaṃ, ‘kajjalapaṭalānāmivopari’ ka, ’kajjalapaṭalānāmupari’ khakajjalapaṭalānāmiva bhramarapaṭalānāmupari melanānmelitaṃ, campakadīpakalikayoriva bhramarakajjalapaṭalayoraupamyādisaṃbandhātsamuccaya ityubhayālaṃkārāścatvāro‘catvāro mithaḥ saṃkīryante’ ka, ‘catvāro 'pi saṃkīryante’ kha mithaḥ saṃkīryamāṇā upalabhyante ||
śabdārthālaṃkārasaṃkaro yathā—
‘sarvāśārudhi ‘dagdhavīradhi’ kadagdhavīrudhi ‘ruṣā’ kasadā sāraṅa‍gabaddhakrudhi kṣāmakṣmāruhi mandamunmadhulihi svacchandakandadruhi’svacchandakundadruhi’ ka kha |
śuṣyatsrotasi ‘taptabhūrirajasi jvālāyamānārṇasi’ ka khataptabhūmirajasi jvālāyamānāmbhasi ‘jyeṣṭhe’ khagrīṣme māsi kharārkatejasi kathaṃ pāntha vrajañjīvasi || 463 ||’
atrāvantikā rītiḥ, padamudrā, vibhaktimudrā, anuprāsaśceti śabdā-﻿
laṃkārāḥ, jātiḥ, ‘jñāpakakārakahetū’ kakārakajñāpakau hetū, citrahetuścetyarthālaṃkārā ‘mithaḥ śabde saṃkīryante’ khamithaḥ saṃkīryante |
‘evamubhayālaṃkārasaṃkaro yathā’ kaśabdobhayālaṃkārasaṃkaro yathā—
‘stokastokamamūbhirambaratale tārābhirastaṃ gataṃ gacchatyastagireḥ śirastadanu ca cchāyādaridraḥ śaśī |
pratyāsannatarodayasya taraṇerbimbāruṇimnā tato mañjiṣṭhārasalohinī digapi ca prācī samunmīlati || 464 ||’
atra samunmīlatīti vibhaktimudrā, stokastokamastaṃ gataṃ‘astaṃ gacchatītyādiḥ’ kha gacchatītyādiranuprāsaśca śabdālaṃkārāḥ, hetūpamā, samādhiḥ, anukramaḥ, samuccayoktiścetyubhayālaṃkārā mithaḥ saṃkīryante ||
arthobhayālaṃkārasaṃkaro yathā—
‘khaṃ vaste kalaviṅa‍kakaṇṭhamalinaṃ kādambinīkambalaṃ ‘carcā’ ka gacarcāṃ pārayatīva dardurakulaṃ kolāhalairunmadam |
gandhaṃ muñcati siktalā‘siktajālasurabhi’ ka, ‘siktalājasurabhiḥ’ khajasurabhiṃ varṣeṇa dagdhā sthalī durlakṣyo 'pi vibhāvyate kamalinīhāsena bhāsāṃ patiḥ || 465 ||’
atra jātiḥ, anumānam, kārakajñāpakahetū cetyarthālaṃkārāḥ, rūpakopamā, hetūpamā, utprekṣopameti ‘ceti ubhayālaṃkārāḥ’ ka khacobhayālaṃkārā mithaḥ saṃkīryante ||
etena guṇālaṃkārasaṃkaro 'pi vyākhyātaḥ | ‘ato’ ka khayato yadyapi guṇavatyeva vākye 'laṃkā‘saṃkarayogaḥ’ ka kharayogastathāpi kvacid guṇasya prādhānyaṃ kvacidalaṃkārasyeti pradhānāṅa‍gabhāvena guṇālaṃkārayoḥ saṃkaravyavahāraḥ pravartate | sa ṣọdhā—śabda-
guṇapradhānaḥ, arthaguṇapradhānaḥ, ‘doṣālaṃkārapradhānaḥ’ kadoṣaguṇapradhānaḥ, śabdālaṃkārapradhānaḥ, arthālaṃkārapradhānaḥ, ubhayālaṃkārapradhānaśca‘iti’ ityadhikaṃ ka kha ||
teṣu śabdaguṇapradhāno yathā—
‘prāptaśrīreṣa kasmātpunarapi ‘mathituṃ mandaraṃ vā’ kha | padyametad dhvanyāloke (2|30) 'pyudāhṛtammayi taṃ manthakhedaṃ vidadhyānnidrāmapyasya pūrvāmanalasamanaso naiva‘nāpyahaṃ tarkayāmi’ ka saṃbhāvayāmi |
setuṃ badhnāti bhūyaḥ kimiti ca sakaladvīpanāthānuyātastvayyāyāte vitarkāniti dadhata‘vidadhati’ ka ivābhāti kampaḥ payodheḥ 466’
atra hetūtprekṣābhidhāne tvayītyādau pade viṣṇoḥ svarūpādhyāsena tadbhāvāpattau samādheriha prādhānyaṃ‘samādheḥ prādhānyamiha’ ka kha pratīyate | nanu cāyamarthasya prākaṭyātprasādo 'rthaguṇaḥ kasmānna bhavati | asminnapi tavdyapadeśena śabdaśakterādhikyāt | nanu ca tvayi iti, eṣa iti, asya iti, ‘yuṣmadetadidamadaḥ’ ka, ‘yuṣmadasmadidamāṃ’ ghayuṣmadetadidamāṃ na kaścana‘kaścinna viṣṇuvācī’ ka viṣṇuvācī ‘sa kathaṃ varṇanīye vastuni tamarthamabhidadhyāt’ ka khasa kathaṃ varṇanīye nyastastaṃ tamarthamabhidadhīta | ucyate, sarvanāmatvenaiṣāṃ sarvavācitvāt | sarvanāmāni hi ‘sarvanāmābhidhāyīnyapi’ ka khasarvābhidhāyīnyapi ‘prakaraṇādigamyaṃ viśeṣamarthaṃ ca bruvate’ ka, ‘prakaraṇādigamyaviśeṣamiva bruvate’ khaprakaraṇādigamyaṃ viśeṣameva bruvate sa ca iha prāptaśrīrityevamādimirabhivyakta‘abhivyaktamevābhigamyate iti’ ka, ‘abhivyakta evābhigamyate iti’ khamevāvagamyata iti ||
arthaguṇapradhāno yathā—
‘lakṣmīvaśīkaraṇacūrṇasahodarāṇi tvatpādapaṅa‍kajarajāṃsi ciraṃ jayanti |
yāni praṇāmamilitāni nṛṇāṃ lalāṭe ‘limpanti’ gha lumpanti daivalikhitāni durakṣarāṇi || 467 ||
‘atra hetuvākyaübhayālaṃkāraprādhānyenārdhaprākaṭayamarthaguṇaḥ pratīyate’ kaatra hetusāmyobhayālaṃkārābhidhāne 'pi prādhānyenārthaprākaṭyamarthaguṇaḥ pratīyate ||
doṣaguṇapradhāno yathā—
‘yenāpaviddhasalilasphuṭanāgasadmā devāsurairamṛtamambunidhirmamanthe |
vyāvartanairahipaterayamāhitāṅa‍kaḥ khaṃ vyālikhanniva vibhāti sa mandarādriḥ || 468 ||’
atra ‘vyāvartanairahipaterayamāhitāṅa‍kaḥ’ iti jñāpakahetoḥ ‘khaṃ vyālikhanniva’ iti utprekṣāvayavācca, devāsurairiti ‘nityavivakṣāyāma’ khanityavairāvivakṣāyāṃ bahuvacanam, ‘amṛtamambunidhirmamanthe’ iti dvikarmakeṣvapi mathiprabhṛtīnāmupasaṃkhyānamiti amṛtaśabdāddvitīyā iti doṣaguṇayoḥ prādhānyaṃ pratīyate | nanu cātrārthasya ‘prādhānyaṃ na bhavati’ ka khaprādhānyaṃ kathaṃ bhavati tadviṣayasya jñāpakahetunāpahṛtatvātso 'pyarthālaṃkāra eva | guṇālaṃkārayośca tulyakakṣatāyāmalaṃkāraḥ pradhānaṃ bhavati na guṇaḥ | guṇairhi guṇabhūtairevālaṃkārāḥ prāya ārabhyante | tadyathā—
‘aspṛṣṭā doṣamātrābhiḥ samagraguṇagumphitā |
vipañcīsvarasaubhāgyā vaidarbhī rītiripyate |
‘samastetyutkaṭapadām’ ka, ‘samastātyutkaṭapadām’ khasamastātyudbhaṭapadāmojaḥkāntisamanvitām |
‘gauḍīyāṃ tāṃ’ ka khagauḍīyeti vijānanti rītiṃ rītivicakṣaṇāḥ ||
āśliṣṭaṃ ślathabhāvāṃ tu purāṇacchāyamāśritām |
madhurāṃ ‘sukumārīṃ ca’ khasukumārāṃ ca pāñcālīṃ kavayo viduḥ ||
mādhuryamapi vāñchanta; prasādaṃ ca subhedhasaḥ |
samāsavanti bhūyāṃsi na padāni prayuñjate ||
lāṭīyāvantyayo rītyormāgadhyāṃ ca kvacitkvacit |
kecidojo 'bhidhitsantaḥ samasyanti bahūnyapi ||
pratītaśabdamojasvi ‘suśliṣṭapadasaṃghitā’ ka, ‘suśliṣṭapadasaṃdhimatta’ khasuśliṣṭapadasaṃdhi ca |
prasādi svabhidhānaṃ ca yamakaṃ kṛtinā matamcāyāmakaṃ kṛtināṃ matam’ ka kha ||’ iti |
mā bhūdalaṃkāratulyakakṣatayā arthasya prādhānyaṃ‘arthapradhānodāraguṇasya’ kha śabdaguṇasya tu ślāghyaviśeṣaguṇayoga udāttamityādeḥ kimiti prādhānyaṃ na bhavati doṣaguṇānāmatīvollekhavattvena‘matīvollekhavidhitvena’ ka kha prādhānyāt‘pra(prā)dhānyāt’ ka ||
atra ‘yathā—’ ityadhikaṃ kasā vāmanaprasiddhirlaṅghitanabhaso balidviṣo 'dyāpi |
matsariṇaḥ khalu lokā marmāṇyevānubadhnanti ||
doṣasya yo guṇībhāvaḥ sa tato 'pyadhikaṃ prakāśata iti ||
śabdālaṃkāraprādhāno yathā—
‘yaccandrakoṭikarakorakabhārabhāji‘korakabhārabhāji’ ka, ‘korakahārabhāji’ kha babhrāma babhruṇi jaṭāpaṭale harasya |
tadvaḥ punātu himaśailaśilānikuñjajhā- ‘ṭāṅa‍kāraḍambaravirāvi’ ka, ‘prākāraḍambaravirāvi’ khatkāraḍambaravirāvi surāpagāmbhaḥ || 469 ||’
atrārthaprākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ vibhavotkarṣa udāttatā mṛduprasphuṭonmiśravarṇānāmavaiṣamyaṃ samatā, bandhagāḍhatā, aurjityamityādibhyo guṇebhyaḥ prādhānyena śabdālaṃkārānuprāsaḥ pratīyate ||
arthālaṃkārapradhāno yathā—
‘āśleṣiṇaḥ ‘pṛthurataklama’ ka khapṛthutaraklamapītaśītamāyāvinīrghanamudo rajanīryuvānaḥ |
‘kaṇṭhaiḥ’ khaūrdhvormuhurvalanabandhanasandhilolapādāntasaṃvalitatūlapaṭāḥ‘lolapaṭāḥ’ ka kha svapanti || 470 ||’
atra bandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, ślādhyaviśeṣaṇayoga udāttatvam‘udāttatā’ ka kha, vibhavotkarṣa audāryam, dīptarasatvam, kāntirityādibhyo guṇebhyaḥ prādhānyena jātirarthālaṃkāraḥ pratīyate |
ubhayālaṃkārapradhāno yathā—
‘‘abhyudgatā’ khaabhyuddhṛtā vasumatī dalitaṃ ripūraḥ kroḍīkṛtā balavatā balirājalakṣmīḥ |
atraikajanmani kṛtaṃ yadanena yūnā janmatraye tadakarotpuruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ || 471 ||’
atroktiparipāṭīḥ‘uktiparipākaḥ’ ka praụdhiḥ, bandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, āśayotkarṣa udāttatvam, arthaprākaṭyaṃ, prasādaḥ—ityādibhyo guṇebhyaḥ śleṣopasarjanā viśeṣoktirubhayālaṃkāraḥ prādhānyena pratīyate || rasasaṃkaro 'pi cālaṃkārasaṃkaravadeva | bhāvarasābhāsapraśamānāṃ tilataṇḍulādiprakāreṇa saṃkaraḥ ‘ṣaṭprakāro’ ka khaṣaṭprakārako bhavati | tatra bhāvānāṃ tilataṇḍulaprakāro yathā—
‘nyakkāro hṛdi vajrakīla iva me tīvraḥ parispandate ghīrāndhe tamasīva majjati manaḥ saṃmīlitaṃ lajjayā |
‘tātavipattijo’ kha, ‘tārkṣyasajātīyatvāt tārkṣyo 'tra jaṭāyurabhidhīyate’ gha pustakasyāyuṣi ṭippaṇīśokastārkṣyavipattito ‘dahati yannāstyeva’ kadahati māṃ nāstyeva yasminkriyā ‘marmāṇīva’ khamarmāṇyeva punaśchinatti karuṇā sītāṃ varākīṃ prati || 472 ||’
atrāmarṣalajjāśokānukampāḥ samakakṣatayā mithastilataṇḍulavatsaṃkīryamāṇā rāmasya virahiṇo vāgārambhānubhā‘anurāgoktiparatayā’ ka khavoktiparatayā pratīyante ||
kṣīranīraprakāro yathā—
‘mānonnatetyasahanetyatipaṇḍiteti mayyeva dhikkṛtiranekamukhī sakhīnām |
dākṣiṇyamātramasṛṇena viceṣṭitena dhūrtasya tasya hi guṇā nu paraṃ jayanti || 473 ||’
atra sakhīṣu roṣaḥ priyaguṇeṣu cāsūyā, kṣīranīravanmithaḥ ‘saṃkīryamāṇau’ ka, ‘saṃkīryamāṇe’ khasaṃkīryamāṇau māninīvāgārambhaparatayā ‘pratīyete’ ka khapratīyete ||
chāyādarśaprakāro yathā
‘āḥ sīte patigarvavibhramabharabhrā‘prānta’ kantabhramadbāndhavapradhvaṃsasmitakāntimattava tadā jātaṃ yadetanmukham |
saṃpratyeva haṭhāttadeṣa‘tadeva’ ka kha kurute ‘keśoccayotkarṣaṇa’ ka khakeśoccayākarṣaṇatrāsottānitalolalocanapatadbāṣpaplutaṃ rāvaṇaḥ || 474 ||’
atra krodhābhāse chāyādarśanyāyena ratyābhāsaḥ ‘saṃkīryate’ ka khasaṃkīryamāṇa upalabhyate ||
‘narasiṃhavad yathā—’ kanarasiṃhaprakāro yathā—
‘kiṃ dvāri daivahatike sahakārakeṇa saṃvardhitena viṣapādapa eṣa pāpaḥ |
asminmanāgapi ‘vikāsavikārabhāji’ kavikāśavikārabhāji bhīmā bhavanti madanajvarasaṃnipātāḥ || 475 ||’
atra narasiṃhajātāviva siṃhanaraśarīrabhāgausiṃhanaraśarīravāgārambhānusāreṇa’ ka kha sahakāravarṇanāvāgārambhānusāreṇa sakhīviṣayānukampā sahakāraviṣayā ca kutsā mithaḥ saṃkīryete | tathā hi ‘daivahatikeśabdena’ ka khadaivahatike itiśabdena labdhāyāṃ niyatyupādhau sarvathaivānukampyamānatāyāṃ sahakārasaṃvardhananibandhanatvamevāsyāḥ kalā dyotyate | evaṃ nāma tvaṃ daivopahatāsi yatsahakārachadmānaṃ viṣapādapaṃ‘sahakāraviṣapādapaṃ’ ka kha dvāri saṃvardhayasīti‘iti’ ka kha nāsti | viṣapādapaśabdena ca‘ca’ ka kha labdhāyāṃ sahakārasya sarvathaiva kutsāyāṃ ‘vikāsakāla’ ka ghavikāsakāle kāminīnāmasahyasmarajvarasaṃnipātahetukatvamevāsyāḥ kapratyayena‘kanpratyayena’ ka pratyāyyate || taduktam—
kutsitatvena kutsāvānsamyagvāpi hi kutsitaḥ |
svaśabdābhihite kena viśiṣṭo 'rthaḥ pratīyate ||
na ca sāṃpratikī kutsā śabdabhede pratīyate |
‘yujyate’ khapūjyate kutsitatve 'pi praśastatve 'pi kutsyate‘iti’ ityadhikaṃ ka ||
tad yathā—
‘eka iha jīvaloke jīvatirūpaṃ nṛrūpapaśurūpaḥ‘nṛrūpapaśurūpaḥ’ iti ka pāṭhastruṭitaḥ | ‘na rūpamabhyudaye’ iti kha pāṭhaḥ |
yaḥ ‘premamātrapāśe’ ka, ‘yaḥ premamāśayāśe’ khapremapāśapāśe ‘mṛgavanna mṛgīdṛśāṃ’ khamṛga iva na mṛgīdṛśāṃ patita || 476 ||’
pāṃsūdakaprakāro‘pāṃśūdakaprakāro yathā’ ga yathā—
‘mā garvamudvaha kapolatale cakāsti kāntasvahastalikhitā mama mañjarīti |
anyāpi kiṃ na sakhi bhājanamīdṛśānāṃ vairī na cedbhavati vepathurantarāyaḥ || 477 ||’
atra svasaubhāgyavarṇanā mṛtpiṇḍe ‘pāṃśūdakayoriva’ gapāṃsūdakayorivāvibhāgamāpādyamānayorasūyāgarvayoḥ saṃkara upalabhyate‘upapadyate’ ka kha ||
citravarṇaprakāro yathā—
‘virodho viśrāntaḥ prasarati raso nirvṛtighana- stadauddhatya kvāpi vrajati vinayaḥ prahvayati mām |
jhaṭityasmindṛṣṭe kimapi paravānasmi yadi vā mahārghastīrthānāmiva‘kimiha mahatāṃ’ ka hi mahatāṃ ko 'pyatiśayaḥ || 478 ||’
atra vīrauddhatyasvātantryavyarasānāmānandapraśamapāravaśyarasaistiraskriyamāṇānāṃ ‘paṭavarṇanīlādibhiḥ’ ka, ‘paṭanīlādibhiḥ’ khapaṭa iva nīlādibhiḥ ‘sitādīnāṃ’ kasītādīnāṃ praśamā rāmadarśanaprabhāvodbhave-
lavasya vismayātiśayapraśamajanmani ‘vāgārambhānubhāvopamādbhavedetaccitravarṇavat’ ka, ‘vāgārambhānubhāvopamodbhavecitravarṇavat’ khavāgārambhānubhāvopamāpade citravarṇavatsaṃkīryamāṇāḥ samupalabhyante ||
atha ‘atha ko 'yaṃ guṇasaṃkaraḥ’ karasaguṇasaṃkaraḥ |
nanu ca ‘nanu doṣahāniriva’ kha , ‘doṣahāni namiva’ ca ghadoṣahānamiva guṇopādānamapi niyamanirvartyam‘niyamanivartyam’ ka | alaṃkārayoga iva rasāviyogo 'pyavaśyaṃ vidheyaḥ | kadācidalaṃkārayogo 'pi tyajyate ‘nanu rasādivyabhicaritasaṃbandhāviti’ ka ga pustake ca ‘natu’ ityasya sthāne ‘nanu’ iti vartatena tu rasāviyogo guṇayogaśca vyabhicaritasaṃbandhāviti | atrocyate | yatra citra‘varṇavat’ gavarṇavannarasiṃhavatpāṃsūdakava‘pāśūdakavacca’ ga ccāvayavāvayavinyāyena jātivyaktinyāyena ‘vāpṛthak’ ka cāpṛthakprayatnanirvartyānāṃ‘prayatnānirbartyānāṃ’ ka guṇarasānāṃ vākye saṃniveśastatra saṃkaravyavahāro na pravartate ||
tad yathā—
madhuraṃ rasavadvāci vastunyapi rasasthitiḥ |
yena mādyanti dhīmanto madhuneva madhuvratāḥ ||
kāmaṃ sarvo 'pyalaṃkāro rasamarthe niṣiñcati |
tathāpyagrāmyataivainaṃ bhāraṃ vahati bhūyasā ||
śṛṅa‍gāra eva ‘sarveṣu’ kamadhuraḥ paraprahlādano rasaḥ‘paraḥ prahlādano rasaḥ’ iti dhvanyāloke (2|8) |
tanmayaṃ kāvyamāśritya mādhuryaṃ pratitiṣṭhati ||
śṛṅa‍gāre vipralambhākhye karuṇe ca prakarṣavat |
mādhuryamārdratāṃ yāti yatastatrādhikaṃ manaḥ ||
raudrādayo rasā dīptyā lakṣyante ‘kāryavartinaḥ’ kakāvyavartinaḥ |
‘tadva‍yaktihetū śabdāthāṃvojo 'dhiṣṭhāya tiṣṭhati’ ka, dhvanyāloke tu ‘tadva‍yaktihetū śabdārthāvāśrityojo vyavasthitam |’ iti pāṭhaḥtavdyaktihetū śabdārthāvojodhiṣṭhāya tiṣṭhati ||
‘samarpakatvaṃ vāpyasya’ ka, dhvanyāloke tu 'samarpakatvaṃ kāvyasya’ itisamarthakatvaṃ vākyasya yattu sarvarasānprati |
sa prasādo guṇo jñeyaḥ sarvasādhāraṇakriyaḥ ||’
seyaṃ guṇānāṃ rasārambhakatve saṃkarāprasiddhiḥ | evaṃ rasānāṃ guṇārambhakatve 'pi | tadyathā—rụ̄dhāhaṃkārataurjityam, ‘bhāvato vāk‌pravṛttiḥ’ ka, ‘bhāvayato vākyavṛttiḥ’ khabhāvato vāk‌pravṛttirbhāvikatvam, ‘krodhādāvapyasya tīvratvaṃ’ ka, ‘krodhādāvapi tīvratā’ khakrodhādāvapyatīvratā, mādhuryam, āśayotkarṣaḥ, udāttatvam, arthasyābhīṣṭatamatā, ‘arthasyābhīṣṭatanmayatā’ khapreyaḥ, dīptarasatvaṃ, kāntiriti | yatra tu tilatandulavat‘tilataṇḍulavat’ ka kha kṣīranīravacchāyādarśavat tulyakakṣatayaiva guṇarasānāṃ ‘vākye pṛthak prayatna’ ka khavākye 'pṛthakprayatnanirvartyānāṃ viniveśastatra saṃkaravyavahāraḥ pravartata eva | sa ṣọdhā—guṇapradhānaḥ—rasapradhānaḥ, ubhayapradhānaḥ, ubhayāpradhānaḥ, guṇādhikaḥ, rasādhika iti ||
teṣu guṇapradhāno yathā—
‘atrāntare lalitahāralatānitambasaṃvāhanaskhalitavegataraṅgitāṅa‍gī |
devī vyapāsya śayanaṃ dhṛtamānatanturantaḥpuraṃ gatavatī saha sauvidallaiḥ || 479 ||’
atrārthaprākaṭyaudāryayorarthaśabdaguṇayoḥ ‘prādhānyaṃ na ratikrodhayoḥ’ ga nāstiprādhānyaṃ ‘na bhavati krodhayoḥ’ khana ratikrodhayoriti guṇapradhānaḥ ||
rasapradhāno yathā—
‘asminnagṛhyata pinākabhṛtā salīla- mārabdhavepathuradhīravilocanāyāḥ |
vinyastamaṅa‍galamahauṣadhirīśvarāyāḥ srastoragapratisareṇa kareṇa pāṇiḥ || 480 ||’
atra ślādhvaviśeṣaṇayoga udāttatvam, bandhavikaṭatvamudāratā, arthaprākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, dīptarasatvaṃ kāntiriti guṇāḥ sādhvasavilāsānurāgasaṃgamarasairatiśayyanta iti rasapradhānaḥ ||
ubhayapradhāno yathā—
‘āpātamātrarasike sarasīruhasya kiṃ bījamarpayitumicchasi vāpikāyām |
kālaḥ kalirjagadidaṃ na kṛtajñamajñe sthitvā hariṣyati tavaiva mukhasya śobhām || 481 ||’
atra bhaṇitiviśeṣa uktiḥ saṃvidhāne ‘svasūtratā’ khasusūtratā śleṣa iti śabdaguṇayorlāvaṇyavilāsavarṇanīyarasayośca tulyakakṣatayā nirdeśa‘nirdiśatyubhayapradhānaḥ’ ka ityubhayapradhānaḥ ||
ubhayāpradhāno yathā—
‘abhinavavadhūroṣasvāduḥ karīṣatanūnapā- dasaralajanāśleṣakrūrastuṣārasamīraṇaḥ |
galitavibhavasyājñevādya‘āhevātha’ ga dyutirmasṛṇā rave- rvirahivanitāvaktraklaibyaṃ bibharti niśākaraḥ || 482 ||’
atra svādukrūramasṛṇaklaibya‘vaktraklaivya’ kamityanyadharmāṇāmanyatrāropaṇaṃ samādhiḥ, abhinavavadhūroṣādīnāṃ caturṇāmapyarthānāṃ svādvādīnāṃ ca lakṣaṇādilakṣitānāṃ prākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, abhinavavadhūroṣasvāduḥ karīṣatanūnapāt iti viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyāṇāmupakrameṇa nirvahaṇaṃ‘nibarhaṇam’ kha rītiḥ, pādacatuṣṭaye caturṇāmarthānāṃ vibhaktyasamatvena niveśaḥ saṃbhitatvamiti catvāro guṇāḥ, catvāraśca ratyamarṣaviṣādajugupsātmāno rasāḥ kālāvasthānivedanaparatvena pratīyanta ityubhayāpradhānaḥ ||
guṇādhiko yathā—
‘ajananirastu bibhūterapūraṇirbhavatu sarvakāmānām |
mā yāciṣi mā seviṣi mā sahiṣi parābhavaṃ dhaninaḥ || 483 ||’
atra suptiṅvyutpattiḥ‘vyutpattisauśabdyam’ kha sauśabdyam, vākyānāṃ paripūrṇatvamarthavyaktiḥ, arthasya prākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, vibhūteranutpattau kāmā na pūryante, aparipūrṇakāmo yācate, yācamānastadanāpnuvan dhaninaḥ sevate, sevamānastu taiḥ paribhūyata ityutpattyādikriyākramo rītiriti guṇāścatvāraḥ, rasastu nirveda evaika iti guṇādhikaḥ ||
ssādhiko yathā—
‘kamalamanambhasi kamale kuvalayametāni kanakalatikāyām |
sā ca sukumārasubhagetyutpātaparamparā keyam || 484 ||’
atra kamalamanambhaṃsi kamale kuvalayametāni kanakalatikāyām ityanyadharmāṇāmanyatrāropaṇaṃ samādhiḥ, sā ca sukumārasubhagetyutpātaparamparā keyamityaślīlāmaṅa‍galārthau doṣaguṇāvapi, ślādhyaviśeṣaguṇayoga udātta-
tvam, vikaṭabandhatvamudāratā, upakramābhedo rītiḥ, ‘arthasya prākaṭyaṃ’ kaarthaprākaṭyaṃ prasādaḥ, aniṣṭhuratā saukumāryam, ‘ābhīṣṭatamatā’ kaabhīṣṭatamatā preyaḥ, dīptarasatvaṃ kāntiriti guṇā daśa, rasāstu ratyutkarṣaharṣadhṛtyutkaṇṭhāvegavismaya‘mati’ kha nāstimativitarkacintācapalatāhāsotsāhastambhagadgadonmāda‘vrīḍāvahitthābhayaśaṅakāḥ’ kavrīḍāvahitthabhayaśaṅa‍kāḥ viṃśatirvāgārambhānubhāve śrṛṅa‍gāriṇaḥ priyācāṭukārasya kasyacitpratīyanta iti rasādhikaḥ ||
rasālaṃkārasaṃkaro 'pyetena vyākhyātaḥ |
rasavanti hi vastūni sālaṃkārāṇi kānicit |
ekenaiva prayatnena ‘nivartyante’ ka kha ganirvartyante mahākaveḥ || 173 ||
rasākṣiptatayā yasya bandhaḥ śakyakriyo bhavet |
apṛthagyatnanirvartyaḥ ‘so 'laṃkāro dhvanau mataḥ’ iti dhvanyālokeso 'laṃkāraḥ prakṛṣyate || 174 ||
rasābhāvādiviṣayavivakṣāvirahe sati |
alaṃkāranibandho yaḥ sa kavibhyo na rocate || 175 ||
tatra rasālaṃkārasaṃkaro dvidhā—rasapradhāno 'laṃkārapradhānaśca | ‘tayorye’ ka tayoryonubhavitraiva varṇyate sa rasapradhānaḥ | tatra hyalaṃkāravato vākyasya vāgārambhānubhāvatvaṃ bhavati ||
tatra ratāvupamāyāḥ saṃkaro yathā—
‘tīe daṃsaṇasuhae ‘paṇaaevalaṇa’ ka, ‘paṇaakavalaṇa’ khapaṇaakkhalaṇajaṇio muhammi maṇahare |
roso vi haraï hiaaṃ ‘maaaṃpaṃkova’ ka, ‘maaaṃkovva’ khamaapaṃko vva mialaṃchaṇammi‘maatadbalaṇṇi nisaṇṇe’ ka ṇisaṇṇo 485’
[tasyā darśanasubhage praṇayaskhalanajanito mukhe manohare |
roṣo 'pi harati hṛdayaṃ madapaṅa‍ka iva mṛgalāñchane niṣaṇṇaḥ ||]
atropamātiraskāreṇa rasavato harervacasi vāgārambharūpe rukmiṇīpradattapārijātamañjarīvilokanaprabhavaṃ satyabhāmāyā ‘eva’ kharoṣarāmaṇīyakaṃ prādhānyataḥ pratīyate ||
ratāveva viparītopamā yathā—
‘yattvannetrasamānakānti salile magnaṃ tadindīvaraṃ meghairantaritaḥ priye tava ‘mukhacchāyānukāraḥ’ ka khamukhacchāyānukārī śaśī |
‘yo’ khaye 'pi ‘tvadgamanānusārigatayaḥ’ ghatvadgamanānukārigatayaste rājahaṃsā gatā- stvatsādṛśyavinodamātramapi me daivena na kṣamyate || 486 ||’
atra virahiṇo rāmasya priyāvayavasādṛśyadarśanenātmānaṃ vinodayata ‘upāyabhraṃśāratiprabha’ kaupāyabhraṃśādaratipramavaviṣādavāgārambhe svarūpābhidhāne prakṣīṇaśaktiraprāghānyenopamā pratīyate ||
ratāveva ‘viparyayo’ kaparyāyasya yathā—
‘kiṃ gurujahaṇaṃ ‘aha thaṇa’ ka khaaha thaṇabharo tti ‘bhāvaakaraa’ kabhāakaraalaggatuliāe‘tūliāe’ kha |
vihiṇo ‘khattaṃguli’ kakhuttaṃgulimaggavibbhamaṃ‘yagā vimbhama’ ka, ‘thaṇacibbhamaṃ’ kha vahaï se‘sa’ ka tivalī || 487 ||’
[kiṃ gurujadhanamatha stanabhara iti bhāgakaratalāgratulitāyāḥ |
vidheḥ khātāṅa‍gulimārgavibhramaṃ vahatyasyāstrivalī ||]
atra yadyapi ratiprabhavebhyo vismayādibhyaḥ saṃśayahetūtprekṣopamā‘upamābhyaḥ’ kadibhyaśca paryāyālaṃkāraḥ prādhānyena pratīyate tathāpyasau vāgārambhānubhāva iti ‘ratāvapyaprādhānyam’ ka kharatāvaprādhānyamevānubhavati ||
ratāveva samādhiryathā |
‘kṛcchreṇoruyugaṃ vyatītya suciraṃ bhrāntvā nitambasthale madhye 'syāstrivalītaraṅa‍gaviṣame ‘niṣpandatām’ ka khanisyandatāmāgatā |
maddṛṣṭistṛṣiteva saṃprati śanairāruhya tuṅa‍gau stanau sākāṅa‍kṣaṃ muhurīkṣate ‘jalabharaprasyandinī’ ka khajalalavaprasyandinī locaneṃ || 488 ||’
atra vatsarājena svadṛṣṭau prāṇidharmāḥ samādhīyamānāḥ sāgarikā‘darśanārthe’ ka khadarśanottha‘rati—’ ka kharativāgārambhe nyagbhavanti ||
ratāvevārthaśleṣasya yathā—
‘kapole pattrālī karatalanirodhena mṛditā nipīto ‘niśvāsaiḥ’ ka kha ga niḥśvāsairayamamṛtahṛdyo 'dhararasaḥ |
muhurlagnaḥ kaṇṭhe taralayati ‘bāṣpastanataṭī’ ka, ‘vāṣpastanataṭīṃ’ gabāṣpaḥ stanataṭīṃ priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe na tu vayam || 489 ||’
atra yadyapyākṣepeṇa vākyopasaṃhārastathāpi priya ityādibhiḥ prādhānyenābhidhīyamānaḥ śleṣa eva śrṛṅa‍gāriṇo vāgārambhānubhāvā‘anubhāvāṅa‍gatvaṃ’ kaṅa‍gatāmaṅa‍gīkaroti ||
ratāveva paryāyokteryathā—
‘muktāḥ kandharayā ‘kṛtāḥ’ ka, ‘dhṛtāḥ’ kha dhṛtā stanataṭenottuṅa‍gutā kumbhayorūrubhyāṃ pariṇāhitā kramavatī hastasya pabhdyāṃ gatiḥ |
etadvaḥ karighātinastu kaṭhinaṃ carmaiva ko 'yaṃ haṭhaścaṇḍīti tripurārikelivacanairā‘āryānvitaṃ’ karyāsmitaṃ pātu vaḥ || 490 ||’
atra bhagavataścāṭūktivāgārambhe devyāḥ paryāyavarṇanā ‘śleṣabhāvaṃ’ ka khaśeṣabhāvaṃ labhate-
ya‘yatra’ ka kha udāsīnena varṇyate so 'laṃkārapradhānaḥ sa hi rasabhāvādeḥ saṃkaraprakāramabhidhitsuḥ svabhāboktiṃ vakroktiṃ vāvalambate ||
tatra svabhāvoktipakṣe jātiḥ ||
sā vidhimukhena yathā—
‘‘thoousarata’ kathoosaraṃtarosaṃ ‘thoaparivaṭṭamāna’ ka khathoatthoaparivaḍḍhamāṇapaharisam |
hoi a dūrapaāsaṃ ‘uaha’ ka khauhaarasāaṃtavibbhamaṃ‘bibbhaṃtīa’ kha tīa mukham || 491 ||’
[stokāpasaradroṣaṃ stokastokaparivardhamānapraharṣam |
bhavati ca dūraprakāśamubhayarasāyattavibhramaṃ tasyā mukham ||]
atra satyabhāmāyā roṣasyāpasarpataḥ‘apasajjataḥ’ ka praharṣasya ca prasarpato ye 'nubhāvā jihnāvalokanamukhaprasādādayasta iha saṃkīryamāṇāḥ kavinobhayarasāyattavibhramamityanena‘ubhayarasāyattamityanena’ kha yathāvadavasthitā bhavantīti vidhimukhenābhidhīyante ||
jātireva niṣedhamukhena yathā—
‘dhīreṇa māṇabhaṃgo ‘māṇakavalaṇeṇa sahāyaṃ garuadhīrārambho’ kha māṇaksvalaṇeṇa garua dhīrārambho |
‘ulalaï tulite’ khaullalaï tulijjaṃte ekammi vi se thiraṃ ṇa laggaï hiaaṃ 492’
[dhairyeṇa mānabhaṅa‍go mānaskhalanena gurukadhairyārambhaḥ |
ullalati tolyamāne ekasminnapyasyāḥ sthiraṃ na lagati hṛdayam ||]
atra yadyapi hetūpanyāso vartate tathāpi tasya ‘bhāvākhyānaparikaratvena’ khasvabhāvākhyānaparikaratvenāprādhānyena hṛdayakriyāsvarūpameveha‘svarūpameva hi’ ka niṣedhamukhenābhidhīyata itīyaṃ jātireva bhavati ||
saiva vidhiniṣedhābhyāṃ yathā—
‘helodastamahīdharasya tanutāmālokya doṣṇo hare- rhastenāṃsataṭe 'valambya‘hastenāsa ta eva’ ka, ‘hastenāṃsata eva’ kha caraṇāvāropya tatpādayoḥ |
śailoddhārasahāyatāṃ jigamiṣoraspṛṣṭagovardhanā rādhāyāḥ suciraṃ jayanti gagane vandhyāḥ karabhrāntayaḥ 493’
atra rādhāyāḥ preyasi harau ‘yathāvadavasthitā adbhuta—’ khayathāvadastitodbhūtavṛttisnehaśaṅa‍kotsāhā mithaḥ saṃkīryamāṇā bhayāvegasmṛtimativitarkādibhirvyabhicāribhāvairālambanacaraṇākramaṇasahakṛtāyāṃ karabhrāntau śarīrārambhānubhāve pratīyamānā aspṛṣṭagovardhanā vandhyā iti niṣedhamukhena jayantīti vidhimukhena cābhidhīyante ||
vakroktipakṣa upamādayaḥ |
teṣūpamā yathā—
‘‘corā bhaasatahaṇaṃ puṇo pesavati divvīo | ahirasthianihikalase thayokkahalapūikhaṇutsaṅa‍ge’ kacorā sabhaasataṇhaṃ puṇo puṇo pesaaṃti diṭṭhīo |
ahirakkhiaṇihikalase vva ‘poḍhavaïāthaṇucchaṅa‍ge’ gāthāsapta॰., ‘prauḍhapatikāstanotsaṅa‍ge’ iti cchāyā capoḍhamahilāthaṇucchaṃge || 494 ||’
[corāḥ sabhayasatṛṣṇaṃ punaḥ punaḥ preṣayanti dṛṣṭīḥ |
abhirakṣitanidhikalaśa iva prauḍhamahilāstanotsaṅa‍ge ||]
atra ‘coragata—’ ga gha﻿cauragatabhayānurāgayoḥ saṃkarasvabhāvoktimatibhūyottarārdhāgatamaupamyaṃ prādhānyena pratīyate ||
upamaiva rasābhāsasaṃkaraviṣayā yathā—
‘ekenārkaṃ pravitataruṣā pāṭalenāsta‘saṃsthāṃ’ kasaṃsthaṃ ‘paśyetyuktvā’ kapaśyatyakṣṇā sajalataralenāpareṇātmakāntam |
ahnaśchede dayitavirahāśaṅkinī cakravākī tau saṃkīrṇau racayati rasau nartakīva pragalbhā || 495 ||’
atra nigadenaiva ‘vyākhyāyate’ kavyākhyāte spaṣṭatayaivopamāyāḥ ‘prādhānyena’ ghapradhānatvena pratītiḥ ||
rasapraśamayorupamāsahoktiryathā—
‘dṛṣṭe locanavanmanāṅmukulitaṃ pārśvasthite cakravannyagbhūtaṃ bahirāsitaṃ pulakavatsparśaṃ samātanvati‘tatsparśamātanvati’ kha |
nīvībandhavadāgataṃ śithilatāmābhāṣamāṇe tato mānenāpasṛtaṃ hriyeva sudṛśaḥ pādaspṛśi preyasi || 496 ||’
atra kasyāścitsakhīvikhyātamānasaṃvidhānakopānmānavatyāḥ priyasaṃdarśanādālambanavibhāvādutpannaprakṛṣṭaratiprabhave‘ratiprabhavaharṣasthāyibhāve’ ka, ‘ratiprabhave’ praharṣasyāpi bhāve’ kha praharṣasthāyibhāve ‘tatpārśve 'pi samarpaṇādibhiḥ’ katatpārśvopasarpaṇādibhiruddīpanavibhāvairuddīpyamāne‘uddīpyamāneṣu’ ka samutpadyamāneṣu‘samutpadyamāneṣu’ ka nāsti ‘pulakādiṣu samutpadyamāneṣu vyabhicāriṣu’ ka khapulakādiṣu mukhātmakeṣu vyabhicāriṣu nayananimīlanādhomukhyanīvīvisraṃsa‘viśraṃsanādibhiḥ’ khanādibhiranubhāvaiḥ prakarṣaṇāropaṇādānandarasa‘ānandarasānām’ khatāmāpādyamāne sthāyini prabalavirodhibhāvāntarodayādetebhya eva kāraṇebhyaḥ pratikṣaṇamapacīyamānayorlajjāroṣayoḥ praśamasaṃkarābhibhūya prādhānyenopamāsahoktiḥ ‘saṃkīryate’ ka khaprakāśate ||
śleṣādyalaṃkārasāmarthyāttu kvacidavāstavamapi rasābhāsasaṃkaraṃ kavayaḥ prakalpayanti‘varṇayanti’ ka, ‘kalpayanti’ kha ||
sa rūpakaśleṣeṇa yathā—
‘rāmamanmathaśareṇa tāḍitā duḥsahena hṛdaye niśācarī |
gandhavadrudhiracandanokṣitā jīviteśavasatiṃ jagāma sā || 497 ||’
atra bībhatso rasaḥ śleṣarūpakasāmarthyādavidyamānenāpi śrṛṅa‍gārarasena saṃkīrṇa iva pratīyate ||
śleṣānuviddhārthāntaranyāsena yathā—
‘‘asyārthastatra vīrarase tāvat—ho ityāścaryasaṃbodhane | daṣṭauṣṭhaasilatāghātaḥ khaṅa‍gaprahārastavāpi mukulayati locanabhruvau dve api | atha ca suṣṭhu pānti ye yodhāstān rāṃtyādatte tādṛśāneva mahāvīrānsvīkaroti īdṛśī yā kuvalayaprāptā sakalamedinīmaṇḍalaprāptā lakṣmīḥ kathaṃ mohaṃ na na janayati | lagrā vakṣasi kākvā janayatyevetyarthaḥ | api ca vipralambhaśrṛṅa‍gāre he daṣṭauṣṭha pītādharāmṛta bhogaśīlaka, ghātaḥ arthāttava prāṇasamāyā nakhāghāto 'pi te tava mukulayati locanabhruvau dve api atha ca suṣṭhupayodharau stanau yasyāḥ sā | kuvalayapattrālākṣī nīlotpaladalasamānanayanā na lagnā vakṣasi kathaṃ na mohaṃ na janayati | api tu janayatītyarthaḥ | sahṛdaya hṛdayaṃgama |’ gha ṭippaṇīdaṭṭhoṭṭha ho asilaaghāo‘asilavāaccāo’ kha devi maülāvaï loaṇabhaüho‘loaṇabhaünto’ ka, ‘loaṇabhaoho’ ga gha ve |
supaohara‘kuvalaapattilacchi’ ka, ‘kuvalaya’ khakuvala apattalacchi ‘kahamonubhāiṇagājaṇavacchi’ kakaha moha ṇa jaṇaï ṇa laggavacchi ||’
[daṣṭauṣṭha ho asilatādhāto devi mukalayati locanabhruvau dve api |
supayodharakuvalayapattralakṣmīḥ kathaṃ mohaṃ na janayati na lagnā vakṣasi ||]
atra vīro rasaḥ śleṣasāmarthyādavidyamānenāpi vipralambhaśrṛṅa‍gāreṇa saṃkīryate ||
śleṣopamā yathā—
‘kṣipto hastāvalagnaḥ prasabhamabhihato 'pyādadānoṃ 'śukāntaṃ gṛhṇankeśeṣvapāstaścaraṇanipatito nekṣitaḥ saṃkrameṇa |
āliṅa‍ganyo 'vadhūtastripurayuvatibhiḥ sāśrunetrotpalābhiḥ kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa ‘haratu’ khadahatu duritaṃ śāmbhabo vaḥ śarāgniḥ 499’
atra karuṇo rasaḥ śleṣopamāsāmarthyenāvidyamānenāpi vipralambhaśṛṅa‍gāreṇa saṃkīryate ||
śleṣavyatirekeṇa yathā—
‘padbhyāmūruyugaṃ vibhajya bhujayorbhadhyaṃ nipīḍyorasā pārśveṣu prasabhaṃ prahṛtya nakharairdantairvilūyādharam‘vilupyādharam’ kha |
suptānapyavabodhya yuṣmadahitānbhūyo 'pi bhukte’ khabhuṅke vane kiṃ kāntā surataiṣiṇī nahi nahi vyāghrī karālānanā || 500 ||’
‘iha’ ka khaatra śleṣasāmarthyādapāramārthikī śṛṅgāra‘pratītiḥ’ ghapratītiḥ pāramārthikena bībhatsarasena vyāvartamānā taddharmāṇāṃ mithaḥ ‘saṃsargavadbuddhim’ kasaṃsargabuddhimutpādayati ||
śleṣarūpakeṇa yathā—
‘antraiḥ kalpitamaṅa‍galapratisarāḥ strīhastaraktotpalavyaktottaṃsabhṛtaḥ pinahya śirasā hṛtpuṇḍarīkastrajaḥ |
etāḥ śoṇitapaṅa‍kakuṅa‍kumajuṣaḥ saṃbhūya kāntaiḥ pibantyasthisnehasurāḥ kapālacaṣakaiḥ prītāḥ piśācāṅa‍ganāḥ || 501 ||’
atra vībhatso rasaḥ śabdasāmarthyākṣiptena śṛṅa‍garābhāsena saṃkīryate ||
samādhirūpakeṇa yathā—
‘śikhaṇḍe khaṇḍenduḥ śaśidinakarau karṇayugale dṛśastārāstārāścalamuḍupacakraṃ ca kucayoḥ |
taḍitkāñcī sandhyā sicayarucayaḥ kāli tadayaṃ tavākalpaḥ kalpavyuparamavidheyo vijayate || 502 ||’
atra bhayānako rasaḥ samādhirūpakādyupakalpitākalparāmaṇīyakākṣiptena śṛṅa‍gārābhāsena saṃkīryamāṇaḥ śrotuḥ preyorasāṅa‍gatāṃ gacchansaṃgacchate | evamiyamama‘anekaprakārasaṃsṛṣṭiḥ’ khanekaprakārasaṃsṛṣṭirguṇālaṃkārasaṃkaraprabhavābhimantavyā tatrāpi pradhānāṅa‍gabhāvena samakakṣatayā ca vyaktāvyaktobhayātmakarūpāstilatandula‘taṇḍula’ ka khakṣīrajalācchāyādarśakādayo bhedā ‘yathāyogyaṃ’ khayathāyogamavagantavyāḥ | te kiṃ vaktavyā na vaktavyāḥ | kathamanuktā gamyante | ukteṣvevāntarbhāvāt | tadyadhā--arthobhayālaṃkārābhidhāne ‘khaṃ vaste’ iti ‘carcāṃ pārayati’ iti vibhaktimudrā, kalaviṅa‍kaṇṭhamalinaṃ kādambinīkambalam iti padamudrā ca śabdālaṃkārāvapi saṃkīryamāṇau pratīyete |
evamanyatrāpi |
aṅa‍gāṅgibhāvāvasthānaṃ sarveṣāṃ samakakṣatā |
ityalaṃkāra‘saṃsṛṣṭiḥ’ ghasaṃsṛṣṭerlakṣaṇīyā dvayī gatiḥ || 176 ||
tatrāṅa‍gāṅgibhāvenāvasthānaṃ yathā—
‘ākṣipantyaravindāni mugdhe tava mukhaśriyam |
koṣadaṇḍasamagrāṇāṃ kimeṣāmasti duṣkaram‘atiduṣkaraṃ’ gha || 503 ||’
‘atra—’ ityārabhya ‘duṣkaram’ ityantaḥ pāṭho ga gha nāstiatrāravindāni ‘mugdhe tava mukhaśriyamākṣipantīti’ upamā, ‘koṣa-
daṇḍasamagrāṇāṃ kimeṣāmasti duṣkaram’ iti śleṣopasarjanārthāntaranyāsaḥ | ‘prabhavanti’ ka khabhavanti cāravindāni koṣadaṇḍasamagrāṇi ‘tena kiṃ teṣāṃ’ ka khatena teṣāṃ na kiṃcidaśakyamasti koṣadaṇḍayorvijayasādhanatvāt | etena śleṣasya ‘sādhanamānabhūtārtha’ khasādhanabhūtārthasamarthakatvādupamāyāstu prastutasādhyavastuviśeṣakatvādarthāntaranyāsaṃ pratyaṅa‍gabhāvo vijñāyate |
sarveṣāṃ samakakṣatāṃ yathā—
‘limpatīva tamo 'ṅa‍gāni varṣatīvāñjanaṃ nabhaḥ |
asatpuruṣaseveva dṛṣṭirni‘viphalatāṃ gatā’ ka khaṣphalatāṃ gatā || 504 ||’
‘nanu ca tamasaśca nabhasaśca asataśca saṃbandhasamatvāt’ ka khananu cābandhaḥ samatvātsyāditi kathaṃ sarveṣāṃ tulyakakṣatayā saṃbandhotpattiḥ evaṃ manyate ye utprekṣopamādayo 'laṃkārā vibhāvānubhāvavyabhi‘vyabhicārivarṇanāparā’ ka khacāryādivarṇanāparatayā rasāderaṅa‍gatāṃ pratipadyante tadā bhavatyeva teṣāṃ tulyakakṣateti | tatra ‘limpatīva tamo 'ṅa‍gāni varṣatīvāñjanaṃ nabhaḥ’ iti dve‘dve’ kha nāsti utprekṣe, ‘asatpuruṣaseveva dṛṣṭirniṣphalatāṃ gatā’ ityupamā ca varṇanīyasya tamasa uddīpanavibhāvabhūtasya samatayaivotkarṣapratipādakatvenā‘prāgabhāvam’ khaṅa‍gabhāvamupagateti nāsti lakṣaṇānupapattiriti | nanūpamā imāstisro 'pi kasmānnocyante | ivo hi vākyāntareṣūpamāyā eva dṛśyate | ‘naivam’ ka maivam | upamānopameyaśabdapratipannasya‘upamānopameyaṃ prati yattasya’ kha sādṛśyārthasya dyotanamivena kriyate na ca limpatītyādāvupamānamupameyaṃ vāsti yatsādṛśyadyotanaya ivaḥ ‘prayujyate’ khaprayujyet | na ca tiṅantenopamānamasti tasya sādhyārthābhidhāyitvenāsattvārthatvāt‘asattvārthakatvāt’ kha ||
tadāha—
‘siddhasya hi samānārthamupamānaṃ vidhīyate |
tiṅantārthasya sādhyatvādupamārtho na vidyate ||’
na copamāyāmevevaśabdo bhavati | tadyathā kathamivaitadbhaviṣyati | astu vā limpatitamasorupamānopameyabhāvastathāpi tulyadharmo na dṛśyate ya upamānopameyabhāvāya prabhavati | kimanyaina lepanameva bhavati tarhi limpatinā‘nalimpatinā’ ka kena bhāvyam | na hi lepanaṃ limpeḥ pṛthagmavitumīṣṭe | nanu ceha dvayaṃ cakāsti thāturlimpati tadarthaśca‘śabdārthaśca’ ka lepanam | maivam | evaṃ sati limpatiriveti syāt na tu limpatīveti | atha yathā rāhoḥ śiraḥ iti bhedābhāve 'pyavayavāvayavibhāvastatheha dharmadharmibhāvo bhaviṣyati | maivam | upamānopameyabhāvasya bhedasādṛśyapratipattinibandhanatvāt tadabhāve 'pi yastanmanute sa kathaṃ nonmattaḥ syāt |
taduktam—‘sa eva dharmo dharmī cetyunmatto 'pi na bhāṣate |’ astu tarhi tiṅa‍vācyaḥ‘tiṅāṃ yaḥ’ kha kartā upamānamiti cet nyagbhūto 'sau kriyāpade | kathaṃ punarasau kriyāpade‘kriyāvayave’ kha nyagbhūto bhavati | śrūyatāṃ, ṣaḍarthāstiṅantena pratīyante kriyā kālaḥ upagrahaḥ sādhanaṃ saṅkhyā puruṣaśceti | teṣu kriyākālātmanepadaparasmaipadanimittāni prakṛtirabhidhatte pratyayaḥ sādhanaṃ, saṅkhyāṃ puruṣaṃ ca | eteṣāṃ tu kriyārthatvātkriyā pradhānaṃ, kālātmanepadanimitte kriyāviśeṣaṇatvena, saṅkhyāpuruṣau sādhanaviśeṣaṇatvena tayoreva nyagbhavataḥ | sādhanaṃ punaḥ ‘prakṛtipratyayau‘prakṛtipratyayārthau’ kha ‘yatra sahārtha brūte’ kasvārthaṃ saha brūtaḥ’ iti nyāyāt ‘pradhānabhūtamapi bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyata’ iti nyāyena kriyāsiddhāvutpa-
nnavyāpāraṃ parārthaṃ tasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ nyagmavati | tenāyaṃ kartā svakriyāsidbhābākulaḥ‘svakriyāsiddhā vā kutaḥ’ kha kathamupamānatvenopameyatvena ‘cānyadapekṣitaṃ’ ka, ‘vānyadapekṣitaṃ’ khavānyadapekṣituṃ kṣamate | evaṃ tarhi yo 'ṅa‍gāni limpati tena kriyopalakṣitena kartrā tulyaṃ tama ityarthaḥ pratipatsyate | maivam | kriyopalakṣitasya karturupamānabhūtasya śabdanvāyabalāpratipattiḥ | śabdo hi mukhyāgauṇīlakṣaṇābhirarthaprakaraṇādisaṃpāditasācivyādā‘sācivyādibhiḥ’ ka khabhistisṛbhireva vṛttibhirarthaviśeṣapratipattinimittaṃ bhavati | tadyathā—gaurityayaṃ śabdo mukhyayā vṛttyā sāsnādimantamarthaṃ pratipādayati sa eva tiṣṭhanmūtratvādiguṇasaṃpadamapekṣya vāhīkādau prayujyamāno gauṇīṃ vṛttimanubhavati | yadā tu mukhyayā gauṇyā vopāttakriyāsiddhau sādhanabhāvaṃ gantumasamarthastadā lakṣaṇayā svārthāvinābhūtamarthāntaraṃ lakṣayati yathā gaṅa‍gāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ prativasatīti gaṅa‍gāśabdo viśiṣṭodakapravāhe nirụ̄dhābhidhānaśaktirghoṣakartṛkāyāḥ prativasanakriyāyā adhikaraṇabhāvaṃ gantumasamarthaḥ svārthāvinābhūtaṃ taṭaṃ‘yattaṭaṃ’ ka lakṣayatīti | na caitāsāmihānyatamāpi vṛttiḥ saṃgacchate | tathā hi limpateḥ kriyāvacanatvānna mukhyā‘kriyāvacanatvānmukhyā nāpi kriyākartāraḥ sādṛśyena’ ka | nāpi kriyākartrorasādṛśyena śuktikādau rajatādivattadbhāvāpattiḥ kriyāguṇānāṃ kartaryasaṃbhavāt | sākṣādiva prayogācca na gauṇī kriyāyāśca svayameva dharmarūpatvāt | buddhiḥ paśyatītivadanyadharmāṇāmanyatrādhiropaṇamupacāra iti na gauṇībheda upacāritā‘upacaritā’ ka, ‘upacaritaḥ’ kha | ivaśabdasya cāsādṛśye 'pi darśanānna lakṣyeta | yadi hīvaśabdaḥ sādṛśyameva vidyotayati tadā limpatikriyāyāḥ sattvabhūtena tamasā sādṛśyaṃ na saṃbhavatīti svārthāvinābhūte kartāra-
mākṣipati | na ceha lakṣitalakṣaṇāviruddha‘iha lakṣaṇāviruddha—’ khalakṣaṇādayo 'pi vartante, yathā ‘priye jane nāsti punaruktaṃ’, ‘svalpairasāvapi na dṛśyata eva kālaiḥ’ iti | na ca ‘śabdānyavilambinī’ ka, ‘śabdānyapavilambitaprāyavilambinī’ khaśabdanyāyavilaṅghinī padārthavyutpattiḥ prekṣāvadbhirādriyate | yadyapyadhyāhārādibhiridamapi syāttathāpi tulyadharmo mārgaṇīyastadvadeva vipratipatteḥ || na cendumukhādivadanabhidhīyamānasyāpi tulyaguṇasya pratyayo bhavatīti vācyam |
yathenduriva te vakramiti kāntiḥ pratīyate |
‘tadyathā’ khana tathā limpaterlepādanyadatra pratīyate || 177 ||
tadupaśleṣaṇārtho 'yaṃ limpatirdhvāntakartṛkaḥ |
varṣaṇārthaśca vidvadbhirutprekṣyata itīkṣyatām || 178 ||
manye-śaṅa‍ke-dhruvaṃ-prāyo-nūnamityevamādibhiḥ |
utprekṣā vyajyate śabdairivaśabdo 'pi tādṛśaḥ || 179 ||
vākyavadeva prabandheṣvanaucityaparihāreṇa guṇālaṃkārasaṃkaraniveśo bhavati | tatrānaucityaparihāro yathā—māyayā kaikeyīdaśarathābhyāṃ rāmaḥ pralambhito na mātāpitṛbhyāmiti nirdoṣadaśarathe; rāmameva yodhayan rāmeṇa vālī nihato na sugrīveṇeti mahāvīracarite; rudhirapriyarākṣasena duḥśāsanasya rudhiraṃ pītaṃ na bhīmaseneneti veṇīsaṃhāre; durvāsaso 'padhyānādduṣyantaḥ śakuntalāsvīkāraṃ visasmāra, ‘nānavasthitānurāgatayā’ ka khanānāvasthititānurāgatayeti śākuntale; lavaṇaprayuktarākṣasābhyāṃ vā sopaskareṇa ‘tadanabhidhāya’ kha nāstitadabhidhāya sītā parityājitā na kaikeyīmantharābhyāmiti chalitarāme; kiṃca dagdhāyāmapi
vāsavadattāyāṃ vairapraticikīrṣayā padmāvatī mayọdhā, avasite ca samīhite tathā vinā kṣaṇamapi na jīvāmītyavijñātavāsavadattāsaṃnighervatsarājasyāgnipraveśādhyavasāyaḥ priyāhṛdayato vyalīkaśalyamuccakhāneti tāpasavatsarāje; ‘macīcākṣaḥ’ khanīcākṣaḥ svāmikāryaṃ sādhayāmīti prabhubhaktyā niraparādhāmapi preyasīṃ hitvā svāmikāryāpekṣayāhamevaitāvanti dināni jīvitaḥ, adya tu kṛtasvāmikāryastāmevānugacchāmīti śivagaṇaḥ śūdrakanimittāṃ māyāmayīṃ citāṃ priyāsamakṣaṃ praviveśa, sāpi tatpremāvadānadarśanāpahnutapriyabyalīkā‘priyavyalīkāt’ kha tadviyogakātarā tatraivātmānaṃ praticikṣepeti vikrāntaśūdrake, iti tadetaddoṣahānam || guṇopādānaṃ tu samyag guṇayogena saṃvidhāne susūtratā, api ca caturvṛttyaṅa‍gasaṃpannamiti catasro vṛttayo bhāratī ārabhaṭī kaiśikī sāttvatī ceti | tatra—
yā vākpradhānā nṛpatiprayojyā strīvarjitā ‘saṃskṛtayā prayuktā’ khasaṃskṛtayātha yuktā |
svanāmadheyairbharataprayojyā sā bhāratī nāma bhavettu vṛttiḥ ||
yatrāvapātakṣutalaṅghitāni chedyāni māyākṛtamindrajālam |
citrāṇi yuddhāni ca tatra vṛttimetādṛśīmārabhaṭīṃ vadanti ||
yā ślakṣṇanepathyaviśeṣayuktā strīsaṃgatā yā bahugītavṛttā |
kāmopabhogapracuropacārā tāṃ kaiśikīṃ vṛttimudāharanti ||
yā sāttvikenātmaguṇena yuktā tyāgena vṛttena samanvitā ca |
harṣotkaṭā saṃhṛtaśokabhārā sā sāttvatīti prathiteha vṛttiḥ ||
āsāmaṅa‍gāni ṣoḍaśa—teṣu prarocanā, vīthī, prastāvanā, prahasanamiti catvāri bhāratyaṅa‍gāni ||
tatra vaktavyārthapraśaṃsāparaṃ vacaḥ prarocanā; yathā—
‘jayati bhuvanakāraṇaṃ svayambhurjayati purandaranandano murāriḥ |
jayati girisutāniruddhadeho duritabhayāpaharo haraśca devaḥ 505
prastutavastūpapādanāvasarasūcakaṃ vacaḥ prastāvanā; yathā ratnāvalyām |
‘dvīpādanyasmādapi madhyādapi jalanidherdiśo 'pyantāt |
ānīya jhaṭiti ghaṭayati vidhirabhimatamabhimukhībhūtaḥ 506’
uddhātyakādīnāmaṅa‍gānāṃ pravṛttiḥ vīthī uddhātyakaḥ kathoddhātaḥ prayogātiśayaḥ pravartako 'valagitamiti |
tatroddhātyako yathā—
‘ko jayati jayati śarvaḥ kena jitaṃ jitamanaṅa‍gadahanena |
tripurāriṇā bhagavatā bālaśaśāṅa‍kāṅkitajaṭena || 507 ||’
kathoddhāto yathā—
‘sākaṃ paṅa‍kajajanmanā surapaterabhyarthanāyā vaśā- dikṣvākoḥ śaradindubimbavimale vaṃśe 'vatīrya svayam |
niḥśeṣāttapadaṃ ‘trayīpadajuṣāṃ’ khatrayīpathajuṣāṃ vidveṣiṇaṃ rākṣasaṃ yaḥ paulastyamahan sa pātu bhavato rāmābhidhāno hariḥ 508
prayogātiśayo yathā—
‘‘utthāpitam’ ka, ‘atyāhitam’ khayūthāyitamavatu hareḥ kṣmāmuddharato varāhavapuṣo vaḥ |
‘śeṣaphaṇā, ratnadarpaṇa’ ka khaśeṣaphaṇaratnadarpaṇasahasrasaṃkrāntabimbasya || 509 ||’
pravartako yathā—
‘āsāditaprakaṭanirmalacandrahāsaḥ prāptaḥ śaratsamaya ‘eva’ kaeṣa viśuddhakāntaḥ‘viśuddhakīrtiḥ’ ka kha |
utkhāya gāḍhatamasaṃ ghanakālamugraṃ rāmo daśāsyamiva saṃbhṛtabandhujīvaḥ || 510 ||’
avalagitaṃ yathā,—amumeva śaratsamayamāśritya gīyatām, tathā hyasyām‘tathā hyasyāḥ’ kha 'tathā hyasyām’ gha nāsti
‘satpakṣā madhuragiraḥ prasādhitāśā madoddhatārambhāḥ |
nipatanti dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ kālavaśānmedinīpṛṣṭhe || 511 ||’
‘svadharmavipracalitānām’ ka, ‘svadharmavitpracalitānāṃ’ khasvadharmātpracalitānāṃ tāpasādīnāmupahāsaparaṃ vacaḥ prahasanam | yathā—
‘śramaṇaḥ śrāvakavadhvāḥ suratavidhau daśati nādharaṃ dattam |
madirākṣi māṃsabhakṣaṇamasmatsamaye niṣiddhamiti || 512 ||’
saṃkṣiptikā, avapātaḥ, vastūtthāpanam, saṃsphoṭaḥ, iti catvāri ārabhaṭyaṅa‍gāni ||
teṣu māhendrajālanepathyādibhirvastusaṃkṣepaḥ saṃkṣiptikā | yathā—
‘rakṣasā mṛgarūpeṇa vañcayitvā sarāghavau |
jahāra sītāṃ pakṣīndraprayāsakṣaṇavighnitaḥ || 513 ||’
bhayādibhirvidravādikarmānupraveśanirgamanamavapātaḥ | yathā—
‘mṛgarūpaṃ parityajya vidhāya vikaṭaṃ vapuḥ |
nīyate rakṣasā tena lakṣmaṇo yudhi saṃśayam || 514 ||’
avidravaḥ savidravo vā sarvarasabhāvasamāso vastūtthāpanam | yathā—
‘rāhoścandrakalāmivānanacarīṃ daivātsamāsādya me dasyorasya kṛpāṇapātaviṣayādācchindataḥ preyasīm |
ātaṅa‍kādvikalaṃ drutaṃ karuṇayā vikṣobhitaṃ vismayā- tkrodhena jvalitaṃ mudā vikasitaṃ cetaḥ kathaṃ vartatām 515’
nānāstrayuddhaniyuddhādibhiḥ sasaṃrambhasaṃprahāraḥ saṃsphoṭaḥ | yathā—
‘kṛṣṭā yena śiroruheṣu paśunā pāñcālarājātmajā yenāsyāḥ paridhānamapyapahṛtaṃ rājñāṃ gurūṇāṃ puraḥ |
yasyoraḥsthalaśoṇitāsavamahaṃ pātuṃ pratijñātavā- nso 'yaṃ madbhujapañjare nipatitaḥ saṃrakṣyatāṃ kauravāḥ || 516 ||’
narma, narmasphijaḥ, narmasphoṭaḥ, narmagarbha, iti catvāri kaiśikyaṅa‍gāni ||
teṣu sthāpitaśṛṅa‍gāraṃ vaco viceṣṭitaṃ vā saparihāsaṃ narma | yathā—
‘vayaṃ tathā nāma yathāttha kiṃ vadāmyayaṃ tvakasmādvikalaḥ kathāntare |
kadambagolākṛtimāśritaḥ kathaṃ viśuddhamugdhaḥ kulakanyakājanaḥ 517’
prathamasaṃbhoge navāvasthānaṃ saṃbhogāśrayavākyādi karma narmasphijaḥ | yathā—
‘prāptāsau vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ priyasutā saṅa‍ketakhaṇḍe nave vṛṣṭiḥ seyamanambudā 'mṛtamayī yātrāṇi me siñcati |
kiṃ jānāsi vinodayiṣyati manaḥ saṃtaptamevādya me durvātyeva nivartayiṣyati na bhostāṃ devayānīṃ prati || 518 ||’
āvirbhūtābhilāṣānubhāvayorakāṇḍasaṃbhogabhaṅa‍go narmasphoṭaḥ | yathā—
‘itaḥ parānarbhakahāryaśastrānvaidarbhi paśyānumatā mayāsi |
evaṃvighenāhavaceṣṭitena, tvaṃ prārthyase hastagatā mamaibhiḥ 519’ ﻿
kāryahetoḥ svarūpavijñānādipracchādanaṃ narmagarbhaḥ | yathā—
‘athājināṣāḍhadharaḥ pragalbhavāgjvalanniva brahmamayena tejasā |
viveśa kaścijjaṭilastapovanaṃ śarīrabaddhaḥ prathamāśramo yathā || 520 ||’
utthāpakaḥ, parivartakaḥ, saṃlāpakaḥ, saṃghātyakaḥ, iti catvāri sātvatyaṅa‍gāni |
teṣu parasparībhūtārtheṣūtthāpanamutthāpakaḥ | yathā—
‘prahara mama tu kāyaṃ prākprahārapriyo 'haṃ ‘api tu’ khamayi tu kṛtavighāte kiṃ vidadhyāḥ parasmāt |
jhaṭiti vitatabahvaṅa‍gārabhāsvatkuṭhāra- pravighaṭitakaṭhauraskandhabandhaḥ kabandhaḥ || 521 ||
prastutārthatyagādanyārthabhajanaṃ, parivartakaḥ | yathā—
‘munimabhimukhatāṃ ninīṣavo yāḥ samupayayuḥ kamanīyatāṃ guṇena |
madanamupadadhe sa eva tābhyo duradhighamā hi gatiḥ prayojanānām || 522 ||
sadasi nānāvākyairmitho 'dhikṣepaḥ saṃlāpakaḥ | yathā—
‘kathamapi na niṣiddho duḥkhinā bhīruṇā vā drupadatanayapāṇistena pitrā mamādya |
tava bhujabaladarpādhdyāyamānasya vāmaḥ śirasi caraṇa eṣa nyasyate dhārayainam || 523 ||’
kāryamantrānubhāvadaivādibhiḥ saṃghātabhedaḥ saṃghātyakaḥ | yathā—
‘apaśyadbhiriveśānaṃ raṇānnivavṛte gaṇaiḥ |
muhyatyeva hi kṛcchreṣu saṃbhramādhigataṃ manaḥ || 524 ||’
‘catura’ ityanena śāstrīyalaukikavyavahāravedino nāyakasya dharmārthakāmamokṣeṣu vaicakṣaṇyamucyate | ‘udātta’ ityanena āśayavibhūtyorābhijātyayauvanādīnāṃ cotkarṣaḥ prakāśyate | caturvargaphalaṃ ‘prabandhe’ khaprabandhaṃ ko vā na bāndhavīyatītyanena śrotṝṇāṃ rāmādivadvartitavyam, na rāvaṇādivaditi vidhiniṣedhanibandhanasya‘nibandhasya’ ka prabandhasyābhīṣṭatamatvamākhyāyate | ‘mukhaṃ pratimukham' ityādinā pañcāṅa‍gaṃ prabandhaśarīramabhidhīyate | tadaṅa‍gāni copakṣepaparikarādīni catuḥṣaṣṭirapi mukhādiṣvevāntarbhavanti | atastadvadeva pañcasaṃdhyekamapi vākyaṃ prabandhavyapadeśamāsādayati | tadyathā—
‘kathamapi kṛtapratyāsattau priye’ iti mukham, ‘skhalitottare’ iti pratimukham, ‘virahakṛśayā kṛtvā vyājaṃ prajalpitamaśrutam’ iti garbhaḥ, ‘asahanasakhīśrotraprāptiprasādasasaṃbhramaṃ vivalitadṛśā’ iti vimarśaḥ, 'śūnye gehe samucchvasitaṃ ‘tadā’ ka, ‘(muhuḥ)’ khasametam’ iti nibarhaṇam | etena prācīnaprabandhārthe 'pi ekavākyoktena prabandhatvamityākhyātaṃ na bhavati | tadyathā—
‘turaganicayavyagrānūrvībhidaḥ sagarādhvare kapilamahasā roṣātpluṣṭānapi prapitāmahān |
agaṇitatanūtāpastaptvā tapāṃsi bhagīratho bhagavati tava spṛṣṭānadbhiścirādudadīdharat || 525 ||’
‘avistṛtamasaṃkṣiptam’ ityanena vistārabhīrūṇāṃ kathārasavicchedaśaṅkināṃ ca cittamāvarjyate | ‘‘śravyāntairityanena’ khaśravyavṛttam’ ityanena vṛttāntarairāśvāsakādi-
parisamāptiriti pariśrāntāḥ śrotāra aśvāsyante, sragādisaṃniveśādivatsaṃdarbhe cāśvādayo vibhāvyante | ‘puropavane’ ityādinā ca deśakālapātrasaṃpadupavarṇanādālambanoddīpanavibhāvāḥ kathyante | udyānasalilakrīḍādyupalakṣaṇena kāminīnāṃ divāceṣṭāḥ, madhupānaratotsava ityanena ca rātriceṣṭā ucyante | vipralambhā ityanena catvāro 'pi prathamānurāgādayaḥ parāmṛśyante | ‘vivāha‘vivāhā’ ka kha’ ityupalakṣaṇena prathamānurāgo vivāhāntaḥ, mānaḥ premāntaḥ, pravāsaḥ, saṃgamāntaḥ, karuṇaḥ, pratyujjīvanāntaḥ, ‘prabandhaḥ’ khaprabandhe kartavya ityupadiśyate | ‘mantradūta’ ityādipuruṣakārāyatta‘puruṣākārāyatta’ kasiddhi‘sūcanena dyūtatādinirāsāt’ khasūcanenādyūnatādinirāsānnāyakasya sattvotkarṣaḥ prakāśyate | ‘nāvarṇanaṃ nagaryāderdoṣāya’ ityādinā tu puruṣārthāsattvopakāritvena‘puruṣārthāsannopakārakāritvena’ ka, ‘puruṣārthāsannopakāritvena’ kha śailartūdyānacandrodayamadhupānaratotsavādīnāṃ mantradūtaprayogājināyakābhyudapādīnāṃ‘mantradūtaprayogādyanāyakābhyudayādīnāṃ ca’ ka, ‘mantradūtaprayogātināyakābhyudayādīnāṃ ca’ kha ca niyamena prayogaḥ, śeṣāṇāṃ tu prabandhaśarīrānurodheneti pratipādyate | ‘guṇataḥ’ prāgupanyasya nāyakaṃ tena vidviṣām | nirākaraṇam’ ityanena guṇavatā bhāvyaṃ na guṇadveṣiṇeti jñāpyate | ‘vaṃśavīryaśrutādīni’ ityādinā punarābhijātyauddhatyaśauṇḍīryavīryādaya‘śauṭīryavīryādayaḥ’ ka kha eva śatrorvarṇanīyā na tvavacchedahetavo nyāyyācaraṇabinayādaya iti pratyāyyate | ‘dhinoti naḥ’ iti tvayameva pakṣaḥ śreyāniti granthakāreṇa svābhiprāyaḥ prakāśyate ||
iti nigaditabhaṅa‍gyānaṅa‍gasarvasvametad vividhamapi manobhirbhāvayanto 'sya bhedam‘khedam’ ka |
tadanubhavasamutthānandasaṃmīlitākṣāḥ pariṣadi paritoṣaṃ hanta santaḥ prayāntu || 526 ||
yāvanmūrdhni himāṃśukandalabhṛti svarvāhinī dhūrjaṭeryāvadvakṣasi kaustubhastabakitā lakṣmīrmuradveṣiṇaḥ |
yāvaccittabhuvastrilokavijayaprauḍhaṃ dhanuḥ kausumaṃ bhūyāttāvadiyaṃ kṛtiḥ kṛtadhiyāṃ karṇāvataṃsotpalam || 527 ||
iti śrīmahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite sarasvatīkaṇṭhābharaṇālaṃkāre rasavivecano nāma pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ |
